T02D1186:88a-22: srid pa 'gog pa yis kyang ni //
T02D1186:88a-23: skye ba'ang nges par 'gag par byed //
T02D1186:88a-24: skye ba 'gog pa yis kyang ni //
T02D1186:88a-25: rga shi nges par 'gog par byed //
T02D1186:88a-26: phung po khams rnams nges 'gog pa //
T02D1186:88a-27: de nyid nye bar zhi bar brjod //
T02D1186:88a-29: dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang me tog bkram pa'i le'ur gsungs pa /
T02D1186:88a-30: rab 'byor dus gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1186:88a-31: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D1186:88a-32: phyin pa mi zad pa mngon par bsgrubs pa na
T02D1186:88a-33: / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par
T02D1186:88a-34: lta bar byed pa de'i tshe ma rig pa yang
T02D1186:88a-35: dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
T02D1186:88a-36: de bzhin du 'du byed ma yin /
T02D1186:88a-37: rnam par shes ba ma yin /
T02D1186:88a-47: mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /
T02D1186:88a-50: 'khrug pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ma yin no zhes so //
T02D1186:88a-51: de ltar sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang /
T02D1186:88b-1: srog 'gog pas byang chub kyi sems 'gog pa'o //
T02D1186:88b-2: byang chub kyi sems 'gog pas 'pho ba 'gog pa'o //
T02D1186:88b-3: 'pho ba'i skad cig 'gog pas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas nyid do //
T02D1186:88b-4: de ltar nyon mongs pa 'gog pas las kyang 'gog go //
T02D1186:88b-5: las 'gog pas sdug bsngal yang 'gog pa'o //
T02D1186:88b-6: sdug bsngal 'gog pas nyon mongs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin te //
T02D1186:88b-7: nyon mongs pa 'byung ba med pas las 'byung ba ma yin pa kho na'o //
T02D1186:88b-8: sad pa rmi lam shin tu gnyid //
T02D1186:88b-9: bzhi pa'i gnas skabs bzhi po yis //
T02D1186:88b-11: sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med //
T02D1186:88b-12: da ni de sgrub pa'i ched du kun rdzob kyi phyag rgya brjod par bya'o //
T02D1186:88b-13: dpal nyung du'i rgyud du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:88b-14: skyed byed ma dang sring mo dang //
T02D1186:88b-15: bu mo sring mo'i bu mo ni //
T02D1186:88b-16: shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis //
T02D1186:88b-17: rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod //
T02D1186:88b-19: / rnal 'byor zhes pa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i sems dag gcig pa nyid de //
T02D1186:88b-20: la la n'a dang ra sa n'a dag gcig pa /
T02D1186:88b-21: gtum mo dang khu ba dag gcig pa ste de
T02D1186:88b-22: las nges par grub pa'i dbang phyug khu ba ma
T02D1186:88b-23: 'phos pa'i tshangs par spyod pa mi 'gyur ba'i bde
T02D1186:88b-24: bas shes rab dang thabs snyoms par 'jug pas mchod
T02D1186:88b-26: 'dir rgyud rnams thams cad du ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams thun mong du gsungs te /
T02D1186:88b-27: rnal 'byor pa rnams rjes su chags par byed pa'i ched du'o //
T02D1186:88b-28: de yang byang chub kyi sems brtan par byas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yin gyi /
T02D1186:88b-29: gzhan rnams kyi ni ma yin no //
T02D1186:88b-30: gzhan 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi bud med rnams
T02D1186:88b-31: gnas skabs kyi dbye bas ma la sogs pa rnams
T02D1186:88b-32: su 'gyur ro // 'dir gang gi tshe rnal 'byor pa bud med la sems par byed na /
T02D1186:88b-33: de'i tshe sems kyis bsam par byas pas ma ru 'gyur ro //
T02D1186:88b-35: rdo rje zhugs pas bu mor 'gyur /
T02D1186:88b-36: byed pa dang bcas shin tu dga' bar gyur pa ni sring mo'i bu mor 'gyur ro //
T02D1186:88b-37: thig le ltung bar gyur pas na chung ma'o //
T02D1186:88b-38: gzhan gyi rigs gyur gtum mo'i rnal 'byor mar ni
T02D1186:88b-39: 'dod chags nyams par gyur pa las te chags bral
T02D1186:89a-2: ;'di rnams rnal 'byor phyag rgya drug ste rnal 'byor
T02D1186:89a-3: pas sa la sogs pa rnams su rig par bya'o
T02D1186:89a-4: // phyi rol du ni rigs dang yul gyi tha snyad kyis ma la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1186:89a-6: gar ma tshos ma g-yung mo dang //
T02D1186:89a-7: gtum mo de bzhin bram ze mo //
T02D1186:89a-9: sngar bshad pa yi cho gas dang /
T02D1186:89a-10: shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis //
T02D1186:89a-11: rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod //
T02D1186:89a-12: dus thams cad du mi 'pho ba'i bde bas //
T02D1186:89a-13: 'bad pa yis ni bsten par bya //
T02D1186:89a-14: phyi rol du ji ltar bye bar mi 'gyur bar
T02D1186:89a-15: bya ba ni nges pa'i don gyis byang chub kyi
T02D1186:89a-16: sems 'pho ba'o // drang pa'i don gyis phyi rol du skye bos smod pa'o //
T02D1186:89a-17: de'i phyir ma la sogs pa rnams la gsal bor
T02D1186:89a-18: bsten par bya ba ma yin no zhes pa bcom
T02D1186:89a-20: gang gi tshe gsal por bsten na rgyal rigs la
T02D1186:89a-21: sogs pa rnams kyis byis pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams
T02D1186:89a-22: la sdug bsngal ster bar byed do //
T02D1186:89a-23: gang phyir skye 'gro bskyed pa'i phyir //
T02D1186:89a-24: shes rab ma zhes brjod par bya ste /
T02D1186:89a-26: de bzhin du thabs ni khu ba'i khams so //
T02D1186:89a-27: rdul dang khu ba las yang dag par byung ba ni ma la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1186:89a-28: gang phyir rnam dbye ston pa'i phyir //
T02D1186:89a-29: shes rab de nyid sring mor brjod par bya ste
T02D1186:89a-30: khams kyi rnam 'gyur so so ba spu dang pags
T02D1186:89a-31: pa dang sha dang khrag go //
T02D1186:89a-32: de bzhin du sring mo'i bu mo ni rtsa dang
T02D1186:89a-33: rus pa dang rkang gi rnam par dbye ba'i cha
T02D1186:89a-34: ru 'jug par byed pa de'i phyir ro //
T02D1186:89a-36: yon tan 'jo phyir bu mor yang brjod par bya ste yon tan gyi tshig gis ni sgra dang /
T02D1186:89a-37: reg dang ro dang gzugs dang dri'i khams kyi yul rnams yin te /
T02D1186:89a-40: shes rab ni chung mar brjod par bya ste chags bral du mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1186:89a-41: reg par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1186:89a-42: mthar skyes mar brjod par bya'o zhes pa phyag rgya
T02D1186:89a-44: khams thams cad kyi bde mnyam gyi ro 'bab par
T02D1186:89a-45: byed pa'i phyir de kho na bram ze mo zhes
T02D1186:89a-46: brjod par bya'o // gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:89a-47: rnam par mi rtog khams mi zad //
T02D1186:89a-48: chos khams dam pa zad pa med //
T02D1186:89b-1: khams rnams g-yo phyir gar ma'o //
T02D1186:89b-2: gtum pa'i las ni byed pa'i phyir //
T02D1186:89b-3: gtum mo ru ni brjod pa yin //
T02D1186:89b-4: reg min phyir ni g-yung mor bshad //
T02D1186:89b-5: de ltar bya ba lnga'i rang bzhin las //
T02D1186:89b-6: bram ze ma sogs shes par bya //
T02D1186:89b-7: de'i phyir rang bzhin gyis bud med thams cad dang
T02D1186:89b-8: skyes pa thams cad mi'i rigs gcig tu yang dag
T02D1186:89b-10: de rnams la rigs gzhan yod pa ma yin no
T02D1186:89b-11: zhes pa rgyud thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D1186:89b-12: nges pa'o // rigs lnga'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba //
T02D1186:89b-13: thar pa'i rgyur ni brjod par bya //
T02D1186:89b-15: thar pa zhes pa ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba thob pa ste /
T02D1186:89b-16: de kho na rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rgyu'o zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
T02D1186:89b-17: 'dir thar pa'i rgyur phyag rgya zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rigs can rnams yin la /
T02D1186:89b-19: byang chub sems 'dis rgyas gdab bya //
T02D1186:89b-22: 'dir rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pas ma la
T02D1186:89b-23: sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams 'khrags 'khrugs su gsungs mod
T02D1186:89b-24: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzung bar bya
T02D1186:89b-25: ste / 'dir ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
T02D1186:89b-26: dang bram ze mo dang spyan ma dang lte ba'i
T02D1186:89b-27: ste / padma dang / sa'i khams so //
T02D1186:89b-28: sring mo ni m'a ma k'i dang /
T02D1186:89b-29: snying gar rdo rje'i rigs can dang g-yung mo dang chu'i khams kyi rigs so /
T02D1186:89b-30: padma'i rigs can ma ni bu mo dang /
T02D1186:89b-35: las kyi rigs can ma ni tshos ma dang dpral
T02D1186:89b-36: bar te sring mo'i bu mo dang sgrol ma dang
T02D1186:89b-38: chung ma ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dang /
T02D1186:89b-39: rin po che'i rigs dang gtum mo dang /
T02D1186:89b-40: gtsug tor du nam mkha'i khams so //
T02D1186:89b-41: mthar skyes ma ni ye shes kyi khams dang /
T02D1186:89b-42: rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs can ma dang gsang ba'i padmar ro //
T02D1186:89b-43: dpal ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing //
T02D1186:89b-44: de bzhin slar yang byon pa nyid //
T02D1186:89b-45: shes rab ldan pa 'di yis ni //
T02D1186:89b-46: de bzhin gshegs pa brjod par bya //
T02D1186:89b-47: zhes pa shes rab stong pa nyid 'di dang lhan cig ldan pa ste /
T02D1186:89b-48: stong pa nyid kyi gzugs dang lhan cig pa'o //
T02D1186:90a-1: rdo rje nor bu'i mthar thug par mi gnas pa'i
T02D1186:90a-2: mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa la gtsug tor nam
T02D1186:90a-3: mkha'i khams nas dpral ba dang mgrin pa dang snying
T02D1186:90a-4: ga dang / lte ba dang gsang ba'i padma rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang /
T02D1186:90a-5: ye shes gyi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje btsun mo'i
T02D1186:90a-6: bha ga rnams su zhugs par gyur to zhes pa
T02D1186:90a-7: dpal ldan byang chub kyi sems kyi rdo rje gshegs
T02D1186:90a-8: pa'o // de bzhin byon pa zhes pa ji ltar
T02D1186:90a-9: 'gog gi char gshegs pa de ltar byon pa ste
T02D1186:90a-10: pa'o // / rdo rje nor bu dang gsang ba'i
T02D1186:90a-11: padma ye shes kyi khams nas lte ba dang snying
T02D1186:90a-12: pa'o // / ga dang / mgrin pa dang dpral ba dang /
T02D1186:90a-13: gtsug tor du gyen du khu ba'o //
T02D1186:90a-14: de ltar na ji ltar byon pa de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes grub bo //
T02D1186:90a-15: dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos 'phags kyi le'ur gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:90a-16: de skad ces smras pa dang /
T02D1186:90a-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
T02D1186:90a-18: kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
T02D1186:90a-19: tu du la 'di skad ce sa smras so //
T02D1186:90a-20: rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni nges
T02D1186:90a-21: par 'ga' zhig nas byon pa'am bzhud pa med de
T02D1186:90a-22: / de bzhin nyid ni g-yo ba med pa ste /
T02D1186:90a-23: gang de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02D1186:90a-24: rigs kyi bu skye ba med pa la ni 'gro ba'am 'ong ba med de //
T02D1186:90a-25: gang skye ba med pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02D1186:90a-26: rigs kyi bu yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni 'ong
T02D1186:90a-27: ba'am 'gro ba rab tu shes pa ma yin te
T02D1186:90a-28: / gang yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02D1186:90a-29: rigs kyi bu stong pa nyid la ni 'ong ba'am
T02D1186:90a-30: 'gro bar rab tu gdags pa med de gang stong
T02D1186:90a-31: pa nyid de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02D1186:90a-32: rigs kyi bu ji lta ba bzhin nyid la ni
T02D1186:90a-33: 'ong ba'am 'gro bar rab tu gdags pa med de
T02D1186:90a-34: / gang ji lta ba bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes so //
T02D1186:90a-35: dpal rdo rje rtse mor yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:90a-36: de kho na nyid chos gnas pas //
T02D1186:90a-37: de bzhin ma yin slar mi 'gyur //
T02D1186:90a-38: de kho na nyid lam ston pa //
T02D1186:90a-39: de bzhin gshegs par de brjod bya //
T02D1186:90a-40: dpal mtshan yang dag bar brjod par yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:90a-41: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
T02D1186:90a-42: ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1186:90b-0: de bzhin du dpal shes rab @90b kyi pha rol
T02D1186:90b-1: tu phyin par 'jig rten ston pa'i le'ur yang gsungs
T02D1186:90b-2: pa / gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
T02D1186:90b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kho na bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnyam pa med pa /
T02D1186:90b-7: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags sam /
T02D1186:90b-8: de ltar sangs rgyas nyid dang /
T02D1186:90b-9: de ltar rang byung nyid dang /
T02D1186:90b-10: de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
T02D1186:90b-14: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags zhes so //
T02D1186:90b-15: yan lag bcu gnyis 'gog pas sa bcu gnyis thob pa'o //
T02D1186:90b-16: ji ltar 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi dga' ba dang /
T02D1186:90b-17: mchog tu dga' ba dang khyad dga'i dga' ba dang
T02D1186:90b-18: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i dbye bas dpral ba
T02D1186:90b-19: nas 'og tu 'ongs pa de bzhin du bzlog pas
T02D1186:90b-23: dri ma med pa'i gsang ba nas dpral bar song ba'o //
T02D1186:90b-24: de skad du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:90b-25: lte bar rgyu mthun nyid du brjod //
T02D1186:90b-26: rnam smin chos kyi 'khor lo la'o //
T02D1186:90b-27: skyes bu'i byed pa'am longs spyod la //
T02D1186:90b-28: bde ba chen por dri ma med //
T02D1186:90b-29: ces pa'i nges pa 'chang bar 'gyur ba la'o //
T02D1186:90b-30: de ltar na ji ltar tshes gcig la sogs pa'i
T02D1186:90b-31: cha bco lnga'i dbye bas cha'i rang bzhin gyis rdzogs
T02D1186:90b-32: pa dang / gtsug tor nas gsang ba'i padmar cha'i
T02D1186:90b-33: rang bzhin gyis rdzogs par 'ongs pa kun rdzob tu
T02D1186:90b-34: 'og tu khu ba ye shes kyi sems yin pa
T02D1186:90b-35: de ltar rdo rje nor bu las rnal 'byor gyi
T02D1186:90b-36: stobs kyis drangs pas gsang ba'i padma nas don dam
T02D1186:90b-37: par tshes gcig la sogs pa'i cha'i dbye pas steng
T02D1186:90b-38: du khu bas dpral ba'i padmar gshegs pa ste /
T02D1186:90b-39: gtsug tor du cha bcu drug pa'i rang bzhin gyis so zhes so //
T02D1186:90b-40: de skad du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:90b-41: lus can thams cad 'chi ba na //
T02D1186:90b-43: steng du nyi ma rdul sgra gcan //
T02D1186:90b-44: rnam shes dngos po'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1186:90b-45: de phyir zla ba bdud rtsi ni //
T02D1186:90b-46: steng du bgrod bya mi yi bdag /'og tu nyi ma rdul sgra gcan //
T02D1186:90b-49: n'a da thig le yang dag ldan //
T02D1186:90b-50: gang tshe dus kun du 'gyur ba //
T02D1186:91a-2: 'bras bu zhes par bshad cing smra //
T02D1186:91a-3: gang phyir thig le thams cad khyab //
T02D1186:91a-4: gang tshe rtags ni 'gyur med gyur //
T02D1186:91a-5: de tshe dga' ba phun tshogs 'byung //
T02D1186:91a-6: dga' ba las ni lhan skyes 'gyur //
T02D1186:91a-7: zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
T02D1186:91a-8: don dam pas 'chad par 'gyur ba ni //
T02D1186:91a-9: byang chub sems ni zla bar 'gyur //
T02D1186:91a-10: bco lnga'i cha yi bdag nyid can //
T02D1186:91a-11: bde ba chen po a'a li'i gzugs //
T02D1186:91a-12: rnal 'byor ma rnams de yi cha //
T02D1186:91a-13: zhes pa dga' ba bcu drug gi nges pa'o //
T02D1186:91a-14: rnam par mi rtog yid la ni //
T02D1186:91a-15: sgom pa po med bsgom bya'ang med //
T02D1186:91a-16: sngags dang lha ni yod ma yin //
T02D1186:91a-17: spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin las //
T02D1186:91a-18: sngags dang lha ni yang dag gnas //
T02D1186:91a-19: de nyid kyis na lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i
T02D1186:91a-20: rang bzhin rnam par rtog pa'i rnyog pa mtha' dag
T02D1186:91a-21: so sor nub pa'i ngo bos so //
T02D1186:91a-23: de ni phung po drug po rnams kyi kun rdzob
T02D1186:91a-24: dang don dam pa'i dbye ba brjod par bya ste
T02D1186:91a-25: / rnam snang zhes pa la sogs pas so //
T02D1186:91a-26: 'dir rnam par snang mdzad ni sa'i 'khor lo la 'dren pa'o //
T02D1186:91a-27: mi bskyod pa ni nam mkha'i 'khor lo la 'dren pa'o //
T02D1186:91a-28: 'od dpag tu med pa ni chu'i 'khor lo la 'dren pa'o //
T02D1186:91a-29: rin chen 'byung ldan ni me'i 'khor lo la 'dren pa'o //
T02D1186:91a-30: don yod grub pa ni rlung gi 'khor lo la 'dren pa'o //
T02D1186:91a-31: sems can ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo la 'dren pa'o //
T02D1186:91a-32: de rnams kyang grangs ji lta ba bzhin du //
T02D1186:91a-33: tshangs pa khyab 'jug zhi ba dang //
T02D1186:91a-34: thams cad rnam pa de nyid brjod //
T02D1186:91a-35: ces pa kun rdzob kyis sems can rnams 'og tu khu ba can rnams te /
T02D1186:91a-36: don dam pas sangs rgyas rnams steng du khu ba can rnams so //
T02D1186:91a-37: tshangs pa myang 'das sangs rgyas te //
T02D1186:91a-38: zhes pa bshad pa'i khams ni 'dzag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1186:91a-40: gci ba'i khams rang gi lus la 'jug pa'i phyir te /
T02D1186:91a-41: phyi rol du 'byung ba med pa'i phyir na sangs rgyas khyab 'jug tu brjod par bya'o //
T02D1186:91a-42: rtag tu dge phyir zhi ba'o //
T02D1186:91a-43: zhes pa dge ba ni tshul khrims ma nyams pa ste /
T02D1186:91a-44: byang chub kyi sems 'pho ba med pa'i phyir na sangs rgyas ni zhi bar brjod par bya'o //
T02D1186:91b-0: thams cad @91b kun bdag la gnas phyir //
T02D1186:91b-1: zhes pa thams cad ni rin chen 'byung ldan khrag gi khams te /
T02D1186:91b-2: de 'pho ba med pas na sdug bsngal med pa yin la de med pa'i phyir /
T02D1186:91b-3: bde sdug sel ba mthar gyur pa //
T02D1186:91b-4: chags bral lus ni zad pa po //
T02D1186:91b-5: kun bdag la gnas zhes pa lha'i spyan dang gzhan
T02D1186:91b-6: gyi sems shes pas khyab par byed pa nyid kyi
T02D1186:91b-7: phyir na / sangs rgyas ni thams cad ces par brjod par bya'o //
T02D1186:91b-8: rtog pa med phyir rnam sad do //
T02D1186:91b-10: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rtogs pa med pas don yod grub pa sha'i khams te /
T02D1186:91b-11: de mi zad pa nyid kyi phyir mig la sogs pa rnams 'du byed pa med la /
T02D1186:91b-12: de med pa'i phyir rnam sangs rgyas te /
T02D1186:91b-13: bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa //
T02D1186:91b-14: kun la phan pa'i gang zag mchog /'jig rten dpe las 'das pa ste //
T02D1186:91b-15: shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog / ces pa /
T02D1186:91b-17: rtog pa med pa rnam sangs rgyas //
T02D1186:91b-19: dam pa'i bde bas de nyid 'gyur //
T02D1186:91b-21: dam pa'i bde ba ni zag pa med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med pa dang /
T02D1186:91b-23: mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste /
T02D1186:91b-24: rnam par thar pa bzhi gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa /
T02D1186:91b-25: snying rje dang byams ba dang dga' ba dang /
T02D1186:91b-26: btang snyoms dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis dmigs pa /
T02D1186:91b-27: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can gyi de
T02D1186:91b-28: kho na nyid ni sangs rgyas zhes brjod par bya'o
T02D1186:91b-30: bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis pa //
T02D1186:91b-31: de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig / rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa //
T02D1186:91b-32: rnam dag mchog tu mi 'gyur rig / ces pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan no //
T02D1186:91b-33: brjod pa ces bya ba la sogs pas te /
T02D1186:91b-34: 'dir sems can rnams thams cad kyi brjod pa ni
T02D1186:91b-35: a'a li k'a li dbyangs dang gsal byed dag gi
T02D1186:91b-36: brjod pa gang yin pa ste /
T02D1186:91b-37: de'i phyir de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis /
T02D1186:91b-38: brjod pa bzlas pa yin par bshad //
T02D1186:91b-40: dpal sambu ta ru gsungs pa /
T02D1186:91b-41: skye bo rnams kyis dag gis ni //
T02D1186:91b-42: rab 'jam gang ci'ang rab bskyed pa //
T02D1186:91b-43: de rnams thams cad sngags kyi gzugs //
T02D1186:91b-44: de nyid las ni rab tu skye //
T02D1186:92a-0: de bzhin du sems can rnams kyi gang @92a * //
T02D1186:92a-1: sems dpa' de ni da bsam bya ste /
T02D1186:92a-2: pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas zhes pa'o //
T02D1186:92a-3: gang phyir bsam bral bsam bya ba /
T02D1186:92a-4: bsam bral zhes pa ni sems pa med pa ste /
T02D1186:92a-5: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis bsam bya gang yin pa'o //
T02D1186:92a-6: pha'i yul la shi ba'i mthar skye ba'i char gtogs
T02D1186:92a-7: pa'i rang gi phung pos 'pho ba'i gnas skabs su
T02D1186:92a-8: bde ba thob pa gang yin pa'i bde ba de
T02D1186:92a-9: nyid ni lo bcu drug gi mtshams su skyes pas
T02D1186:92a-11: bud med kyis lo bcu gnyis kyi mtshams su longs spyod par bya'o //
T02D1186:92a-13: 'khor pa rnams kyi 'khor bar skye ba dang gnas
T02D1186:92a-14: pa'i bde ba de kho na brtan par gyur pa
T02D1186:92a-15: ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi bsam gtan du brjod
T02D1186:92a-18: bsam gtan cha shas kun shes shing /
T02D1186:92a-19: ting 'dzin rig dang rgyud rig pa //
T02D1186:92a-20: ting 'dzin sku ste sku yi mchog /
T02D1186:92a-21: longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal //
T02D1186:92a-23: zhes dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud la kha che chen
T02D1186:92a-24: pos rtogs pa rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po bsdus
T02D1186:92a-25: pa'i dka' 'grel du de kho na nyid kyi le'u
T02D1186:92a-27: / da ni de kho na nyid kyi le'u rig
T02D1186:92a-28: pa'i rnal 'byor pas sems can rjes su gzung pa'i
T02D1186:92a-29: sems la dmigs pa'i ched du spyod pa'i le'u gsungs
T02D1186:92a-30: pa / spyod pa pha rol phyin zhes pa ste
T02D1186:92a-31: spyod pa zhes pa spyod pa ni rdo rje'i spyod
T02D1186:92a-32: pa / pa ste / phyag rgya chen po lhan
T02D1186:92a-33: cig skyes pa rdo rje dang padma las ma 'phos
T02D1186:92a-35: rgyud gzhan du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:92a-36: rdo rje spyod pa'i rab sbyor gyis //
T02D1186:92a-37: rdo rje phung po rnam bsgom bya //
T02D1186:92a-38: rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa //
T02D1186:92a-41: pha rol phyin zhes pa ni dpal theg pa chen
T02D1186:92a-42: po phul du byung ba la gnas shing rgal dka'
T02D1186:92a-43: ba'i srid pa'i rgya mtsho las shin tu 'das pa'o
T02D1186:92a-45: skye ba'i rgya mtsho 'jigs chen po //
T02D1186:92a-46: rga ba'i rlabs kyis 'khrugs pa las //
T02D1186:92a-47: sems can rnams ni sgrol byed cing //
T02D1186:92a-48: bde bar 'gro byed gru lta bu //
T02D1186:92a-50: de bzhin du dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod par yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:92a-51: mi shes 'dam du byings gyur cing /
T02D1186:92b-0: @92b nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs pa'i //
T02D1186:92b-1: sems can kun la phan pa dang //
T02D1186:92b-2: bla med 'bras bu thob bya'i ched //
T02D1186:92b-4: gang gi dngos grub mthar 'gro ba //
T02D1186:92b-5: zhes pa dngos grub kyi mthar mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde bar 'gro zhing shes par byed pa'o //
T02D1186:92b-6: kye yi rdo rje'i dngos grub rgyur //
T02D1186:92b-7: zhes pa la kye'i rdo rje cir brjod par bya zhe na /
T02D1186:92b-8: padmar gnas shing khro ba bral //
T02D1186:92b-9: gtsang zhing mkhas la mnyam gzhag pa //
T02D1186:92b-10: rnal 'byor ye shes yang dag ldan //
T02D1186:92b-11: sems ni kye yi rdo rjer brjod //
T02D1186:92b-12: dngos grub rgyus zhes pa dngos grub ni sangs rgyas nyid de /
T02D1186:92b-13: de nyid ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rgyu'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1186:92b-14: sgom pa po yis rnam bzung ba //
T02D1186:92b-15: rna bar lha yi rna rgyan te //
T02D1186:92b-16: zhes pa la sogs pa la 'dir phyag rgya lnga'i
T02D1186:92b-17: nye bar bstan pa ni bris sku sgrub pa'i le'ur
T02D1186:92b-18: nges pa'i don gyis brjod par bya'o //
T02D1186:92b-19: bgo ba stag gi pags pa zhes gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:92b-20: 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs rnams kyi //
T02D1186:92b-21: stag gis 'gro ba gsum po zos //
T02D1186:92b-22: de rnams 'joms phyir pags pa ste //
T02D1186:92b-23: stag gi pags pa'i na bzar bcas //
T02D1186:92b-25: rigs lnga la ni rnam par gnas //
T02D1186:92b-26: rigs lnga'i mnyam par ldan par ni //
T02D1186:92b-27: rigs gcig pa ni rnam par brtag / ces pa
T02D1186:92b-28: la sogs pa rigs gcig nyid sna tshogs pa rigs
T02D1186:92b-29: lnga dang yang dag par ldan par blun po rnams
T02D1186:92b-30: kyis brtags pa'o // gang las she na gsungs pa /
T02D1186:92b-31: du ma zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1186:92b-32: srog chags rigs tha dad pa rnams ni sha gzugs tha dad par mtshon te /
T02D1186:92b-33: 'dir ni rigs gcig gi ngo bo ni du ma'i dbye bar mtshon pa med do //
T02D1186:92b-34: dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod par yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:92b-35: lus med lus te lus kyi mchog / lus kyi mtha' ni rtog pa po //
T02D1186:92b-36: gzugs rnams ma lus ston mdzad pa //
T02D1186:92b-37: nor bu chen po rin chen tog / ces so //
T02D1186:92b-39: bde ba nag po bde ba ser //
T02D1186:92b-40: bde ba dmar po bde ba dkar //
T02D1186:92b-41: bde ba ljang gu bde ba sngo //
T02D1186:92b-42: bde ba mtha' dag rgyu mi rgyu //
T02D1186:92b-43: bde ba shes rab bde ba thabs //
T02D1186:92b-44: de bzhin kun du ru skyes bde //
T02D1186:92b-45: bde ba dngos po dngos med bde //
T02D1186:92b-46: bde ba rdo rje sems dpar bshad //
T02D1186:93a-1: rigs gcig dang ni du ma yis //
T02D1186:93a-2: gang phyir bye ba mtshon mi bya //
T02D1186:93a-3: bye ba ni nyams pa ste byang chub kyi sems 'pho ba'o //
T02D1186:93a-4: de'i phyir de mi bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1186:93a-5: shing gcig ces pa ni lhan cig skyes pa gcig
T02D1186:93a-6: pu'i sku mchog tu mi 'gyur ba gcig pu'i bde
T02D1186:93a-7: ba bcad du med cing dbyer med pa ste byang
T02D1186:93a-8: chub kyi sems kyi shing gcig pu'o //
T02D1186:93a-10: mgo bor gnas pa rtsa ba ste /
T02D1186:93a-11: yal ga dril bu'i nang du'o //
T02D1186:93a-12: chos 'byung zhes bshad dbus su ste //
T02D1186:93a-13: lhan skyes 'bras bu bla na med //
T02D1186:93a-15: gzhan thams cad ni drang ba'i don gyis go sla'o //
T02D1186:93a-16: dbugs rgyu zhes pa'i rigs pa 'dis //
T02D1186:93a-17: lus 'di dur khrod brjod par bya //
T02D1186:93a-19: rgyud gzhan du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:93a-20: ro ldan na gnas pa ni phyi rol du ro'i sgras srog nyams pa shi ba'i tshogs te /
T02D1186:93a-21: de 'di la yod pas na ro ldan ni dur khrod kyi sa'o //
T02D1186:93a-22: nang du ni ro zhes pa dbugs 'byung ba dang
T02D1186:93a-23: 'jug pa drug brgya lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu
T02D1186:93a-25: de 'di la yod pas na chos kyi sprin gyi sa'o //
T02D1186:93a-26: de na gnas pa ni ro ldan na gnas pa'o //
T02D1186:93a-27: bdud dang nyon mongs pa dang shes bya dang snyoms
T02D1186:93a-28: 'jug gi sgrib pa'i gnod sbyin rnams gsod par byed
T02D1186:93a-29: pa ni gnod sbyin gyi bdag po ste /
T02D1186:93a-30: dpal phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'o //
T02D1186:93a-31: dpal sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma dra ba sdom par gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:93a-32: de nas gnod sbyin cir brjod bya //
T02D1186:93a-33: gang zhig nyon mongs thams cad zad //
T02D1186:93a-34: gang zhig sgra rnams kyang zad pa //
T02D1186:93a-35: gdul bya las ni phyag rdo rje //
T02D1186:93a-36: des na gnod byin zhes par brjod //
T02D1186:93a-38: de la ci ltar bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje yin zhe na /
T02D1186:93a-39: mi phyed so sor bcad du med //
T02D1186:93a-40: gdug pa kun la gnod byed phyir //
T02D1186:93a-41: rdo rje sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin //
T02D1186:93a-42: byang chub sems ni shin tu bstan //
T02D1186:93a-43: chos kyi seng ge'i sgra yis ni //
T02D1186:93a-44: sems can so so'i skad rnams kyis //
T02D1186:93a-45: sems can rnams kyi don mdzad gyur //
T02D1186:93a-47: ma mo'i khyim zhes pa ma mo ni rang 'dra ba'i shes rab ste /
T02D1186:93a-48: khyim zhes pa ni gsang ba'i padmar ro //
T02D1186:93b-0: @93b yang na dben pa'am bas mtha' ru //
T02D1186:93b-1: zhes pa lte ba dang snying ga dang mgrin pa dang mgo bo rnams so //
T02D1186:93b-2: gnas 'di rnams su mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba bsgom par bya'o zhes nges pa'i don to //
T02D1186:93b-3: cung zad drod ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1186:93b-4: de skad du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:93b-5: rnal 'byor snying ni rnyog med pa //
T02D1186:93b-6: rdo rje spyod par dbang bskur ba //
T02D1186:93b-7: khyim gnas dge slong dge tshul rung //
T02D1186:93b-8: ji srid drod ni 'gyur bar du //
T02D1186:93b-9: spyod pa de ni gsang ste gyis //
T02D1186:93b-10: de nas 'jig rten gnod pa nyid //
T02D1186:93b-11: nus pa can la byos shig go //
T02D1186:93b-14: grub chen spyod pa byed 'dod na //
T02D1186:93b-15: gal te zhes pa nges par ma yin pa'o //
T02D1186:93b-16: 'di ni spyod pa spyad par bya //
T02D1186:93b-17: zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
T02D1186:93b-19: gang bshad 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gyis //
T02D1186:93b-20: spyod pa longs spyod phyir ma gsungs //
T02D1186:93b-21: yid ni brtan nam g-yo 'am ci //
T02D1186:93b-22: rang gi sems ni so sor brtag / shes rab
T02D1186:93b-23: med par spyod pa spyad par bya bar ma yin
T02D1186:93b-24: no zhes ston pas gsungs pa bzhin bzang zhes pa
T02D1186:93b-25: la sogs pa'o // gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:93b-26: dang po gang zhig stong pa'i ngo bo yul dang yon tan pa gnas de yi rang bzhin 'gyur //
T02D1186:93b-27: khams dang phung po rnams la rab zhugs slar yang mig sogs dbang po rnams la mnyam pa ste //
T02D1186:93b-28: sad dang rmi lam sogs zhugs mchog gi bde mnyam gzhom du med par yang dag rab zhugs pa //
T02D1186:93b-29: rig ma sangs rgyas yul te rdo rje'i tshig la gnas pa rnal 'byor pa yis btsal bar bya //
T02D1186:93b-30: phyag rgya chen po 'di ni gang la skye ba
T02D1186:93b-31: gzhan gyi bsod nams kyi bag chags kyi dbang las
T02D1186:93b-32: dang / bla ma dam pa'i man ngag las nye
T02D1186:93b-33: bar bstan pa las dus du mar nyin mo dang
T02D1186:93b-34: mtshan mor chos thams cad rtog pa dang bral ba
T02D1186:93b-35: rang gi sems kyi snang ba tsam rnam pa thams
T02D1186:93b-36: cad mchog dang ldan pa stong pa chen po lhan
T02D1186:93b-37: cig skyes pa'i dga' ba skyed par byed ma mngon
T02D1186:93b-38: du byas nas 'gyur ba med pa la byung ba
T02D1186:93b-39: 'dis de ni skye ba med pa ste /
T02D1186:93b-40: phyag rgya chen po de bzung nas spyod par bya'o zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
T02D1186:93b-41: gal te glu len zhes pa la sogs pa la dpal rdo rje bdud rtsir gsungs pa /
T02D1186:94a-2: mos dang sgrol dang pheg rdob dang //
T02D1186:94a-3: drug skyes skyes sogs grangs rnams kyis //
T02D1186:94a-4: sna tshogs pa dang thun mong bas //
T02D1186:94a-5: len bzhin pa yi glu 'di yis //
T02D1186:94a-6: dga' dang bde ba'i rnam 'gyur gyis //
T02D1186:94a-7: sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub par bya //
T02D1186:94a-8: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i bde chen po //
T02D1186:94a-9: shes rab can gyis glu mi smad //
T02D1186:94a-10: rnal 'byor ma rnams des dga' byed //
T02D1186:94a-11: rnam pa de lta de gzhan yang //
T02D1186:94a-12: de ltar rnal 'byor rigs des bya //
T02D1186:94a-14: gal te dga' ba skyes pa na //
T02D1186:94a-15: thar pa'i rgyu yis gar bya ste //
T02D1186:94a-17: rgyud gzhan du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:94a-18: phreng ba tsandan bu mo sogs //
T02D1186:94a-19: ji ltar mthong bas bde 'gyur ba //
T02D1186:94a-20: de ni dga' bar yang dag bshad //
T02D1186:94a-21: sems can kun la yang dag gnas //
T02D1186:94a-22: rdo rje padmar mnyam sbyor la //
T02D1186:94a-23: gang zhig sems ni rnam gnas pa //
T02D1186:94a-24: de yi sems kyi mtshan nyid gang //
T02D1186:94a-25: dga' ba chen po de brjod bya //
T02D1186:94a-27: thar pa zhes pa la gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:94a-28: 'khor ba las 'das thams cad lus la gnas //
T02D1186:94a-29: gang gis kyang ni bcings min grol min pa //
T02D1186:94a-30: mchog tu mi 'gyur bde ba thar pa ces brjod bya //
T02D1186:94a-32: de tshe rdo rje rkang pas gar //
T02D1186:94a-33: mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pa yis bya //
T02D1186:94a-34: zhes pa la 'di'i nges pa'i don ni dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od du gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:94a-35: g-yas pa bskum pa gang yin pa de ni g-yon brkyang gi rkang par brjod do //
T02D1186:94a-36: grangs ji lta ba bzhin te /
T02D1186:94a-37: cig car nyid du rtsa gnyis la dbu mar rgyu ba las mnyam pa'i rkang par 'gyur ro //
T02D1186:94a-38: g-yon pa bskum pa las g-yas brkyang gi rkang par 'gyur ro //
T02D1186:94a-39: padma'i gdan dang rdo rje'i gdan gang yin pa ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
T02D1186:94a-40: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la srog rgyu ba na sa ga'i rkang pa'o //
T02D1186:94a-41: rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu rgyu ba ni zlum po'i rkang stabs so //
T02D1186:94a-42: me'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu rgyu ba ni rol pa'i rkang stabs so //
T02D1186:94a-43: chu'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu rgyu ba ni padma'i 'dug stangs so //
T02D1186:94a-44: sa'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu rgyu ba ni rdo rje'i 'dug stangs te /
T02D1186:94a-45: de ltar mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod ma srog rlung
T02D1186:94a-46: rab tu rgyu ba rnam pa lnga gang yin pa
T02D1186:94b-0: de'i rnam par dag pas lha rnams @94b kyi rkang
T02D1186:94b-1: stabs dang 'dug stangs rnam par dag pa'o zhes so
T02D1186:94b-2: // dpal gsang ba'i rgyan bkod par yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:94b-3: dga' ba'i rnal 'byor yang dag gnas /
T02D1186:94b-4: lha mo bzhi dang 'grogs pa las /
T02D1186:94b-5: bcom ldan 'dod can gar mdzad de //
T02D1186:94b-6: rdo rje rol sogs kha sbyor las //
T02D1186:94b-7: gsang ba'i snying po thub pa che //
T02D1186:94b-8: kun gyi bdag nyid der zhugs nas //
T02D1186:94b-9: rdo rje lha mo mnyam ldan pas //
T02D1186:94b-10: zlos gar kun la gar mdzad do //
T02D1186:94b-11: glu ni rnam dag sngags su gnas //
T02D1186:94b-12: gar ni bsgom pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1186:94b-13: de yi phyir na glu dang gar //
T02D1186:94b-14: yo ga'i rtag tu rtag tu bya //
T02D1186:94b-16: sman ni bza' bar bya ba ste //
T02D1186:94b-17: zhes pa la sogs pa la sman ni bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'o //
T02D1186:94b-19: dpal bde ba chen po rtog pa'i rgyud chen por gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:94b-20: rnam par mi rtog mos pa yis //
T02D1186:94b-21: sgrub po mchog gis bsgrub par bya //
T02D1186:94b-22: khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha //
T02D1186:94b-23: gci ba bshad pa nyid kyang ngo //
T02D1186:94b-24: nga yis phyir ru gang bshad pa'i //
T02D1186:94b-25: dam tshig ces pa 'bad pa yis //
T02D1186:94b-26: de kun de bzhin gshegs pa ste //
T02D1186:94b-27: kla klo yi ni tha snyad las //
T02D1186:94b-28: gang tshe sems ni mnyam chags pa //
T02D1186:94b-29: sems can phan la rab tu 'jug / rtag tu chags pa'i sems de nyid //
T02D1186:94b-30: gang tshe sems can yod min pa //
T02D1186:94b-31: 'di yi don ni rtogs pa yis //
T02D1186:94b-32: khrag ni zos par 'gyur ba yin //
T02D1186:94b-33: khrag chen po ni zos pa na //
T02D1186:94b-35: chos rnams skye ba med pa gang //
T02D1186:94b-36: khu ba'i sgra yis sgrar bya ba //
T02D1186:94b-37: de ni skye med rtogs pa las /
T02D1186:94b-38: za bar yang dag brjod pa yin //
T02D1186:94b-39: dngos po rnams kyi mnyam nyid gang //
T02D1186:94b-40: sha zhes rab tu gsal byas pa //
T02D1186:94b-41: ma skyes sbyor ba bral ba las //
T02D1186:94b-42: za ba ces par mngon brjod bya //
T02D1186:94b-43: gang zhig sems ni rab zag pa //
T02D1186:94b-44: dam tshig don la rjes sbyor las //
T02D1186:94b-45: mi bskyod ces par de la gsungs //
T02D1186:94b-46: de yi las sbyor las 'thungs pa'o //
T02D1186:94b-47: sems gnas pa'am rjod pa yang //
T02D1186:94b-48: cung zad kyang ni yod min pa //
T02D1186:94b-49: de ni bshang bar gsungs pa'o //
T02D1186:94b-50: de rtog med phyir zos pa'o //
T02D1186:94b-51: 'di ni dam tshig rnams kyi ni //
T02D1186:94b-52: mtshan nyid gsal bar bshad pa'o //
T02D1186:94b-53: don 'di nges par rtogs pa yis //
T02D1186:95a-1: rgyas chos rnams rjes su rtogs //
T02D1186:95a-3: dam tshig sems dpa' brjod par bya //
T02D1186:95a-5: gzhan thams cad ni drang ba'i don gyis go sla'o //
T02D1186:95a-6: thal ba skra yi mchod phyir thogs //
T02D1186:95a-7: zhes pa la gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:95a-8: byang chub sems ni steng du 'gyur //
T02D1186:95a-9: yan lag kun la rnam gnas pa //
T02D1186:95a-10: de nyid thal ba dag par brjod //
T02D1186:95a-11: phyi dang nang du yang dag gnas //
T02D1186:95a-13: sgra zhes pa la kam ni mgo bo ste yan lag mchog go //
T02D1186:95a-14: der gnas pa yi dbar ldan ni //
T02D1186:95a-15: gtso bo byang chub kyi sems rdo rje 'dzin pa yin la /
T02D1186:95a-16: dag byed kyang ste sgrib pa spangs pa nyid kyi
T02D1186:95a-17: phyir dang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyid kyi
T02D1186:95a-18: phyir na / dag byed ces pa nges pa'i don to //
T02D1186:95a-19: rdo rje thod pa'i spyod pa la dpal sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud du gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:95a-20: rdo rje sangs rgyas zhes par bshad //
T02D1186:95a-21: thod pa gsang bar yang dag gnas //
T02D1186:95a-23: spyod par byed pas na spyod pa zhes pa gsang
T02D1186:95a-24: ba las kyang shin tu gsang ba'i ye shes te
T02D1186:95a-25: / de'i rang bzhin du byed pa ni spyod pa zhes mngon par brjod par bya'o //
T02D1186:95a-26: lus kyi sbyin pa byin nas ni //
T02D1186:95a-27: zhes tshig 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa'i tshig ni dpal dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od du gsungs pa /
T02D1186:95a-28: des dam bca' ba 'di bya ste /
T02D1186:95a-29: bdag gis dus thams cad du dngos po thams cad kyi drug cha sbyin par dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1186:95a-31: dang por re zhig drug cha lus kyi nang nas
T02D1186:95a-32: lag pa rkang pa lus las zhes pa lag pa
T02D1186:95a-33: gnyis dang rkang pa gnyis dang lus te lnga po
T02D1186:95a-34: 'di rnams las drug pa yan lag mchog slob dpon
T02D1186:95a-35: la phyag 'tshal ba'i don du sbyin par rab tu
T02D1186:95a-36: dbul bar bya'o // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D1186:95a-37: dpa' dang ldan pa'i bla ma la phyag byas nas
T02D1186:95a-38: mchog gi phyag rgya rjes su rig pa'i bde ba'i
T02D1186:95a-39: go 'phang du 'gro zhing sbyin par byed do //
T02D1186:95a-40: de bzhin du ngag dang lag pa dang rkang pa dang /
T02D1186:95a-42: nyer gnas te las kyi dbang po rnams las ngag
T02D1186:95a-43: nyid bden par smra ba'i don du dbul bar bya'o
T02D1186:95a-44: // skal pa skal med rnam dpyad pa //
T02D1186:95a-45: zhes pa gcig dang du ma dang bral bas na sbyin par bya ba dang /
T02D1186:95b-0: @95b sbyin pa po dang len pa po ste gsum po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1186:95b-2: sbyin mi bya zhes pa sbyin pa'i rnam par rtog pa de'i phyir mi bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1186:95b-3: sbyin sreg mchod sbyin dka' thub 'das //
T02D1186:95b-5: sbyin sreg med cing mchod sbyin med //
T02D1186:95b-6: dka' thub med cing bya dka' med //
T02D1186:95b-7: 'gro ba gsum po thams cad yod //
T02D1186:95b-8: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1186:95b-9: sgom yang sgom pa ma yin no //
T02D1186:95b-11: brgya byin lta bu'i lha min gang //
T02D1186:95b-12: zhes pa la sogs pa la dpal sambu tar gsungs pa yang //
T02D1186:95b-13: de nas rang gi 'dun pa yis //
T02D1186:95b-14: dogs pa kun las phyir phyogs pas //
T02D1186:95b-15: de nyid ldan pa'i bdag nyid spyad //
T02D1186:95b-16: seng ge lta bur kun du'o //
T02D1186:95b-19: bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan //
T02D1186:95b-20: mu stegs ri dags ngan 'jigs byed //
T02D1186:95b-22: snying rjes btung bar bya zhes pa snying rje ni byang chub kyi sems zhu ba'i ro'o //
T02D1186:95b-23: 'di'i nges pa'i don ni rgyud gzhan du yang gsungs pa //
T02D1186:95b-24: srog dang rtsol ba'i me'i byang chub sems kyi khu ba zhu ba ni //
T02D1186:95b-25: thig le'i gzugs can btung ba rdo rje'i rtse mos phyung nas gang //
T02D1186:95b-26: go ku la sogs mig la sogs pa nyin zhag
T02D1186:95b-27: so sor spro ste sha gzhan rnal 'byor pa yis
T02D1186:95b-28: rnal 'byor ldan pas btung bar bya'o //
T02D1186:95b-30: dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su yang gsungs pa //
T02D1186:95b-31: nyin dang mtshan mor thig le las gang dkar po'i rgyun 'bab m'a ma k'i ste chang ma yin //
T02D1186:95b-32: go ku la sogs mig la sogs pa nyin zhag so sor spro ste sha gzhan res 'ga' min //
T02D1186:95b-33: rang rig sar gnas lha rnams kyis ni dag pa'i lus la bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsnyen pa ste //
T02D1186:95b-34: stong par sems rab zhugs pas ro mnyam byed pa 'khrig pa de ni skye gnas la ma yin //
T02D1186:95b-36: rnal 'byor zhes pa dpal rdo rje rtse mor gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:95b-37: yod dang med las rnam par 'das //
T02D1186:95b-38: dngos dang dngos med gnyis zad cing //
T02D1186:95b-39: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa //
T02D1186:95b-40: rdo rje rnal 'byor bde ba che //
T02D1186:95b-42: gzhan thams cad ni drang ba'i don gyis go sla'o //
T02D1186:95b-43: phyi rol du ni lha rnams gtor ma'i don du gsungs pa'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1186:96a-0: @96a * // dpal sambu ta ru gsungs pa yang //
T02D1186:96a-1: phung po khams sogs mtshan nyid ni //
T02D1186:96a-2: thams cad rmi lam sgyu ma bzhin //
T02D1186:96a-3: khams gsum 'di kun thams cad kyang //
T02D1186:96a-4: mdor bsdus pa las shes nas gnas //
T02D1186:96a-7: dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par thabs la mkhas pa'i le'ur gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:96a-8: rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D1186:96a-9: chen po de rmi lam gyi nang du son pa
T02D1186:96a-10: na yang / chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu
T02D1186:96a-11: rnams su zhes rnam par lta zhing mngon sum du
T02D1186:96a-13: rab 'byor 'di yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub
T02D1186:96a-14: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i
T02D1186:96a-15: mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o //
T02D1186:96a-17: de bzhin du slar yang rmi lam gyi nang de
T02D1186:96a-18: na sad pa'i de ma thag tu langs pa'i 'di
T02D1186:96a-19: ltar 'gyur te / khams gsum pa'i bdag nyid 'di thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu ste /
T02D1186:96a-20: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
T02D1186:96a-21: pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas nas yang dag par
T02D1186:96a-22: chos bstan par bya'o zhes so //
T02D1186:96a-23: sgrib pa kun las rnam par grol //
T02D1186:96a-24: mtsho dang dbang phyug du ba dang //
T02D1186:96a-25: de bzhin 'jig rten chos brgyad rnams //
T02D1186:96a-26: thams cad shin tu ring bar spang //
T02D1186:96a-27: de skad du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:96a-28: rnal 'byor dbang po rnal 'byor ma thob rab tu g-yo ba'i yid kyis res 'ga' shi gyur na //
T02D1186:96a-29: dpal ldan mi yi 'jig rten du ni rab mchog thub pa'i rigs su rnal 'byor ldan skye 'gyur //
T02D1186:96a-30: sngon gyi goms pa de yis slar yang ye shes rnal 'byor yangs pa kun du 'dzin par 'gyur //
T02D1186:96a-31: ye shes thob na mi zad mchog gi gnas su rab 'gro gang du slar yang skye ldan min //
T02D1186:96a-32: zhes pa dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud du kha che
T02D1186:96a-33: chen pos rtogs pa rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po
T02D1186:96a-34: bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel du spyod pa'i le'u ste drug
T02D1186:96a-36: / da ni tstsho ma'i le'u gsungs pa /
T02D1186:96a-37: dang por yi ge'i brda yis dngos po'i chos rig par bya ste /
T02D1186:96a-38: gnas la sogs par tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa la'o //
T02D1186:96a-39: dam tshig med pa'i sems can gyi nang du tstsho
T02D1186:96b-0: ma ste dgongs pa'i skad gzhan gyis rnal 'byor @96b
T02D1186:96b-1: pa'am rnal 'byor ma smra bar bya'o zhes pa rgyud
T02D1186:96b-3: gang phyir sor mo gcig ston dang //
T02D1186:96b-4: gnyis kyis legs par 'ongs pa yin //
T02D1186:96b-5: bsnyun gyi phyag rgyar shes bya ste //
T02D1186:96b-6: g-yon pa'i mthe bong bsdams pa la //
T02D1186:96b-7: gang zhig ming med ston pa na //
T02D1186:96b-8: de yi mthe chung sbyin par bya //
T02D1186:96b-9: gang zhig gung mo ston pa la //
T02D1186:96b-10: de yi phyogs gcig pa sbyin bya //
T02D1186:96b-11: zhes pa la sogs pa yan lag gi brda ste
T02D1186:96b-12: 'di'i rim pa rtogs par bya zhing phyag rgya dang
T02D1186:96b-13: phyag rgya'i lan gyis dam tshig can dang /
T02D1186:96b-14: de ma yin pa dbye bar bya ste /
T02D1186:96b-15: de ltar drang ba'i don to //
T02D1186:96b-16: da ni nges pa'i don gsal bar bya ste /
T02D1186:96b-17: dpal rdo rje bdud rtsir gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:96b-18: rnal 'byor phyag rgya brtag ces bya //
T02D1186:96b-19: lag pa'i phyag rgya mi brtan te //
T02D1186:96b-20: phyag rgya yid ches ngo bo ni //
T02D1186:96b-21: lha nyid kyi ni btsun mo mchog / bha ga'i padmar mchod par bya //
T02D1186:96b-22: dbang po'i bde ba thams cad kyang //
T02D1186:96b-23: rdo rje padma mnyam sbyor pas //
T02D1186:96b-24: bya ba thams cad bsgrub par bya //
T02D1186:96b-26: ji ltar dpag bsam shing chen po //
T02D1186:96b-27: yal ga brgya phrag stong yod pa //
T02D1186:96b-28: der ni de las rtsa ba gzung //
T02D1186:96b-29: de ni skyed pa'i byed rgyu'o //
T02D1186:96b-30: de bzhin bdud rtsi 'bab pa'i rtsa //
T02D1186:96b-31: sngags dang phyag rgya rnams kyi ma //
T02D1186:96b-32: phyag rgya thams cad skyed byed pa //
T02D1186:96b-33: bha ga'i dbus na rnam par gnas //
T02D1186:96b-36: phung po skye mched khams rnams kun //
T02D1186:96b-37: phyag rgya yis ni rgyas btab pa //
T02D1186:96b-38: phyag rgya de yis rtag tu bkod //
T02D1186:96b-39: dkyil 'khor zhes pa rnam par bstan //
T02D1186:96b-41: gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na //
T02D1186:96b-42: lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing mi bya //
T02D1186:96b-43: dam tshig 'di ni sngags kun dang //
T02D1186:96b-45: de ltar phyag rgya mi bcing par gsungs pa na /
T02D1186:96b-46: rdo rje bcing ba'o zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyis nges pa'o //
T02D1186:96b-48: dpal thams cad gsang bar gsungs pa /
T02D1186:96b-49: nga rgyal med cing snang ba med //
T02D1186:96b-50: mtshan ma med cing gsal byed min //
T02D1186:96b-51: bdag med mnyam nyid ye shes ni //
T02D1186:96b-52: rdo rje bcings pa zhes par bshad //
T02D1186:96b-53: de bzhin du phyag rgya gcig ston pa la yang phyag rgya'i lan du mar 'gyur to //
T02D1186:96b-54: de'i phyir nus pa dang bral bas //
T02D1186:97a-1: rgya'i lan bstan par mi bya'i //
T02D1186:97a-2: 'di rnams la phyag 'tshal ba byas nas /
T02D1186:97a-3: snying gar lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil gzhag ste rang
T02D1186:97a-4: gi lus g-yon skor du bskor la de nas lag
T02D1186:97a-5: pa g-yon gyis phyag byas nas 'gro bar bya zhing
T02D1186:97a-6: de rnams dang lhan cig rtsod par mi bya'o //
T02D1186:97a-7: byis pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la nges pa gang byin pa de de yis bya'o //
T02D1186:97a-8: rnam pa gzhan du na 'chi ba thob ste khros pa'i pho nya mo nus pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1186:97a-9: kye bcom ldan 'das gnas la sogs pa de rnams du lags /
T02D1186:97a-10: mchog gi gnas la sogs pa dz'a landha ra la sogs pa'i gnas la sogs pa'o //
T02D1186:97a-11: 'di'i nges pa'i don ni rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa /
T02D1186:97a-12: mchog tu gnas pa shes rab bshad //
T02D1186:97a-13: bdag nyid gnas ni thabs yin no //
T02D1186:97a-14: 'di dag gnyis su byar med pa //
T02D1186:97a-15: rnal 'byor gnas zhes bzhag pa yin //
T02D1186:97a-16: de nyid gnas ni de las skyes //
T02D1186:97a-17: de dang bral bar gang gyur pa //
T02D1186:97a-18: lhan cig skyes pa yang dag bshad //
T02D1186:97a-19: ngag gi lam 'das spyod yul lo //
T02D1186:97a-21: dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:97a-22: gnas ni bud med gsang ba'i padmar rab 'gyur dam tshig la ni rdo rje nyid nye'i gnas /
T02D1186:97a-23: zhing dang tshando ha dang 'dus pa dur khrod sa gzhi de bzhin de ltar mtha' dag go //
T02D1186:97a-26: 'dir thun mong gis byis pa rnams yul du 'khyam
T02D1186:97a-27: pa'i don du dz'a landha ra la sogs pa gnas
T02D1186:97a-29: de nyid kyi thams cad du khyab par byed par mi 'gyur te /
T02D1186:97a-30: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rigs sum cu rtsa drug ni grong khyer gcig tu yang gnas la /
T02D1186:97a-31: gang gis na 'dir mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas su gsungs pa ni /
T02D1186:97a-32: sa thams cad khyab par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1186:97a-34: gang gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs par gsungs pa /
T02D1186:97a-35: de rnams dpal kye'i rdo rjer zhing dang nye ba'i
T02D1186:97a-36: zhing la sogs pa rnams su 'khrags 'khrugs su gsungs
T02D1186:97a-37: so // rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi 'jig rten pa'i
T02D1186:97a-38: dngos grub rnams kyang phyi rol gyi gnas la sogs
T02D1186:97a-39: par ji lta ba bzhin du mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1186:97a-40: nang du ni ma rig pa la sogs pa'i yan
T02D1186:97b-0: lag bcu @97b gnyis 'gags pa rnams rga shi la
T02D1186:97b-1: sogs pa'i 'gog pas gnas la sogs pa rnams su
T02D1186:97b-2: rtogs par bya'o // de skad du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:97b-3: nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas //
T02D1186:97b-4: nges par 'byung ba kun ston pa //
T02D1186:97b-5: yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton //
T02D1186:97b-6: dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang //
T02D1186:97b-8: gnas la sogs pa de rnams su rim pa ji
T02D1186:97b-9: lta bar dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma
T02D1186:97b-11: 'di'i nges pa'i don ni rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa /
T02D1186:97b-12: mtshan nyid bzhi yi sbyor ba las //
T02D1186:97b-13: gang du rtag tu chags bral ba //
T02D1186:97b-14: rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa //
T02D1186:97b-15: de ni dpa' bo zhes par bshad //
T02D1186:97b-16: der ni dbang phyug yang dag thob //
T02D1186:97b-17: stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02D1186:97b-18: lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin te //
T02D1186:97b-19: dpa' bo'i dbang phyug ma zhes 'gyur //
T02D1186:97b-20: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phung po dang khams dang /
T02D1186:97b-21: skye mched la sogs pa byang chub kyi sems lha'i ngo bos 'ong ba'am /
T02D1186:97b-23: 'di rnams rim pa ji lta bar spyi gtsug dang spyi bo dang /
T02D1186:97b-40: brla'i phyogs dang byin pa dang /
T02D1186:97b-43: pus mo rnams su dbang byed pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1186:97b-44: skye bar byed gnas par byed /
T02D1186:97b-46: pulli ra ru dbang byed cing //
T02D1186:97b-47: dz'a landha rar longs spyod bshad //
T02D1186:97b-48: ao di ya nar thim par brjod //
T02D1186:97b-49: gnas la sogs pa'i gzhi dang gzhir //
T02D1186:97b-50: yan lag kun la thim par 'gro //
T02D1186:97b-51: he ru ka yi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1186:97b-52: sprul pa yis ni rtag tu skye //
T02D1186:97b-53: longs spyod rdzogs pa gnas pa'i rgyu //
T02D1186:97b-54: chos kyi sku yi rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1186:97b-55: thim par gyur te the tshom med //
T02D1186:97b-56: de ltar lus kyi rnam dbye bas //
T02D1186:97b-57: dbang byed longs spyod thim pa rnams //
T02D1186:97b-58: gnas 'di rnams su ji ltar bzhin //
T02D1186:98a-2: skye bar byed cing gnas par byed //
T02D1186:98a-3: thim par byed de rim pas so //
T02D1186:98a-4: snga ma 'gags pa ni phyi ma skye ba'o //
T02D1186:98a-5: dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:98a-6: srog gi rtsol ba'i me yis ri bong can ni zhu ba'am btung ba chang ni btung ba'o //
T02D1186:98a-7: mthe bo'i tshigs las gtsug tor du ni nya'i mthar rang sems 'gro ste chos kyi dbang gis so //
T02D1186:98a-8: gtsug tor nas ni sor mo rnams su slar yang 'di 'gro nag po'i phyogs kyi mtha' ru'o //
T02D1186:98a-9: rnal 'byor pa rnams spyod pa gang de nyin zhag
T02D1186:98a-10: so so'i dus su 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster zhes
T02D1186:98a-11: so // de bzhin du dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod par yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:98a-13: rkang pa ya gcig mthil gyis gnon //
T02D1186:98a-14: rkang mthe ba sen mo la gnas pas //
T02D1186:98a-15: tshangs pa'i sgo nga'i rtse mo gnon //
T02D1186:98a-16: don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don //
T02D1186:98a-17: dam pa'i don te 'jigs pa med //
T02D1186:98a-18: rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can //
T02D1186:98a-19: sems dang rnam shes rgyud dang ldan //
T02D1186:98a-20: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1186:98a-21: 'di ni 'chi ba'i mtha' dang skye ba'i mthar rtog pa'i chos gos dag gi'i zhes rigs par bya'o //
T02D1186:98a-22: 'di'i don ni dpal thams cad gsang bar gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:98a-23: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdog pa kun //
T02D1186:98a-24: rang gi sems kyi chos su 'dus //
T02D1186:98a-25: chos kyi bdag med rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1186:98a-27: rang gi sems nyid gsad bya ste //
T02D1186:98a-28: sems nyid kho na gsong byar byed //
T02D1186:98a-29: rang sems nyid ni rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D1186:98a-30: sems nyid rtogs par bya ba yang /
T02D1186:98a-32: gnas rnams nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams //
T02D1186:98a-33: sa bcu rnam par dag pa las //
T02D1186:98a-35: sbyin pas rab dga' rnal 'byor pa'i //
T02D1186:98a-36: tshul khrims ldan pa dri med 'gyur //
T02D1186:98a-37: bzod pas 'ong byed pa ru bstan //
T02D1186:98a-39: bsam gtan las ni mngon gyur dga' //
T02D1186:98a-40: shes rab kyis ni spyad dka' ba //
T02D1186:98a-41: thabs chen ring du song ba'o //
T02D1186:98a-42: stobs dang ldan pa mi g-yor 'gyur //
T02D1186:98a-43: smon lam gyis ni legs pa'i blo //
T02D1186:98a-44: chos kyi sprin ni ye shes ldan //
T02D1186:98b-0: @98b bde gshegs rgyal bas so so ni //
T02D1186:98b-1: rang gis rig bya bcu gcig pa //
T02D1186:98b-4: pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste //
T02D1186:98b-5: pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas //
T02D1186:98b-6: pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste //
T02D1186:98b-7: pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul //
T02D1186:98b-8: mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug ste //
T02D1186:98b-9: sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas //
T02D1186:98b-11: sa bcu shin tu non nas ni //
T02D1186:98b-12: de las rtags ni nges par 'gyur //
T02D1186:98b-13: dpal sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma dra ba sdom par gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:98b-14: rang nyid rtags ni rangs gyur nas //
T02D1186:98b-15: rtag tu chu skyes steng du rtags //
T02D1186:98b-16: rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs byas nas //
T02D1186:98b-17: gdod ma'i rdo rje sems dpa' nga'o //
T02D1186:98b-19: nag po'i phyogs la bcu bzhi pa //
T02D1186:98b-20: de bzhin du'ang brgyad pa la //
T02D1186:98b-22: tshes gcig la sogs brgyad pa dang bcu bzhi pa
T02D1186:98b-23: gnam stong gi mthar thug pa ni nag po'i phyogs
T02D1186:98b-25: cha nyams pa byang chub kyi sems 'pho ba'o //
T02D1186:98b-26: byang chub kyi sems 'phos pa las //
T02D1186:98b-27: 'khor ba'i srid pa'i bar du gnas pa'o //
T02D1186:98b-29: rgyal mtshan mtshon bsnun nyid dang ni //
T02D1186:98b-30: lan bdun pa yang bza' bar bya //
T02D1186:98b-31: zhes pa la rgyal mtshan gyi sgras dro ba rnams kyi tha ma thig les brgyan pa'o //
T02D1186:98b-32: mtshon bsnun zhes pa ye shes kyi mes bsnun pa'o //
T02D1186:98b-33: lan bdun pa zhes pa rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D1186:98b-34: sogs pa drug po bde ba chen po dang lhan
T02D1186:98b-36: gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa bza' bar bya'o zhes pa mi 'pho bar bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1186:98b-37: 'dir brtan par byed pa dpal rtsa ba'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
T02D1186:98b-38: dbang po dang ni yul 'gags shing //
T02D1186:98b-39: dga' ba la sogs skyes pas na //
T02D1186:98b-40: thig le rnams 'dzag zla ba la //
T02D1186:98b-41: ham yig mgo bor yang dag gnas //
T02D1186:98b-43: de ni phyugs chen nyid du bshad //
T02D1186:98b-44: rtse gsum thur du rtsa gsum zug / gang du sbubs su rab tu bstan //
T02D1186:98b-45: skye ba bdun pa'i phyugs nyid ni //
T02D1186:98b-46: mkha' spyod dngos grub sbyin pa po //
T02D1186:98b-47: rgyal ba yis ni nad rnams 'phrog / phung po khams can bzhu ba yis //
T02D1186:98b-48: 'khor los sgyur ba sbyin par byed //
T02D1186:98b-49: dbang po dang ni yul gsad pa //
T02D1186:99a-2: phra la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan //
T02D1186:99a-3: sad pa sogs kyi rjes 'brangs pas //
T02D1186:99a-4: myur du sangs rgyas ster bar byed //
T02D1186:99a-5: ji ltar phyi rol dngul chu bcings //
T02D1186:99a-6: de ltar ye shes bcud 'di yang //
T02D1186:99a-7: de bzhin tshangs pa khyab 'jug phyugs //
T02D1186:99a-8: gsang ba'i 'khor lor btung ba ni //
T02D1186:99a-9: ji srid sreg blugs 'bab pa'i bar //
T02D1186:99a-10: yangs pa'i tshe ni ster bar byed //
T02D1186:99a-11: steng du sgra gcan phyugs su brjod //
T02D1186:99a-12: zla ba nyi ma phyugs chen dag / tshangs pa'i bu gar lhung gyur pa //
T02D1186:99a-13: spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras bu ster //
T02D1186:99a-14: khrag dang chu rgyus de bzhin du //
T02D1186:99a-15: rkang mar 'bad pas btung bar bya //
T02D1186:99a-16: 'di rnams kyang ni phyugs zhes bya //
T02D1186:99a-17: phyi rol gzugs can gzhan phyugs min //
T02D1186:99a-18: skye ba bdun pa phyugs rnams 'dir //
T02D1186:99a-19: kun las mchog gi dbang phyug go //
T02D1186:99a-20: lus la skye bdun ji lta ba //
T02D1186:99a-21: de ltar da ni bshad bya nyon //
T02D1186:99a-22: bza' dang btung ba'i ro rnams kun //
T02D1186:99a-23: zos dang mthungs pa rnam pa drug / smin ma las ni bcu 'gyur te //
T02D1186:99a-24: de de'i skye ba dang po'o //
T02D1186:99a-25: phyi nas khrag nyid du ni 'gyur //
T02D1186:99a-26: gnyis par gsal bar 'gyur ba yin //
T02D1186:99a-28: zhi ba pags pa nyid du 'gro //
T02D1186:99a-29: lnga par rtsa nyid 'gyur ba yin //
T02D1186:99a-30: drug par rus pa nyid 'gyur ro //
T02D1186:99a-31: bdun par rkang nyid du 'gyur te /
T02D1186:99a-34: nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can //
T02D1186:99a-35: mtshan mo shes rab rab tu bsgrags //
T02D1186:99a-36: ji ltar nyi sogs drag po ste //
T02D1186:99a-37: de ltar zla ba dbu mar 'dod //
T02D1186:99a-38: de ltar nyi zla nyin mtshan gyi //
T02D1186:99a-39: dbye bas nyin mtshan dus zhes brjod //
T02D1186:99a-41: dus kyi 'byung po rnam spro byed //
T02D1186:99a-42: dus kyi skye dgu sdud par byed //
T02D1186:99a-43: dus ni bcom ldan rdo rje can //
T02D1186:99a-44: nyin dang mtshan mo'i ngo bor ldan //
T02D1186:99a-46: skye bo gang dang gang rnams kyi //
T02D1186:99a-47: zhes pa la sogs pa la 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02D1186:99a-48: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phung po dang khams
T02D1186:99a-49: dang skye mched la sogs pa gcig tu 'dres par
T02D1186:99a-50: gyur pa'i sha byang chub kyi sems zhu ba dpral
T02D1186:99a-54: rdo rje nor bu rnams su 'ongs pa bza' bar bya //
T02D1186:99a-55: longs spyad par bya snang ba med par bya'o zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
T02D1186:99b-0: dpal @99b rdo rje rtse mor gsungs pa yang //
T02D1186:99b-2: ming dang gzugs kyis brtags pa ste //
T02D1186:99b-3: skye bo dam pas bsnun nas bza' //
T02D1186:99b-4: dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur //
T02D1186:99b-6: rdo rje thod pa'i sbyor ba las //
T02D1186:99b-7: zhes pa la rdo rje ni mchog tu ma 'phos pa'i go 'phang ste /
T02D1186:99b-8: ki bde ba skyong bar byed do zhes pa thod pa'o //
T02D1186:99b-9: sbyor ba las te gnyis su byar med pa las zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
T02D1186:99b-10: gzhan thams cad drang ba'i don gyis go sla'o zhes
T02D1186:99b-11: pa dpal kye'o rdo rje'i rgyud la rdo rje'i tshig
T02D1186:99b-12: gi snying po bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel du brda'i le'u
T02D1186:99b-15: / da ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi skyes pa dang //
T02D1186:99b-16: skye ba'i rgyu so sor rtogs pa'i ched dang //
T02D1186:99b-17: gnas pa'i rgyu rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir du //
T02D1186:99b-19: nam mkha'i khams su bha ga bsam //
T02D1186:99b-20: dbus su bsgom par bya ba ni //
T02D1186:99b-22: nam mkha'i khams su zhes pa ni padma'i brda'i shes rab bo //
T02D1186:99b-23: bha ga zhes pa ni ye shes kyi brda'i thabs so //
T02D1186:99b-24: sgom pa zhes pa gnyi ga snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
T02D1186:99b-25: 'khor lo zhes pa gnyis po dbyer mi phyed pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis na /
T02D1186:99b-26: bde ba chen po 'khor lo zhes par mngon par brjod par bya'o //
T02D1186:99b-28: mkha' khams su zhes padma la //
T02D1186:99b-29: bha ga zhes pa ye shes bshad //
T02D1186:99b-30: sgom pa zhes bya snyoms 'jug ste /
T02D1186:99b-31: de yi bde ba 'khor lor brjod //
T02D1186:99b-32: lha rnams te 'og nas 'byung ba rnams kyi ji
T02D1186:99b-33: ltar 'byung ba zhes pa rim pa ji lta bar
T02D1186:99b-34: skye ba gsal bar bya ste /
T02D1186:99b-35: sa la sogs pa rlung gi mthar thug pa'i lha rnams gcig nyid de ro mnyam par byed pa'o //
T02D1186:99b-36: rdo rje padma yang dag par sbyor ba'i bde bas
T02D1186:99b-37: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ngo bo gcig pa
T02D1186:99b-38: nyid kyis 'du ba ni 'khor lo zhes pa'o //
T02D1186:99b-39: sgom pa po zhes pa ni kye'o rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1186:99b-40: ji lta ba yang dag pa'i don 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1186:99b-41: gang gsungs pa'i lha'i 'khor lo de ga las 'byung zhes dogs par byas nas gsungs pa /
T02D1186:99b-44: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le'o //
T02D1186:100a-1: zhes pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1186:100a-2: skyon med pa zhes pa rang bzhin brgya drug cu'i snang ba dang bral ba'o //
T02D1186:100a-3: ze 'bru'i ni zhes pa rdo rje dang padma'i ze 'bru'o //
T02D1186:100a-4: gcig ces pa gnyis med pa mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1186:100a-5: gru gsum zhes pa chos 'byung du'o //
T02D1186:100a-6: gzhan brjod min zhes pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje gcig pu kho na'o //
T02D1186:100a-7: de'i dbus su zhes pa nor bu'i nang du gnas pa'o //
T02D1186:100a-8: ro zhes pa lus dang ngag dang sems gcig pa'i sku'o //
T02D1186:100a-9: bco lnga'i cha'i bdag nyid can gyi gdan ni dga'
T02D1186:100a-10: ba bcu drug gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa'i rje
T02D1186:100a-11: btsun gang gi nges pa yin pa'o zhes pa nges
T02D1186:100a-12: pa'i don to // 'dir rab tu rgyas par ston pa ni dpal sambu ta ru gsungs pa'ang /
T02D1186:100a-13: mgo bo med dang mgo bo nyid //
T02D1186:100a-14: n'a da'i mtha' dang gsang padma //
T02D1186:100a-15: cha rnams sna tshogs yi ge rnams //
T02D1186:100a-16: de bzhin nyid du gdan rnams kyang //
T02D1186:100a-17: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni //
T02D1186:100a-18: chos kyi dbyings su rnam par 'phrul //
T02D1186:100a-19: bsdus nas gong bu'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1186:100a-20: rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid 'gyur //
T02D1186:100a-22: dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod par yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:100a-23: 'dod pa chen po bde ba che //
T02D1186:100a-24: dga' ba chen po mgu ba che //
T02D1186:100a-25: gzugs chen lus kyang che ba ste //
T02D1186:100a-26: kha dog che zhing lus bongs che //
T02D1186:100a-27: ming yang che zhing rgya che ba //
T02D1186:100a-28: dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin //
T02D1186:100a-30: chu'i khams dad me'i khams ro mnyam pa mchog gi
T02D1186:100a-31: go 'phang shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi
T02D1186:100a-32: rnal 'byor dbang po dang bcas pa de ni sangs
T02D1186:100a-33: rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan zhes pa'o //
T02D1186:100a-34: 'di las goo r'i la sogs pa rnams su 'gyur zhing //
T02D1186:100a-35: kha dog dbye bas so so gzhan //
T02D1186:100a-36: zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
T02D1186:100a-37: da ni snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la lha'i sa bon gyi yi ge bsams nas /
T02D1186:100a-38: rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sogs pa rnam par dag par byas te /
T02D1186:100a-39: nam mkha'i mthil du ye shes kyi sa bon gyi
T02D1186:100a-40: 'od zer rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang
T02D1186:100a-41: byang chub sems dpa' rnams spros nas de rnams la
T02D1186:100a-44: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D1186:100b-0: gsum @100b la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D1186:100b-1: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D1186:100b-3: bdag nyid kyi dngos po 'bul ba dang /
T02D1186:100b-4: stong pa nyid du dmigs pa sngags pas bya'o //
T02D1186:100b-5: de skad du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:100b-6: 'dir mi mngal nas skyes pa rnams 'chi ba'i dus su /
T02D1186:100b-7: sa yi khams ni chu la thim //
T02D1186:100b-8: chu ni me la thim pa ste //
T02D1186:100b-9: me yang phra ba'i khams la'o //
T02D1186:100b-10: rlung yang sems la rnam par thim //
T02D1186:100b-12: de ltar khams kyi tshogs myur du rnam par nyams pa /
T02D1186:100b-13: nam mkha'i khams rnam pa thams cad pa'i gzugs brnyan
T02D1186:100b-14: yul dang rnam par bral ba dbus kyis la kun
T02D1186:100b-15: gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gzhag par bya'o zhes pa'o
T02D1186:100b-16: // de nas sngags 'di brjod par bya ste //
T02D1186:100b-17: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1186:100b-18: zhes brjod la khams gsum pa rdul phra rab kyi
T02D1186:100b-19: chos nyid las 'das pa stong pa nyid du rnam
T02D1186:100b-20: par bsgom par bya'o zhes pa /
T02D1186:100b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1186:100b-22: de nas chos 'byung nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1186:100b-23: de'i dbus su h'um yig yongs su gyur pa rdo
T02D1186:100b-24: rje'i sa gzhi la sogs pa zhes pa drang ba'i
T02D1186:100b-25: don to // da ni nges pa'i don gsal bar bya ste /
T02D1186:100b-26: rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa yang //
T02D1186:100b-27: rdo rje dang padma'i steng du gnas pa de las
T02D1186:100b-28: nges par byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1186:100b-29: dang rang gi lha'i bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1186:100b-30: du byas nas rdo rje'i tshig gis sngags kyi yi
T02D1186:100b-31: ge bkod de khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas bskyed
T02D1186:100b-32: par bya'o // de'i steng du sngags kho nas de
T02D1186:100b-33: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pas rgyal mchog tu
T02D1186:100b-34: gyur pa nor bu rin po che chen pos spras
T02D1186:100b-35: par bya'o // shing / kha dog sna tshogs pa dril bu 'phyang zhing /
T02D1186:100b-36: rlung gis bskyod pa'i dar dang ldan pa'i ba dan dang /
T02D1186:100b-37: me tog gi phreng ba dang lda ldi dang /
T02D1186:100b-38: do shal dang do shal phyed pa dang //
T02D1186:100b-39: zla bas nye bar mdzes pa rdo rje nor bu'i
T02D1186:100b-40: rtse mo can gyi gzhal yas khang pa bsam par
T02D1186:100b-41: bya'o // gzhal yas khang pa ye shes su //
T02D1186:100b-42: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid can //
T02D1186:100b-43: sems dang ye shes 'dres pa ste //
T02D1186:100b-44: bde ba chen po gsung du gsol //
T02D1186:100b-45: dpal sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mtha' 'gro ma dra ba sdom par gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:101a-2: dam tshig rnams ni dor ba dang //
T02D1186:101a-3: gsang ba'i de nyid mi shes pas //
T02D1186:101a-4: rdo rje sems dpa' grub mi 'gyur //
T02D1186:101a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yang //
T02D1186:101a-7: sra mkhregs dkyil 'khor gsang ba che //
T02D1186:101a-8: nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med //
T02D1186:101a-9: yid mi bde las rnam par grol //
T02D1186:101a-10: rnam par rtog pa 'phrog pa'i mchog / ces so //
T02D1186:101a-12: gcig tu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag /'gro ba'i bdag po 'phral du skyes //
T02D1186:101a-14: nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das //
T02D1186:101a-15: zla ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor sdug / sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan 'dir //
T02D1186:101a-16: a'a li'i gzugs las rab 'jug go //
T02D1186:101a-18: bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yon tan gyi khyad par ci lta bu lags /
T02D1186:101a-19: dpal gsang ba'i dbang po'i thig ler gsungs pa /
T02D1186:101a-20: yan lag thams cad sgom las 'das //
T02D1186:101a-21: rtogs pas brtag pa rnam par spangs //
T02D1186:101a-22: phyi mo thig le cha las 'das //
T02D1186:101a-25: dpal dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:101a-26: nyi ma'i steng du zla ba'i dbus su h'um yig zla ba'i mtshan ma lta bu'o //
T02D1186:101a-27: de bzhin du rdul gyi steng du byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1186:101a-28: byang chub kyi sems kyi dbus su kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dri za'i sems can no //
T02D1186:101a-29: de nas me long la sogs pa rnam pa lnga rnams kyis zhes pa ni /
T02D1186:101a-30: de la zla ba byang chub kyi sems dbyangs dang
T02D1186:101a-31: ldan pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te
T02D1186:101a-32: / gzugs kyi phung po skyed par byed pa rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1186:101a-33: nyi ma dang rdul gsal byed dang ldan pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
T02D1186:101a-34: tshor ba'i phung po skyed par byed pa rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D1186:101a-35: dri za'i sems can h'um yig dang ldan pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te /
T02D1186:101a-36: 'du shes kyi phung po skyed par byed pa 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1186:101a-37: 'di rnams gcig pa nyid srog gi rlung ham yig
T02D1186:101a-38: dang ldan pa ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes
T02D1186:101a-39: te / 'du byed kyi phung po skyed par byed pa don yod grub pa'o //
T02D1186:101a-40: de nas sku thams cad kyi cha shas yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1186:101a-41: rnam par shes pa ham yig dang ldan pa ni
T02D1186:101a-42: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes te
T02D1186:101b-0: / rnam @101b par shes pa'i phung po skyed par
T02D1186:101b-1: byed pa mi bskyod pa'o zhes pa phyi rol dang
T02D1186:101b-2: nang du ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1186:101b-3: 'di rnams gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa ni sa bon te /
T02D1186:101b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' 'o zhes so //
T02D1186:101b-6: dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u bcu par gsungs pa /
T02D1186:101b-8: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ston pa'o //
T02D1186:101b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1186:101b-10: gzugs ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
T02D1186:101b-11: rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes
T02D1186:101b-12: dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes bsam gyis
T02D1186:101b-13: mi khyab pa'o // rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi
T02D1186:101b-14: khyab pa'o zhes kyang 'du shes pa med na shes
T02D1186:101b-15: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do
T02D1186:101b-16: mi khyab pa'o // // rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
T02D1186:101b-19: rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o zhes
T02D1186:101b-20: kyang 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha
T02D1186:101b-21: rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes so //
T02D1186:101b-22: da ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa gsal bar bya ste /
T02D1186:101b-23: rdo rje ni mchog tu bde ba'i ye shes byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1186:101b-24: sems dpa' ni rnam pa thams cad pa'i shes rab kyi gzugs brnyan no //
T02D1186:101b-25: ye shes dang rnam par shes pas byin gyis brlabs
T02D1186:101b-26: pa sgrib pa med pa gcig tu 'dres par gyur
T02D1186:101b-28: 'gro ba'i don byed pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa'o //
T02D1186:101b-29: de'i gdan 'di ni rdo rje sems pa'i gdan te /
T02D1186:101b-31: aa sogs ka sogs mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1186:101b-32: rdo rje sems dpa'i gdan du dang //
T02D1186:101b-33: 'gyur med las byung gong bu la //
T02D1186:101b-34: h'um phat yi ge mi 'dod do //
T02D1186:101b-36: 'gyur med 'di yis bskyed cing 'gyur ba nyams par 'gyur ba mchog gi dbang po can //
T02D1186:101b-37: zhes pa la 'gyur ba ni skye ba dang 'jig
T02D1186:101b-38: pa'i gnas skabs kyi mtshan nyid can te 'pho ba'i
T02D1186:101b-39: skad cig go // de gang la 'gags par gyur
T02D1186:101b-40: pa de ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba 'pho ba
T02D1186:101b-42: de nyid rdo rje ye shes zhes pa'o //
T02D1186:101b-43: dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod par gsungs pa yang //
T02D1186:101b-44: gsang sngags skye gnas 'gyur ba med //
T02D1186:101b-45: gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa //
T02D1186:101b-46: gsang sngags don kun skyed pa po //
T02D1186:101b-47: thig le chen po 'gyur ba med //
T02D1186:102a-1: dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su gsungs pa /
T02D1186:102a-2: gang gi bde ba'i dbang po skyed cing nyin zhag so so'i dbang las gang gis mngal nas byung //
T02D1186:102a-3: skad cig gang gis 'gyur ba rnam par bral ba grub cing g-yo ba med gyur pa //
T02D1186:102a-4: sangs rgyas bya ba de spangs nas ni bde mnyam dang bral stong pa gzhan gang sgom byed pa //
T02D1186:102a-5: de yi bskal pa bye ba du ma rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid dang lhan skyes bde ba'ang ring //
T02D1186:102a-7: dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa le'u bcu gcig par gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:102a-9: blo chung ba de rnams 'jig rten pa dang 'jig
T02D1186:102a-10: rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams yang dag par ji
T02D1186:102a-11: lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa'i rtsa ba
T02D1186:102a-12: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spangs shing
T02D1186:102a-13: dor nas yal ga la 'ju bar bya bar sems
T02D1186:102a-14: so // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
T02D1186:102a-15: khyi ni jo bo'i gan nas zan spangs nas las
T02D1186:102a-16: byed pa'i gan nas zan kham tshol bar sems te
T02D1186:102a-17: / rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus
T02D1186:102a-18: na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag
T02D1186:102a-20: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams
T02D1186:102a-21: cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rtsa ba bor nas
T02D1186:102a-23: lo mar gyur pa'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
T02D1186:102a-24: kyi theg pa la snying po sangs rgyas nyid tshol
T02D1186:102a-27: sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan las byung ba //
T02D1186:102a-28: dkyil 'khor dbang po rnam par sgom //
T02D1186:102a-29: bu bzhin zhal dang mtshan ma sogs //
T02D1186:102a-30: zla ba chu shel nor bu'i 'od //
T02D1186:102a-32: zla ba chu shel kun rdzob byang chub sems ni kun da dang /
T02D1186:102a-33: zla ba dang 'dra ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1186:102a-34: nor bu'i 'od ces pa nor bu'i nang du rab
T02D1186:102a-35: tu snang ba spros pa thams cad las rnam par
T02D1186:102a-36: grol ba lhan cig skyes pa'i sku bde ba chen
T02D1186:102a-37: po'i mtshan nyid can zhes pa'o //
T02D1186:102a-38: dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod par yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:102a-39: dngos don ma lus rnams la dga' //
T02D1186:102a-40: stong pa nyid dga' blo yi mchog / srid pa'i 'dod chags sogs las 'das //
T02D1186:102a-41: srid gsum dga' ba chen po pa //
T02D1186:102a-42: sprin dkar dag pa shin tu dkar //
T02D1186:102b-0: de nyid kyi phyir rang nyid las @102b phyag dang
T02D1186:102b-1: zhal dang dbyibs med pa'i phyir bu bzhin zhes brjod
T02D1186:102b-3: rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las //
T02D1186:102b-4: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' sgom //
T02D1186:102b-5: rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa //
T02D1186:102b-6: zla ba'i kha dog mtshungs pa'i 'od //
T02D1186:102b-8: zla ba'i kha dog nyid ci lta bu zhe na //
T02D1186:102b-9: dpal sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma dra ba sdom par gsungs pa /
T02D1186:102b-10: mchog tu mi 'gyur dag pa'i phyir //
T02D1186:102b-11: chos kun rnam par dag pa las //
T02D1186:102b-12: gsang ba'i de nyid dag phyir yang //
T02D1186:102b-13: rdo rje 'dzin de zla ba'i mdog / ces so //
T02D1186:102b-15: yid mi bde las rnam par grol //
T02D1186:102b-16: rnam par rtog pa'i rab rib bcom //
T02D1186:102b-17: nyon mongs dri ma kun dag pa //
T02D1186:102b-18: zla ba 'dra ba'i sems zla ba //
T02D1186:102b-20: de ltar de ma thag tu bshad pa'i yan lag
T02D1186:102b-21: so so dang ldan pa'i lha mo'i 'khor lo gsungs
T02D1186:102b-22: pa / 'di las goo r'i la sogs 'gyur //
T02D1186:102b-24: de skad du 'di nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1186:102b-25: byang chub sems ni zla bar 'gyur //
T02D1186:102b-26: bco lnga'i cha yi bdag nyid can //
T02D1186:102b-27: bde ba chen po a'a li'i gzugs //
T02D1186:102b-28: rnal 'byor ma rnams de yi cha //
T02D1186:102b-30: dbang po rdo rje gshin rje dkar //
T02D1186:102b-31: chu ru chu yi rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1186:102b-32: lus ngan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1186:102b-33: dbus su bdag med rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1186:102b-35: goo r'i chom rkun ro langs ma /
T02D1186:102b-37: bde bzhin ri khrod gdol pa mo //
T02D1186:102b-38: g-yung mo brgyad pa gang bar byed //
T02D1186:102b-39: 'og ldan ma dang steng ldan nyid //
T02D1186:102b-40: mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod brjod //
T02D1186:102b-41: srid dang myang 'das ngo bo yis //
T02D1186:102b-42: snying rje chen po 'di dag gnas //
T02D1186:102b-43: lha mo 'di rnams thams cad ni //
T02D1186:102b-44: kha dog nag mo drag chen mo //
T02D1186:102b-45: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1186:102b-46: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa //
T02D1186:102b-47: yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs can kun //
T02D1186:102b-48: ji ltar bdag med rnal 'byor ltar //
T02D1186:102b-49: g-yon na rnal 'byor lhung bzed de //
T02D1186:102b-50: kha tv'am ga yang steng du gnas //
T02D1186:102b-51: g-yas pas rdo rje gri gug ste //
T02D1186:102b-52: ro la zhon pa gzi brjid 'bar //
T02D1186:102b-53: lhan cig skyes dga' dga' ba'o //
T02D1186:102b-54: zhes pa drang ba'i don to //
T02D1186:102b-55: da ni nges pa'i don gsal bar bya ste /
T02D1186:102b-56: dpal phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa /
T02D1186:103a-0: 'dir tshes gcig la sogs pa'i tshes dkar po'i lnga pa rnams bdag @103a * //
T02D1186:103a-1: med ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams te /
T02D1186:103a-2: phung po lnga rnam par dag pas dang po dga' ba'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1186:103a-3: de bzhin du drug pa la sogs pa bcu pa
T02D1186:103a-4: ji srid pa'i tshes lnga rnams goo r'i la sogs
T02D1186:103a-6: khams lnga rnam par dag pas gnyis pa mchog tu dga' ba'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1186:103a-7: de bzhin du bcu gcig pa la sogs pa nya'i
T02D1186:103a-8: mthar thug pa tshes lnga rnams ri khrod ma la
T02D1186:103a-9: sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma lnga rnams te /
T02D1186:103a-10: yul lnga rnam par dag pas gsum pa khyad par dga' ba'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1186:103a-11: de'i mthar lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba bcom ldan 'das kye'i rdo rje stong pa las /
T02D1186:103a-12: stong pa byang chub kyi cha bcu drug pa'o zhes pa dbang bskur gyi don to //
T02D1186:103a-13: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1186:103a-14: dang po dga' ba rab tu bshad //
T02D1186:103a-15: mchog tu dga' ba gnyis pa ste /
T02D1186:103a-16: khyad dga'i dga' ba gsum pa'o //
T02D1186:103a-17: lhag ma lhan cig skyes dga' 'o //
T02D1186:103a-18: zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa dbang bskur gyi don to //
T02D1186:103a-19: 'dir lha mo lnga lnga'i 'khor lo gsum gyi mthar
T02D1186:103a-20: bzhi pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba byang chub
T02D1186:103a-21: kyi sems kyi cha bcu drug pa 'jig rten kun
T02D1186:103a-22: rdzob tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so zhes pa'o
T02D1186:103a-23: // dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod par yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:103a-24: rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med //
T02D1186:103a-25: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le 'chang //
T02D1186:103a-26: cha med cha las 'das pa ste //
T02D1186:103a-27: bsam gtan bzhi po'i mtha' 'chang ba //
T02D1186:103a-29: 'di kho na dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje'i tshig tu bshad par bya ste /
T02D1186:103a-30: rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med //
T02D1186:103a-31: ces pa ni rgyu ste sngar brjod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan zhes pa'o //
T02D1186:103a-32: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le 'chang //
T02D1186:103a-33: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems zhu ba thig le bzhi 'dzin pa'o zhes pa 'bras bu'o //
T02D1186:103a-34: cha med pa ni cha bco lnga'i mthar gnas pa'o //
T02D1186:103a-35: cha las 'das pa ni nag po'i tshes gcig la
T02D1186:103a-36: sogs pa la zhugs pa ma yin pa'o zhes pa'i
T02D1186:103a-37: don to // bsam gtan bzhi pa'i mtha' 'chang ba //
T02D1186:103a-38: zhes pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i mtha'
T02D1186:103a-39: 'chang ba'o zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o
T02D1186:103a-40: // de'i phyir drod [?] po dga' ba'i bde ba'i bsam gtan no //
T02D1186:103b-0: gnyis pa mchog tu dga' ba'i bde @103b ba'i bsam gtan no //
T02D1186:103b-1: gsum pa khyad par du rangs pa'i bde ba'i bsam gtan no //
T02D1186:103b-2: bzhi pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i bde ba'i bsam gtan te /
T02D1186:103b-3: lnga pa dang bcu pa dang nya gang ba dang /
T02D1186:103b-4: nya'i mthar thig le la mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba ni bsam gtan gnas pa'o /
T02D1186:103b-5: de'i mtha' ni rtse mo'i cha bde ba yongs su
T02D1186:103b-6: gang ba nyid bsam gtan gyi mtha' ste de 'dzin
T02D1186:103b-7: pas na / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo 'chang //
T02D1186:103b-9: da ni yan lag drug sgom zhes pa la sogs pa la 'di'i don 'di yin te /
T02D1186:103b-10: rgyud ni rgyud gzhan gyis rtogs bya //
T02D1186:103b-11: zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1186:103b-12: de ltar na rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa des na
T02D1186:103b-13: yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor 'di bsgom par bya
T02D1186:103b-14: ste / so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang //
T02D1186:103b-15: srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang //
T02D1186:103b-16: rjes su dran dang ting nge 'dzin //
T02D1186:103b-18: 'dir so sor sdud ces bya ba ni phyi rol
T02D1186:103b-19: gyi gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams la mig la
T02D1186:103b-20: sogs pa'i dbang po rnams kyi mig gi rnam par
T02D1186:103b-22: nang gi yul rnams la lha'i mig la sogs pa'i
T02D1186:103b-23: dbang po rnams kyi lha'i mig gi rnam par shes
T02D1186:103b-24: pa la sogs rnams 'jug pa ste /
T02D1186:103b-25: nang du stong ba nyid la dmigs pas ma brtags
T02D1186:103b-26: par dngos po thams cad mthong ba stong pa nyid
T02D1186:103b-27: so sor snang ba phra [?] phab na gzhon nu
