T02D1186:107a-5: gal te dngos po ma dag yod min yang //
T02D1186:107a-6: de lta na yang rgyal ba rnams kyis sbyong //
T02D1186:107a-7: kun rdzob bden pa brten pa'i 'khor lo yi //
T02D1186:107a-8: chos nyid ngo bo rnam par bsgoms pa tsam //
T02D1186:107a-9: chos las dngos po yang dag rnam par dben //
T02D1186:107a-10: gang zag thams cad rnam spangs 'jig rten te //
T02D1186:107a-11: 'jig rten 'gro ba bsam par nus ma yin //
T02D1186:107a-12: chos nyid ngo bor thams cad rnam par dag / gsungs pa yang //
T02D1186:107a-13: rnam par dag pa bdag med chos //
T02D1186:107a-14: yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang //
T02D1186:107a-17: dril sogs pa'i yul de rnams gzhan yin la /
T02D1186:107a-18: rna ba la sogs pa'i yul can de rnams gzhan yin zhing /
T02D1186:107a-19: ngag dang lag pa la sogs pa'i rnams gzhan dang
T02D1186:107a-20: las kyi dbang po'i bya ba la sogs pa rnams
T02D1186:107a-22: thams cad du ni phyag zhabs sogs //
T02D1186:107a-23: kun du spyan dang dbu dang zhal //
T02D1186:107a-24: kun du thos ldan 'jig rten du //
T02D1186:107a-25: thams cad khyab par byas te bzhugs //
T02D1186:107a-26: rdo rje sems dpa' 'o zhes so //
T02D1186:107a-28: bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa //
T02D1186:107a-29: kun la phan pa'i gang zag mchog /'jig rten dpe las 'das pa ste //
T02D1186:107a-30: shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog / ces so //
T02D1186:107a-31: phyag bcu drug rnam par dag pas stong pa nyid
T02D1186:107a-32: bcu drug rnams so zhes pa 'dir nges pa'i don
T02D1186:107a-33: ni dpal dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od du yang
T02D1186:107a-34: gsungs pa / bcu drug phyed phyed thig le 'dzin
T02D1186:107a-35: pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa dang 'dir stong
T02D1186:107a-36: pa nyid ni phung po lnga stong pa nyid de
T02D1186:107a-37: gsungs pa / / nag po'i tshes gcig la sogs pa tshes lnga rnams nang stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1186:107a-39: phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1186:107a-40: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1186:107a-41: chen po stong pa nyid ces pa'o //
T02D1186:107a-42: khams lnga stong pa nyid ni drug pa la sogs pa'i tshes lnga rnams te /
T02D1186:107a-43: don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1186:107a-45: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1186:107a-46: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1186:107a-47: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnams so zhes pa'o //
T02D1186:107a-48: dbang po lnga stong pa nyid ni bcu gcig pa la sogs pa tshes lnga rnams te /
T02D1186:107a-49: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1186:107b-0: rang bzhin @107b stong pa nyid dang //
T02D1186:107b-1: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1186:107b-2: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1186:107b-3: dngos po med pa'i stong pa nyid ces pa'o //
T02D1186:107b-4: gnam stong gi mthar thug pa nyid bco lnga rnams so //
T02D1186:107b-5: dkar po'i tshes gcig 'jug pa'i dus su de dag
T02D1186:107b-6: gi dbus su stong pa nyid bcu drug pa dngos
T02D1186:107b-7: po med pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa
T02D1186:107b-8: thams cad pa'o // de bzhin du snying rje rnam
T02D1186:107b-9: pa gsum ste 'di dag gcig pa nyid stong pa
T02D1186:107b-10: nyid bcu drug dang snying rje bcu drug gi bdag
T02D1186:107b-11: nyid can gyi brjod par bya ba phyag bcu drug
T02D1186:107b-12: pa rnams kyi rnam par dag pa'o zhes pa nges
T02D1186:107b-13: thams cad pa'o // pa'i don to // zhabs bzhi
T02D1186:107b-14: zhes pa bdud bzhi rnam par dag pa las te
T02D1186:107b-15: thams cad pa'o // pa'i don to // / gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:107b-16: sems can rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang sems dang
T02D1186:107b-17: ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi rnam pa ni bdud
T02D1186:107b-18: bzhi rnams te / de rnams la lus kyi sgrib pa ni phung po'i bdud do //
T02D1186:107b-19: ngag gi sgrib pa ni nyon mongs pa'i bdud do //
T02D1186:107b-20: sems kyi sgrib pa ni 'chi bdag gi bdud do //
T02D1186:107b-21: phyi rol du ma rig pa 'jug pa ni lha'i bu'i bdud ste zhes so //
T02D1186:107b-22: dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod par gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:107b-23: dpa' bo bdud dgra bdud las rgyal //
T02D1186:107b-24: bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa mthar byed pa //
T02D1186:107b-25: bdud kyi dpung kun pham par byed //
T02D1186:107b-28: zhal rnams rnam par thar pa brgyad //
T02D1186:107b-30: dpal mngon par brjod pa phyi mar gsungs pa /
T02D1186:107b-31: gzugs can gzugs la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o //
T02D1186:107b-32: nang gzugs med pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams lta ba ni gnyis pa'o //
T02D1186:107b-33: sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum
T02D1186:107b-34: du byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so zhes
T02D1186:107b-35: pa gsum pa'o // nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ni bzhi pa'o //
T02D1186:107b-36: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched ni lnga pa'o //
T02D1186:107b-37: ci yang med pa'i skye mched ni drug pa'o //
T02D1186:107b-38: 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched ni bdun pa'o //
T02D1186:107b-39: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni brgyad pa ste /
T02D1186:107b-40: rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pas zhal rnams so //
T02D1186:107b-41: rdo rje gsum gyi dag pa'i spyan //
T02D1186:107b-42: zhes pa la gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:107b-43: sprul pa yis ni rtag tu skye //
T02D1186:107b-44: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i byed rgyu gnas //
T02D1186:107b-45: chos kyi sku yi rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1186:108a-2: de bzhin du 'di nyid du yang gsungs pa //
T02D1186:108a-3: gang dang gang gis 'jig rten 'ching 'gyur ba //
T02D1186:108a-4: de dang des ni 'ching ba las grol te //
T02D1186:108a-5: 'jig rten rmongs pa de nyid ma rtogs pa //
T02D1186:108a-6: de nyid rnams spangs dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02D1186:108a-7: de phyir dri med sgra med gzugs nyid med //
T02D1186:108a-8: ro yang med de sems ni rnam par dag /
T02D1186:108a-9: reg med chos med thams cad rnam par dag /
T02D1186:108a-10: rang bzhin dag pa'i 'gro la 'gro bar shes /
T02D1186:108a-11: zhes pa dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud du rdo rje'i
T02D1186:108a-12: tshig gi snying po bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel du rnam
T02D1186:108a-13: par dag pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o /
T02D1186:108a-16: // / da ni dkyil 'khor med par dbang bskur sbyin par mi bya zhing /
T02D1186:108a-17: dbang bskur ba med pa la de kho na nyid gsal bar bya ba ma yin no zhes pas /
T02D1186:108a-18: dkyil 'khor sngon du 'gro ba'i dbang bskur ba'i le'u
T02D1186:108a-19: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa mdor bsdus te
T02D1186:108a-22: rgyud ni rgyud gzhan gyis rtogs bya //
T02D1186:108a-23: zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1186:108a-24: lha'i bdag nyid can zhes pa la gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:108a-25: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa dang
T02D1186:108a-26: lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba gcig tu 'dres par
T02D1186:108a-27: gyur pa'i bdag nyid can mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i
T02D1186:108a-28: bde ba ni lha zhes mngon par brjod par bya'o
T02D1186:108a-29: // dkyil 'khor bri ba'i sa bzhi gsungs pa /
T02D1186:108a-30: skyed mos tshal zhes pa la sogs pa ste //
T02D1186:108a-31: skyed mos tshal yid du 'ong ba dga' ba'i gnas
T02D1186:108a-32: sku dang gsungs dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bdag
T02D1186:108a-33: nyid can chos 'byung gi nang du son pa stong
T02D1186:108a-34: pa nyid dang snying rje bcu drug rnam par dag
T02D1186:108a-35: pas so zhes pa dkyil 'khor gyi gnas nges pa'o
T02D1186:108a-36: // ro dang dri rnams thams cad dang ldan mtha' dag yon tan gter zhes pa //
T02D1186:108a-37: nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid can du rnal 'byor
T02D1186:108a-38: pas rig par bya'o zhes pa sa'i mtshan nyid nges
T02D1186:108a-39: pa'o // rdo rje'i thig dang yang ldan //
T02D1186:108a-40: zhes pa la sogs pa la gsungs pa yang //
T02D1186:108a-41: zla ba khu ba'i cha dbye bas //
T02D1186:108a-42: rdo rje'i thig ni btab pa la //
T02D1186:108a-43: yang yang cha ru phye ba yis //
T02D1186:108a-44: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02D1186:108a-45: sku dang gsung dang thugs gcig tu gyur pa'i chos
T02D1186:108a-46: rnams thams cad rnam pa gcig pas rdo rje sems
T02D1186:108b-0: dpa' nga rdo rje'i @108b sa gzhi la thig 'debs
T02D1186:108b-1: par byed do // aom a'a: h'um phat /
T02D1186:108b-2: gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod par yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:108b-3: dang po sngags kyi mchog gis ni //
T02D1186:108b-4: nam mkha' thig gdab byas nas su //
T02D1186:108b-5: de nas rnal 'byor chen pos thig / gsang ba'i ma ma'i dkyil 'khor gdab //
T02D1186:108b-7: dpal bde ba rtogs par byed pa yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:108b-9: thabs ni bde ba'i sdom pa ste //
T02D1186:108b-10: sangs rgyas nga rgyal rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1186:108b-11: sangs rgyas yun mi ring bar 'gyur //
T02D1186:108b-12: gang tshe sems ni legs gnas pa //
T02D1186:108b-13: de bzhin nyid rnams spyod yul te //
T02D1186:108b-14: chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1186:108b-15: gdod nas dag cing rnyog pa med //
T02D1186:108b-16: dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid gyur par //
T02D1186:108b-17: phan pa 'dod pas shes par bya //
T02D1186:108b-18: phung po skye mched sogs tshogs kyis //
T02D1186:108b-19: gang zhig bye brag kha bsgyur dang //
T02D1186:108b-20: lus ngag yid gsum kha bsgyur phyir //
T02D1186:108b-21: rdul tshon dkyil 'khor zhes byar gsungs //
T02D1186:108b-22: phung po la sogs ston pas na //
T02D1186:108b-23: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes par bshad //
T02D1186:108b-24: sems kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa ste //
T02D1186:108b-25: rang bzhin med las bsgom par bya //
T02D1186:108b-26: dang po'i grva ni rtogs byed pa //
T02D1186:108b-28: so sor rtog par zhes bshad pa //
T02D1186:108b-29: lho phyogs grva yis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1186:108b-30: bya ba sgrub par byed pa mchog / nub kyi grva yis rnam par gsal //
T02D1186:108b-31: mnyam nyid zhes pa ye shes che //
T02D1186:108b-32: byang gi grva yis rjes song bdag / de ltar grva bzhi pa can ni //
T02D1186:108b-33: ye shes spyod yul brtags pa yin //
T02D1186:108b-34: 'di ltar de nyid rab zhugs pas //
T02D1186:108b-35: kun du grva yi dbus su'o //
T02D1186:108b-36: sgo bzhi par yang brjod pa ni //
T02D1186:108b-37: dran pa bzhi po rtag 'byung ba'o //
T02D1186:108b-38: de bzhin zur bzhir bshad pa ni //
T02D1186:108b-39: sbyin pa bzhi po rnam dag las //
T02D1186:108b-40: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor ngo bo ni //
T02D1186:108b-41: mi bskyod rnam par brgyan pa'o //
T02D1186:108b-42: dkyil 'khor rtag tu zhi ba ste //
T02D1186:108b-43: zhi ba'i chos don rgyan byed phyir //
T02D1186:108b-44: dra ba dra phyed zla ba sogs //
T02D1186:108b-45: gang zhig dkyil 'khor du bris dang //
T02D1186:108b-46: rta babs la sogs thams cad rnams //
T02D1186:108b-47: de rnams ting 'dzin yang dag nges //
T02D1186:108b-48: rta babs sems kyi mthar thug pa //
T02D1186:108b-49: de nyid rang bzhin las gsungs yin //
T02D1186:108b-50: sems ni gang zhig rab 'jug pa //
T02D1186:109a-2: de ni dra ba zhes par brjod //
T02D1186:109a-3: de yi phyed pas dra ba phyed //
T02D1186:109a-4: dril bu dra bar yang dag gnas //
T02D1186:109a-5: rang gi sgra sgrogs go byed pa //
T02D1186:109a-6: chos rnams sgra brnyan lta bur ni //
T02D1186:109a-7: so sor rtogs par byed pa'o //
T02D1186:109a-8: dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:109a-10: koo shi ka 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1186:109a-11: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D1186:109a-12: phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pas chos rnams thams
T02D1186:109a-13: cad sgra brnyan lta bu'o zhes rab tu shes so
T02D1186:109a-14: // de las kyang de rnams mi sems yang dag
T02D1186:109a-15: par rjes su mi mthong mi shes yang dag par
T02D1186:109a-16: // mi shes te / chos de rnams kyang yod
T02D1186:109a-17: pa ma yin la yang dag par rig pa ma
T02D1186:109a-18: yin te mi dmigs so zhes so //
T02D1186:109a-19: de gal te 'di ltar gnas na shes rab kyi
T02D1186:109a-20: pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes so
T02D1186:109a-21: // rgyal mtshan phreng bar de bshad nyid //
T02D1186:109a-22: chos rnams skye med ston pa'i phyir //
T02D1186:109a-23: gang tshe sems ni rgya che zhing //
T02D1186:109a-24: dngos po la sogs ma gos pa //
T02D1186:109a-25: sems ni bla rer bshad pa yin //
T02D1186:109a-26: dam pa'i don ni brjod pa las //
T02D1186:109a-27: phreng ba gos ni de thams cad //
T02D1186:109a-28: sna tshogs la sogs snang ba las //
T02D1186:109a-29: rdo rje'i rnam par gang zhig sems //
T02D1186:109a-30: dga' ba'i ye shes kyis mtshan pa //
T02D1186:109a-31: don des rtag tu brjod pa ni //
T02D1186:109a-33: zur gyi cha ni thams cad dang /
T02D1186:109a-34: sgo dang sgo khyung mtshams rnams su //
T02D1186:109a-35: rdo rje rin chen gyis spras pa //
T02D1186:109a-36: rdo rje rin chen rtogs pa las //
T02D1186:109a-37: zla ba nyi mar gang brjod pa //
T02D1186:109a-38: shes rab thabs don ston pa las //
T02D1186:109a-39: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin sems //
T02D1186:109a-40: ye shes 'di rnams kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1186:109a-41: dkyil 'khor brjod pa de nyid ni //
T02D1186:109a-42: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje skyes //
T02D1186:109a-43: sku gsung thugs ni nye ba las //
T02D1186:109a-44: rnam pa gcig pa mtshan nyid med //
T02D1186:109a-45: de nyid rab tu 'jug pa brjod //
T02D1186:109a-46: bla ma slob ma dag la gsal //
T02D1186:109a-48: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gror yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:109a-49: dkyil 'khor ji lta de ltar ni //
T02D1186:109a-50: su yis yongs su brtags par nus //
T02D1186:109a-51: rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas //
T02D1186:109a-53: zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
T02D1186:109a-54: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1186:109b-0: rta babs @109b bzhi yis brgyan byas pa //
T02D1186:109b-1: do shal do shal phyed pa la //
T02D1186:109b-2: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1186:109b-3: 'di thams cad drang ba'i don gyis go sla'o //
T02D1186:109b-5: sngags kyi tshul 'dir slob ma rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1186:109b-6: gcig ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub sgrub pa don du gnyer ba dang /
T02D1186:109b-7: gnyis pa 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa don du gnyer ba'o //
T02D1186:109b-8: gang phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub sgrub pa don
T02D1186:109b-9: du gnyer ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi lam
T02D1186:109b-10: bsgom pa'i don du bum pa dang /
T02D1186:109b-11: gsang ba la sogs pa'i dbang bskur gyis yang dag par gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1186:109b-12: gang 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i don du gnyer ba ni sngags dang /
T02D1186:109b-13: phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sgom pa don du gnyer ba ste /
T02D1186:109b-14: dbang bskur gyis yang dag par gzung bar bya ste /
T02D1186:109b-15: 'bring po bsod nams kyi rgyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02D1186:109b-16: tha ma ni dbang bskur gyis yang dag par gzung bar bya ba ma yin te /
T02D1186:109b-17: dge bsnyen gyi bslab par yang dag par gzung bar bya'o zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1186:109b-19: slob ma dam pa mnyes gshin gus //
T02D1186:109b-20: bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D1186:109b-21: rtse gcig gyur pa'i yid ldan bas //
T02D1186:109b-22: dbang bskur don du gsol ba gdab //
T02D1186:109b-23: thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni //
T02D1186:109b-24: lus btud nas ni spyan sngar 'dug //
T02D1186:109b-25: bdag la phan dang bdag don ched //
T02D1186:109b-26: khyab bdag bdag la thugs brtse bas //
T02D1186:109b-27: sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i //
T02D1186:109b-28: byang chub ji ltar bdag 'thob par //
T02D1186:109b-29: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan ston //
T02D1186:109b-30: dam tshig chen po'i de nyid mkhyen //
T02D1186:109b-31: dbang po bsam pa mkhyen pa'i mchog /'gro ba'i bla mas bstan du gsol //
T02D1186:109b-33: bdag gi bsam pa brtan pos gzung //
T02D1186:109b-34: mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyi //
T02D1186:109b-36: he ru ka dpal dbang bskur ni //
T02D1186:109b-37: 'gro ba bskyab pa'i sems ched du //
T02D1186:109b-38: ji ltar rdo rje sems dpas byin //
T02D1186:109b-39: de ltar deng 'dir bdag la stsol //
T02D1186:109b-40: zhes gsol ba btab pa'i slob ma lha'i rnal 'byor
T02D1186:109b-41: sngon du 'gro bas slob ma bzhugs pa'i rim pas
T02D1186:109b-42: rang nyid zhugs nas yol ba'i phyi rol du yon
T02D1186:109b-43: phul ba / don dam shin tu rol pa'i bdag / phyag rgya lnga dang ldan dag pa //
T02D1186:110a-2: lha mo gdugs mchog bslang ste 'dzin //
T02D1186:110a-3: cang te'u brel ba'i lag pa can //
T02D1186:110a-4: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs kyis //
T02D1186:110a-5: bskor zhing dbus na gnas pa la //
T02D1186:110a-6: glu la sogs dang bkra shis kyis //
T02D1186:110a-7: 'bad pas mchod par byas nas so //
T02D1186:110a-8: de'i rjes su dbang bskur ba'i skal pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnams /
T02D1186:110a-9: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su dmigs pa la /
T02D1186:110a-10: a'a: kham [?] w'a ra h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis
T02D1186:110a-11: me tog gi phreng ba gzung ba'i mig dar bcings

T02D1186:110b-4: khyod kyis nga la yang brnyas par mi bya ste /

T02D1186:112a-36: shes rab gdong ni bcing byas te //

T02D1186:116a-49: de ltar dbang po rnon po rnams kyis dga' ba
T02D1186:116b-0: bzhi'i rim pas bzhi pa'i @116b don shes par bya'o
T02D1186:116b-1: // dpal thams cad mkhyen pa 'jigs byed kyi rgyud du gsungs pa yang //

T02D1186:116b-5: phreng ba lda ldi me tog dang //
T02D1186:116b-6: cod pan mchil lha ma ral gri ni //

T02D1186:116b-9: rnam rtog med pa'i sems kyis ni //

T02D1186:116b-12: slar yang rin gyis slu bar bya //
T02D1186:116b-13: gzhan du ltung bar byed par 'gyur //
T02D1186:116b-14: sangs rgyas rnams dang bla ma dang //
T02D1186:116b-15: rdo rje spun la mchog tu dad //
T02D1186:116b-16: lus ngag sems gyi bya ba ste //
T02D1186:116b-17: de tshe rgyud kyi rgyal po nyon //

T02D1186:116b-20: tshig gi snying po bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel du dbang
T02D1186:116b-21: bskur ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o /

T02D1186:116b-25: rtag tu ltung bar byed par brjod //
T02D1186:116b-26: ces pa la sogs pa dang /

T02D1186:116b-28: bum pa can gyis dbang du byed //
T02D1186:116b-29: dgang ba yis kyang dgug pa'o //
T02D1186:116b-30: zhi ba can gyis rengs par byed //
T02D1186:116b-31: ces pa la sogs pa de ltung bar byed pa la sogs pa'i lta stangs sgrub pa'i ched dang /
T02D1186:116b-32: dpal theg pa chen po la gzhug pa'i ched du'o //

T02D1186:116b-35: zhes pa la dam tshig ces pa ni sems can

T02D1186:116b-37: mtshan nyid can dam tshig ces pa ste snying rje'o
T02D1186:116b-38: // de'i dbye ba ni mchog tu nyams par 'gyur ba'o zhes pa drang ba'i don to //

T02D1186:116b-40: gzhan gyis bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la sogs

T02D1186:116b-46: stong nyid lta bas ltung bar bya //

T02D1186:116b-48: dpral ba can zhes rab tu grags //

T02D1186:117a-3: khros pa de las thams cad can //
T02D1186:117a-4: he ru ka dpal rang bzhin phyir //
T02D1186:117a-5: lta ba ngan pa rtag tu 'joms //
T02D1186:117a-6: rengs dang zhi ba nor bu'i nang //
T02D1186:117a-7: rgyal ba'i gzugs brnyan rnam par bsgom //
T02D1186:117a-8: da ni mnyam nyid mi g-yor bshad //
T02D1186:117a-10: 'dir brtan par byed par bshad de /
T02D1186:117a-11: dpal rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud du gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:117a-12: 'di ltar dpal bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1186:117a-13: goms pa mchog thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas tshogs kyi
T02D1186:117a-14: dkyil 'khor de nyid du tshar bcad pa dang rjes
T02D1186:117a-15: su gzung bas sems can rnams yongs su smin par
T02D1186:117a-16: byed do // stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen
T02D1186:117a-17: pa'i lta ba can kha cig la bcom ldan 'das
T02D1186:117a-18: bde ba chen po de kho na rnam par snang
T02D1186:117a-19: mdzad kyi gzugs kyis zhi ba chen po'i ting nge
T02D1186:117a-20: 'dzin gyis stong pa yang ma yin /
T02D1186:117a-21: mi stong pa yang ma yin no zhes mi gnas
T02D1186:117a-22: pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid can yang
T02D1186:117a-23: dag pa'i lta ba rtogs par mdzad nas stong pa
T02D1186:117a-24: nyid du lta ba tshar gcod par mdzad do //
T02D1186:117a-25: log par lta ba rnams la padma gar gyi dbang
T02D1186:117a-26: phyug gi gzugs kyis don dam pa'i bden pa rtogs
T02D1186:117a-27: par mdzad nas dbang du mdzad do //
T02D1186:117a-28: de bzhin du shin tu dgra po gdul dka' ba
T02D1186:117a-29: rnams la dpal he ru ka khro bo'i rgyal po
T02D1186:117a-30: chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis lta ba ngan pa
T02D1186:117a-31: tshar gcad par mdzad nas rjes su 'dzin par mdzad
T02D1186:117a-32: do zhes pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D1186:117a-33: nges pa'o // zla drug goms pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1186:117a-36: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab //
T02D1186:117a-37: ces pa la dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su gsungs pa yang //
T02D1186:117a-38: yang dag sbyor las chu shel las kyang chu ru 'gyur te me long la ni dngos po'i gzugs //
T02D1186:117a-39: skyur ba'i rgyu las lce 'dzag rang gi sgra las cig shos dag pa'i sa bon las myu gur //
T02D1186:117a-40: 'gyur te khab len las kyang lcags kyi thur ma'ang g-yo 'gyur 'dod pa 'di la ci yang min //
T02D1186:117a-41: dngos po rnams kyi nus pa 'di ni srid gsum gnas su su zhig gis kyang sprul pa min //
T02D1186:117a-42: sems can slu ba spangs nas ni //
T02D1186:117a-43: bya ba ma yin thams cad bya //
T02D1186:117b-0: sems can gnod pa @117b tsam gyis ni //
T02D1186:117b-1: phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob mi 'gyur //
T02D1186:117b-3: sems can zhes pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa drug dang /
T02D1186:117b-4: spyan ma la sogs pa lha mo rnams 'dod chags
T02D1186:117b-5: chen po la rjes su chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1186:117b-6: gyis byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bor gyur pa
T02D1186:117b-7: rnams so // byang chub kyi sems de 'phos pa
T02D1186:117b-8: las sems can la mchog tu gnod par 'gyur ro
T02D1186:117b-9: rnams so // zhes pa'o // phyag rgya zhes pa
T02D1186:117b-10: phyag rgya chen po ste mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i
T02D1186:117b-11: bde ba'i rang bzhin can no //
T02D1186:117b-12: thob mi 'gyur ba ni rnyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
T02D1186:117b-13: drang ba'i don gyi ni go sla'o //
T02D1186:117b-14: da ni dam tshig bskyang ba'i cho ga gsal bar bya ste /
T02D1186:117b-15: de la dam tshig bza' bar bya //
T02D1186:117b-16: sgrol ma zhes bya mnyam gzhag pas //
T02D1186:117b-17: na ga de bzhin ha dang po //
T02D1186:117b-18: mtha' yi shva dang dang po'i shva //
T02D1186:117b-19: zhes pa la sogs pa 'di'i don 'di yin te //
T02D1186:117b-20: rgyud gzhan du yang gsungs pa //
T02D1186:117b-21: 'dir dam tshig rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1186:117b-22: phyi rol dang nang gi bdag nyid do //
T02D1186:117b-23: dam tshig de rnams rnal 'byor pas bskyang zhing bsrung bar bya ste /
T02D1186:117b-24: phyi'i ni phyi rol du 'jig rten pa 'jug pa'i don du'o //
T02D1186:117b-25: nang gi bdag nyid rnams ni nang gi ye shes 'jug pa'i don du'o //
T02D1186:117b-26: de ltar phyi rol du 'jig rten pa 'jug pas
T02D1186:117b-27: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs su
T02D1186:117b-28: 'gyur te / phyi rol gyi dam tshig bsrung ba las so //
T02D1186:117b-29: de bzhin du nang gi bdag nyid la ye shes
T02D1186:117b-30: 'jug pas ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur te nang
T02D1186:117b-31: gi bdag nyid kyi dam tshig bsrung ba las so

T02D1186:117b-39: sems can dbang shes dus shes pas //
T02D1186:117b-40: rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po //
T02D1186:117b-44: phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1186:117b-45: kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1186:117b-46: sku rdo rje'i dam tshig nyid ni sku dang gsung
T02D1186:117b-47: dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo //
T02D1186:117b-48: dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bar bya //
T02D1186:118a-1: rdo rje'i bdag / gsang bar byang sems thig le'i gzugs //
T02D1186:118a-2: dam tshig gzhan gyis bsrung bar 'os //
T02D1186:118a-3: zhes pa ste nges pa'i don to //
T02D1186:118a-4: dpal phyag na rdo rjes kyang gsungs pa //
T02D1186:118a-5: shes rab dang kha sbyar bas dga' ba'i skad cig tu 'gyur te /
T02D1186:118a-6: de yang sku'i dam tshig go //
T02D1186:118a-7: dga' ba'i skad cig las padmar rdo rje zhugs pas
T02D1186:118a-8: mchog tu dga' ba'i skad cig tu 'gyur te de
T02D1186:118a-9: nyid gsung gi dam tshig go //
T02D1186:118a-10: mchog tu dga' ba'i skad cig las padmar rdo rje
T02D1186:118a-11: bskul bas khyad dga'i dga' ba'i skad cig tu 'gyur
T02D1186:118a-12: te // de nyid ni thugs kyi dam tshig go //
T02D1186:118a-13: khyad dga'i dga' ba'i skad cig las rdo rje nor
T02D1186:118a-14: bu byang chub kyi sems 'ongs pas lhan cig skyes
T02D1186:118a-15: pa'i dga' ba'i skad cig tu 'gyur te /
T02D1186:118a-16: de kho na ye shes kyi dam tshig bzhi pa'o //
T02D1186:118a-17: dam tshig 'di rnams la rab tu zhugs pa nyid
T02D1186:118a-18: kyi phyir dam tshig sems dpa' zhes mngon par brjod
T02D1186:118a-19: par bya'o // zhes pa nges pa'i don to //

T02D1186:118a-21: mtha'i shva la sogs pa'i sha rtag tu bza' bar bya'o zhes pa gzugs dang /
T02D1186:118a-24: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste bza' bar bya zhing sgrib pa med par bya'o //
T02D1186:118a-25: 'di ni dam tshig dam pa ste /
T02D1186:118a-26: byis pa'i rnal 'byor rtogs bya min //
T02D1186:118a-27: zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
T02D1186:118a-29: ma dag pa na dug nyid 'gyur //
T02D1186:118a-30: dag na bdud rtsi lta bur 'gyur //
T02D1186:118a-32: dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang dmyal ba'i le'ur gsungs pa /
T02D1186:118a-34: yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni dug dang bcas pa zug rngu dang bcas pa ste /
T02D1186:118a-35: 'di lta ste dper na kha zas bzang po dug
T02D1186:118a-36: can zhig yod pa la 'on kyang de kha dog
T02D1186:118a-37: dang / dri dang ro dang reg bya yid du
T02D1186:118a-38: 'ong ba yin kyang dug dang bcas pa nyid kyi
T02D1186:118a-39: phyir mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs su spang bar 'gyur
T02D1186:118a-40: dang / gyi / yongs su longs spyod par bya ba'i ched du ni ma yin no //
T02D1186:118a-41: de nyid byis pa'i rigs can shes rab 'chal ba'i
T02D1186:118a-42: rigs can ni yongs su longs spyad par bya bar
T02D1186:118a-43: sems te // des zas de zos shing kha dog
T02D1186:118a-44: dri dang ro myangs pa na bde ba byed cing
T02D1186:118a-45: zhu ba na de la sdug bsngal smin par 'gyur
T02D1186:118a-46: sems te // ro zhes so // zhes pa dpal
T02D1186:118b-0: kye'i rdo rje'i @118b rgyud la kha che chen pos

T02D1186:118b-3: chub pa zhes bya ba brtag pa'i rgyal po dang
T02D1186:118b-4: sems te // ro zhes so // po rdzogs so / //
T02D1186:118b-5: / da ni chos rnams thams cad rab tu mi
T02D1186:118b-6: gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can yin
T02D1186:118b-7: pa de lta na'ang sems kyi rang bzhin yang dag
T02D1186:118b-8: par sbyang ba'i don du sku gzugs la sogs pa'i
T02D1186:118b-9: rab tu gnas pa rtogs par byed pa'i le'u gsungs
T02D1186:118b-10: pa / bshad du gsol zhes pa la sogs pa rdo rje snying pos gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
T02D1186:118b-11: rab tu gnas pa'i mtshan nyid de rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol zhes sbrel lo //
T02D1186:118b-12: rdo rje snying pos zhes pa la 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02D1186:118b-13: dpal rdo rje rtse mor gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:118b-14: de bzhin nyid bden sems gang zhig / don yod rnam 'gyur med pa can //
T02D1186:118b-15: skye med 'gag med ces bya ba //
T02D1186:118b-18: snying po ni rang bzhin zhes mngon par brjod par bya'o //
T02D1186:118b-19: sbyin sreg byas te dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1186:118b-20: ji ltar gsungs pa bzhengs byas nas //
T02D1186:118b-21: srod la lhag gnas la sogs pa //
T02D1186:118b-22: byas te sku gzugs sbyang bar bya //
T02D1186:118b-23: nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun //
T02D1186:118b-24: sku gzugs snying gar rab gzhug bya //
T02D1186:118b-26: rab mthong sngags kyi pha rol son //
T02D1186:118b-27: aom badzra pushpe zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1186:118b-28: de ltar nye bar spyod pa lnga'i mchod pa la sogs pa ni rgyud gzhan gyi cho gas bya'o //
T02D1186:118b-29: cho ga ji lta ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho
T02D1186:118b-30: ga rgyas par bya'o zhes pa drang ba'i don to
T02D1186:118b-31: // da ni nges pa'i don gsal bar bya ste //
T02D1186:118b-32: dpal sa mbu ta'i rgyud du gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:118b-33: lha lags ya mtshan che ba thos //
T02D1186:118b-34: nang gi dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg sogs //
T02D1186:118b-35: bdag gis mi shes ci ltar lags //
T02D1186:118b-36: bde ba chen po bshad du gsol //
T02D1186:118b-37: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
T02D1186:118b-38: he ru ka sogs lha rnams kyis //
T02D1186:118b-39: rtsa yi gzugs su legs gnas pa //
T02D1186:118b-40: lus ni dkyil 'khor nyams dga' ba'o //
T02D1186:118b-41: ji skad gsungs pa'i sgo bzhir ldan //
T02D1186:118b-42: rang gi yan lag las byung ba'i //
T02D1186:118b-43: ka ba brgyad kyis gzung ste gnas //
T02D1186:118b-44: dngos po kun gyis mnyam pa nyid //
T02D1186:118b-45: gru bzhi pa ru rab tu grags //
T02D1186:118b-46: sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo yis //
T02D1186:118b-47: 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid brjod //
T02D1186:119a-2: rtsol chen rlung sogs rim ji bzhin //
T02D1186:119a-3: bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa yis //
T02D1186:119a-4: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor de yin no //
T02D1186:119a-5: nyan thos rnams dang de bzhin du //
T02D1186:119a-6: so so gcig pu sangs rgyas dang //
T02D1186:119a-7: tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams kyang //
T02D1186:119a-9: nang gi khu ba sogs rnams dang //
T02D1186:119a-10: de bzhin phyi rol gzugs sogs kyi //
T02D1186:119a-11: bsreg rdzas rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya //
T02D1186:119a-12: shes rab me ni cher 'bar la'o //
T02D1186:119a-13: skye mched drug dang khams rnams dang //
T02D1186:119a-14: khyad par du ni phung po sogs //
T02D1186:119a-15: lha yi ngo bo de rnams dang //
T02D1186:119a-16: de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma rnams la //
T02D1186:119a-17: gang phyir de rnams des mchod na //
T02D1186:119a-18: mchod sbyin mchod par yang dag bshad //
T02D1186:119a-19: mgo bo'i thod pa nyid kyang ni /
T02D1186:119a-20: sreg rdzas snod du brjod par bya //
T02D1186:119a-21: blugs gzar ro mar yang dag bshad //
T02D1186:119a-22: snying ga'i 'khor lo brgyang ma dag //
T02D1186:119a-23: dgang gzar zhes par yang dag bstan //
T02D1186:119a-24: thab kyang lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du'o //
T02D1186:119a-25: las kyi rlung gis bskyod byas pa //
T02D1186:119a-26: tshangs pa'i me ni skyed par gnas //
T02D1186:119a-27: n'a da sngags zhes brjod pa yin //
T02D1186:119a-28: kun nas bskor ba bzlas par 'gyur //
T02D1186:119a-29: so sor snang ba sgom pa ste //
T02D1186:119a-31: lhan cig skyes la gnas pa nyid //
T02D1186:119a-32: rgyal ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor sogs //
T02D1186:119a-33: sems kyi rgyal po slob dpon te //
T02D1186:119a-34: dkyil 'khor gtso bo'i ngo bo las //
T02D1186:119a-35: ji skad bshad pa'i ae wam sogs //
T02D1186:119a-36: thams cad 'di nyid du bsam bya //
T02D1186:119a-37: dpal bde ba dam pa rtogs par byed pa'i rgyud chen por yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:119a-38: lha rnams tshim par byed pa'i mchog /
T02D1186:119a-39: sbyin sreg nga yis bshad par bya //
T02D1186:119a-40: rnam par mi rtog sems gang yin //
T02D1186:119a-41: thab kyi sgra yis mtshon pa yin //
T02D1186:119a-42: rnam par dben pa'i me dbus su //
T02D1186:119a-43: gzugs kyi phung po la sogs lnga'i //
T02D1186:119a-44: yam shing sems las yang dag par //
T02D1186:119a-45: byung ba mtha' dag sbyin sreg bya //
T02D1186:119a-46: gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po gang //
T02D1186:119a-47: yam shing zhes par rab tu grags //
T02D1186:119a-48: de ltar snum ni zla ba'i rgyun //
T02D1186:119a-49: phung po skye mched khams rnams sogs //
T02D1186:119a-50: khams gsum po ni ma lus pa //
T02D1186:119a-51: gnyis su dbyer med tha dad med //
T02D1186:119a-52: shes rab me la dgang blugs dbul //
T02D1186:119a-53: lus ni sbyin sreg yang dag ldan //
T02D1186:119b-0: phyi rol sbyin sreg @119b tshim mi byed //
T02D1186:119b-1: rdo rje bdud rtsi la sogs pa'i //

T02D1186:119b-9: zhi bar thab khung zlum po ste //

T02D1186:119b-16: rgyas la rgyas pa'i sems kyis ni //

T02D1186:119b-18: rjes chags sems kyis gzhon nu ma //

T02D1186:119b-20: gsad la sdang ba'i sems kyis ni //

T02D1186:119b-33: bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi //
T02D1186:119b-34: mchod yon sngags pas de nas dbul //
T02D1186:119b-35: zhabs bsil nyid kyang khyad par du'o //
T02D1186:119b-36: dpal bde ba dam pa rtogs par byed par gsungs pa yang /

T02D1186:119b-38: sku gzugs lha zhes yang dag bshad //
T02D1186:119b-39: gang zhig sems kyis mtshon gyur cing //
T02D1186:119b-40: sems ni gang zhig brtan gyur pa //
T02D1186:119b-41: lus ngag sems las rtag tu ste //
T02D1186:119b-42: de nyid sku gzugs yin par bshad //
T02D1186:119b-43: phung po rnams ni dngos gcig tu //
T02D1186:119b-44: rdo rje skyil krung de bcings nas //
T02D1186:119b-45: sna yi rtse mor lta ba yis //
T02D1186:119b-46: rang gi rang bzhin rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1186:119b-47: de nyid lta bas gnas par bya //
T02D1186:119b-48: rnam par mi rtog rang bzhin du //
T02D1186:120a-2: de tshe de yi rab gnas dang //
T02D1186:120a-3: lha yi mchod pa phun sum tshogs //
T02D1186:120a-5: sangs rgyas kun bdag 'dus pa las //
T02D1186:120a-6: sangs rgyas kun bdag sdom pa'o //
T02D1186:120a-8: thugs kyi rdo rje'i gsung ji bzhin //
T02D1186:120a-9: bdag gis gsal bar bshad pa ste //
T02D1186:120a-10: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ster //
T02D1186:120a-12: rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:120a-13: padma'i nang du mi yi sna rtse ru //
T02D1186:120a-14: rdo rje las byung 'o ma'i rgya mtsho'i gzugs //
T02D1186:120a-15: yid bzhin nor bu 'gro ba kun gyi rang bzhin te /
T02D1186:120a-16: he ru ka dpal rtag rig 'dzag pa'i skad cig ma //

T02D1186:120a-18: dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod par gsungs pa yang /

T02D1186:120a-22: phyogs bcu chos kyi rnga bo che //
T02D1186:120a-23: zhes pa nges pa'i don to //

T02D1186:120a-26: dpal phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa yang /

T02D1186:120a-30: ji skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

T02D1186:120a-42: kun nas mar me'i phreng ba rnams dang /
T02D1186:120a-43: mchod pa mang po rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02D1186:120a-45: bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lnga la sogs pa

T02D1186:120a-47: tshim par byed pa'o zhes pa'o //

T02D1186:120a-53: dpral bar son pa rgyu mthun pa dang /

T02D1186:120b-5: rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnams dang /
T02D1186:120b-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhes pa mig dang /
T02D1186:120b-11: yid ces pa dbang po'i khams rnams dang /
T02D1186:120b-12: dang yig las sa la sogs pa'i khams rnams dang /
T02D1186:120b-13: gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi khams rnams mchod par bya ste /
T02D1186:120b-14: byang chub kyi sems ma 'phos pa'i thig le rnams
T02D1186:120b-15: dang mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po'i skad cig
T02D1186:120b-16: rnams kyis yongs su mchod par bya'o zhes pa nges
T02D1186:120b-17: pa'i don to // zhes pa dpal kye'i rdo rje'i
T02D1186:120b-18: rgyud la rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po bsdus pa'i
T02D1186:120b-19: dka' 'grel du brtag pa gnyis pa rab gnas kyi
T02D1186:120b-22: // / da ni gnyis pa dngos grub kyi le'u gsungs pa /
T02D1186:120b-23: nam mkha' lta bu'i chos kun la //
T02D1186:120b-24: rgya mtsho'i ku ba ji lta bar //
T02D1186:120b-25: sems can rang 'dod lha yi ni //
T02D1186:120b-27: zhes pa la sogs pa la nam mkha' lta bu
T02D1186:120b-28: zhes pa ni rang bzhin med pa'i chos thams cad
T02D1186:120b-29: rnam pa ji ltar thog mar rgya mtsho chen por
T02D1186:120b-30: 'phangs pa'i ku ba nyi tshe bar 'gyur ba de

T02D1186:120b-36: nad kyi zug gzer rba rlabs rgyas pas bsgrubs pa'i 'gram nyid gcig pu bde ba chen po ste /
T02D1186:120b-37: de phyir skye bo byang chub blo ldan skad cig tsam yang rang gi don la mtha' gcig tu //

T02D1186:120b-40: rang 'dod lha'i gzugs zhes pa dpal gdan bzhi par yang gsungs pa //
T02D1186:120b-41: bdag nyid lha dang pha rol lha //
T02D1186:120b-42: bdag nyid lha ni dam pa ste //
T02D1186:120b-43: bdag nyid gzugs su nus med rnams //
T02D1186:120b-44: gzugs brnyan la sogs rnams rtog byed //

T02D1186:120b-48: dngos po 'di rnams ma skyes pa //

T02D1186:121a-5: kye'i rdo rje sems zhes bshad //
T02D1186:121a-6: rnam rtog med pa'i rang bzhin te //
T02D1186:121a-7: rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam pa can //
T02D1186:121a-8: gdod nas zhi ba nam mkha' mnyam //
T02D1186:121a-10: bsam gtan nyon mongs 'jig byed pa //
T02D1186:121a-12: dpal rdo rje rtse mor gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:121a-13: bsam gtan ci yi don brjod bya //
T02D1186:121a-14: sdug bsngal thams cad gcod pa dang //

T02D1186:121a-31: dpal phyag na rdo rjes kyang gsungs pa /

T02D1186:121a-35: gal te yid ches ma byung na //
T02D1186:121a-36: de tshe nga yi brdzun tshig yin //
T02D1186:121a-38: 'dir yid ches ni du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ste /
T02D1186:121a-39: gzhan sngags la sogs pas nyin gcig bsgrub par bya
T02D1186:121a-40: ba ma yin pa gang gis sngags pa rnams kyi

T02D1186:121a-43: rten med par byas nas zab mo stong pa nyid kyi gzhil yid ches su 'gyur te //
T02D1186:121a-44: bden par yid ches par byed pa yid ches pa'i
T02D1186:121a-45: don du ba la sogs pa rnal 'byor bas shes
T02D1186:121a-46: par bya'o zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o
T02D1186:121a-48: byed pa bcing ba'i sbyor ba yis //

T02D1186:121b-1: zhes pa la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs ni srid pa gsum ste /
T02D1186:121b-2: byed pa mig la sogs pa rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1186:121b-3: man ngag de nyid ni bla ma'i zhal las rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1186:121b-4: dpal mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur du gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:121b-5: gang dang gang gis 'dul ba yis //
T02D1186:121b-6: sems can gdul bya nyid 'gro ba //

T02D1186:121b-8: sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa'o //

T02D1186:121b-12: ste / bkab dang ma bkab mig dag gis /

T02D1186:121b-15: rtag tu gzugs de bsgom par bya //

T02D1186:121b-17: gzhon nu mas mthong dngos med skyes //

T02D1186:121b-29: dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su yang gsungs pa /

T02D1186:121b-42: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
T02D1186:122a-1: 'phags pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang shes

T02D1186:122a-5: koo'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D1186:122a-6: phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa de ni
T02D1186:122a-7: nam mkha' la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no
T02D1186:122a-8: // gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

T02D1186:122a-10: gab med pa la rnal 'byor du byed do zhes
T02D1186:122a-11: // so // 'dir bla ma'i man ngag gis nam

T02D1186:122a-13: // so // ste / smig rgyu ni ma yin
T02D1186:122a-14: no zhes pa rang gi nyams su myong ba las

T02D1186:122a-17: mkha' snang ni mtshan ma gsum pa'o //
T02D1186:122a-18: sgron ma ni mtshan ma bzhi pa'o //

T02D1186:122a-26: dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su gsungs pa yang //
T02D1186:122a-27: khro bo sangs rgyas lha mo dang bcas nges par ro yi rdo rje rnams dang sa snying sogs //

T02D1186:122a-29: de yi 'dod pa'i dngos grub ri bong can zhag tho rangs dang ni mtshan mo phyed la 'gyur //
T02D1186:122a-30: rin po che'am me tog char ba mchog gyur dus kyi sbyor bas sa steng du 'bab 'gyur /
T02D1186:122a-31: lus ni dang zhing rdul phran nyams pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs mtshan sogs rnams kyis rab rdzogs 'gyur //

T02D1186:122b-18: rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa yang //

T02D1186:122b-20: phung po la sogs sgrib pas rab dman yul can gang zhig pra phab brgyad lta bu //
T02D1186:122b-21: de bor sangs rgyas nyid ched nor chags 'khyog po'i snying can ma dang brtags ma la //
T02D1186:122b-22: gang gis rten byed rnam brtags blo can de yis de yang 'pho ba thob par byed //
T02D1186:122b-23: 'dod chags nyams la sdig ste gang phyir shin tu sdug ma la ni zhe sdang ste //
T02D1186:122b-24: sdang las gti mug 'di las rang gi rdo rje lhung las sems ni rtag brgyal te //
T02D1186:122b-25: ma lus mchog min bza' dang btung ba la sogs

T02D1186:122b-38: dam pa'i bde ba bde chen na //

T02D1186:122b-40: bskyed pa yis ni dgos pa ci //

T02D1186:123a-4: phyag rgya bskyed pas dgos pa ci //

T02D1186:123a-12: khyab bya khyab byed ngo bo yis //

T02D1186:123a-17: bde ba dmigs pa nyid mi 'gyur //
T02D1186:123a-18: zhes pa kun rdzob kyis so //
T02D1186:123a-19: rgyud 'di nyid du slar yang don dam pas 'gog pa 'di lta ste /

T02D1186:123a-22: dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas nga //
T02D1186:123a-23: zhes pa mngon par shes pa drug can thabs so //
T02D1186:123a-24: rmongs pa gang rnams nga mi shes //

T02D1186:123a-26: kyang ste de rnams ni dbang po gnyis kyi bde

T02D1186:123a-29: rgyu ba dang bcas pa'i 'das pa dang ma 'ongs

T02D1186:123a-39: lus med na de med pa ni ma yin te /

T02D1186:123a-43: nam mkha' la ni 'jig pa med //
T02D1186:123a-44: de bzhin lus ni zhig gyur kyang //
T02D1186:123a-45: ye shes la ni 'jig pa med //
T02D1186:123a-46: rang bzhin kho na mya ngan 'das //
T02D1186:123a-47: rnam dag rnam pa'i sems las so //
T02D1186:123a-49: dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgya byin gyi le'ur yang gsungs pa /

T02D1186:123b-0: @123b lha'i bu de gal te mya ngan las 'das

T02D1186:123b-3: ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes smra'o //

T02D1186:123b-7: ngan las 'das pa 'di ni gnyis su med de
T02D1186:123b-8: gnyis su byar med do zhes so //
T02D1186:123b-10: skyes zin tsam la rnam par gnas //
T02D1186:123b-12: dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:123b-13: mngal du yang dag dag pa'i sku ste btsa' ba'i dus nas so ni skyes pa'ang chos kyi'o //

T02D1186:123b-24: chags pa nyid kyis rnam grol 'gyur //

T02D1186:123b-36: slar yang 'di nyid du gsungs pa //

T02D1186:123b-40: gti mug rnam par snang mdzad 'dod //
T02D1186:123b-41: gang phyir byang sems zhu ba nyid //
T02D1186:123b-42: khu ba chu yi khams su 'dod //
T02D1186:123b-43: chu ni mi bskyod ngo bo'i phyir //
T02D1186:123b-44: zhe sdang 'dren pa mi bskyod pa //
T02D1186:123b-45: gnyis ka bsrubs pa'i sbyor ba las //

T02D1186:123b-49: kakko lar ni gang zhig sems //

T02D1186:123b-51: phrag dog don yod grub par 'gyur //
T02D1186:124a-3: chags pa nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D1186:124a-4: nam mkha' phra ma rdo rjer 'gyur //
T02D1186:124a-5: phra ma nam mkha' las byung ba //
T02D1186:124a-6: dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'jig rten bstan pa'i le'ur gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:124a-7: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
T02D1186:124a-8: 'on kyang nam mkha' la mnyam pa'am /
T02D1186:124a-9: bgrang ba'am tshad dam mtshungs pa'am /
T02D1186:124a-10: sems sam sems pa'am sems las byung ba'i chos rnams yod dam /

T02D1186:124a-16: pa med pa gzhal du med pa grangs med pa
T02D1186:124a-17: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
T02D1186:124a-18: rab 'byor 'di rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams so zhes so //
T02D1186:124a-19: sems ni chen po gcig nyid ni //
T02D1186:124a-20: lnga yi gzugs kyis mtshon pa'o //

T02D1186:124a-23: rdo rje'i bdag nyid can ni rang nyid thar par byed //

T02D1186:124a-40: dpal mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:124a-41: gti mug zhe sdang de bzhin chags //

T02D1186:125a-6: mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa ae wam yi ge gsungs pa /

T02D1186:125b-36: de ltar na gdul dka' ba 'dul ba por 'gyur

T02D1186:125b-46: tshogs kyi las byed pa ni dmyal bar 'gro'o zhes
T02D1186:125b-48: ji ltar bdag nyid la lta ba //
T02D1186:125b-49: de ltar sems can rnams la'o //
T02D1186:125b-51: sgra ni gang zhig gzhal gyis dman //
T02D1186:126a-0: zhes pa 'dir thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung skad thams cad pa gang las sems can rnams @126a * //
T02D1186:126a-1: kyi snying la rang rang gi skad gzhan gyis 'gyur ba de nyid rab tu mi gnas pa ste /
T02D1186:126a-2: sems can thams cad kyi skad yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1186:126a-3: rab tu mi gnas pa'i sgra yin pa nyid kyi phyir brdzun du smra ba zhes brjod do //
T02D1186:126a-4: de skad du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:126a-5: gtso bo khyod kyis cung zad kyang //
T02D1186:126a-6: yi ge gcig kyang brjod med kyang //
T02D1186:126a-7: gdul bya'i skye bo thams cad ni //
T02D1186:126a-8: chos kyi char bas tshim par mdzad //
T02D1186:126a-10: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa //
T02D1186:126a-11: skyes bu de nyid tsam las ni //
T02D1186:126a-12: yid bzhin nor bu las bzhin du //
T02D1186:126a-13: rtsig sogs las kyang ston pa ni //
T02D1186:126a-16: sems can thams cad gdul bar bya ba'i don du ste //
T02D1186:126a-17: sems can rnams slu ba'i ched du sangs rgyas pa'i
T02D1186:126a-18: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis slu ba can gyi tshig
T02D1186:126a-19: 'di ma yin no zhes pa ni grub po //
T02D1186:126a-20: 'dir lus sgrib pa med par skyes par gyur pa
T02D1186:126a-21: na thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa bcu gnyis po gang
T02D1186:126a-22: 'dzin pa ni / rnal 'byor ba'i ma byin par len ba'o //
T02D1186:126a-23: pha rol du bud med ces pa la pha rol
T02D1186:126a-24: te ches mchog tu gyur pa las dang ye shes
T02D1186:126a-25: dang bral ba bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin phyag
T02D1186:126a-27: de bsten par gyis shig pa'o //
T02D1186:126a-28: rang mtshungs mdzes ma zhes pa dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:126a-29: rnal 'byor pa yis nyin dang mtshan mor srog gcod bya ba de ni srog nyams par gsungs te /
T02D1186:126a-30: sgra ni gang zhig zhal gyis dman pa'ang snying la 'gyur ba de ni brdzun du smra ba nyid //
T02D1186:126a-31: gang zhig thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sa ni 'dzin pa'ang rnal 'byor pa yis rku bar gsungs //
T02D1186:126a-32: thig le ma lhung pa las bder 'gyur chags bral min las gzhan gyi bud med bsten pa'o //
T02D1186:126a-34: bza' btung ji ltar rnyed pa dang //
T02D1186:126a-35: bgrod dang bgrod min spang mi bya //
T02D1186:126a-36: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1186:126a-37: 'di'i nges pa'i don ni gsungs pa yang //
T02D1186:126a-38: bza' ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga'o //
T02D1186:126a-39: btud pa ni byang chub kyi sems zhu ba'i khu ba'o //
T02D1186:126a-40: bgrod bya ni rgyur gyur pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1186:126a-41: bgrod bya ma yin pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1186:126a-42: 'di dag dbyer med pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1186:126a-43: bgrod dang bgrod min spang mi bya //
T02D1186:126a-45: khrus dang gtsang sbra mi bya ste //
T02D1186:126a-46: phung po lnga sgrib pa med pas dri ma 'byin
T02D1186:126b-0: @126b pa ni me long lta bu la sogs pa'i
T02D1186:126b-1: ye shes lnga skyed pas na dag pa'o //
T02D1186:126b-2: dpal gdan bzhi par yang gsungs pa //
T02D1186:126b-3: rang gi lus ni bkru bya ste //
T02D1186:126b-4: 'dod chags zhe sdang dri ma'i nang //
T02D1186:126b-5: zab mo rgya mtsho lta bu rnams //
T02D1186:126b-6: stong nyid ye shes de nyid kyis //
T02D1186:126b-8: gtsang sbra ni sems kyi rdo rje rnam par spyod pas dag pa'o //
T02D1186:126b-9: de skad du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:126b-10: gtsang sbra dang po pho nya mo //
T02D1186:126b-11: gnyis pa zla ba nyid du 'dod //
T02D1186:126b-12: gcig tu ts'a ru'i bza' ba ni //
T02D1186:126b-13: gtsang sbra gsum pa brjod par bya //
T02D1186:126b-14: phyi rol rnal 'byor dga' rnams la //
T02D1186:126b-15: chu yi gtsang sbra yang dag spyad //
T02D1186:126b-16: rang sems dri ma can gyur na //
T02D1186:126b-17: gtsang sbra yis ni dgos pa ci //
T02D1186:126b-18: mi bya zhes pa ni dmigs pa med pa'i sbyor bas rnam par gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1186:126b-19: grong ba'i chos kyi sgra yis ni //
T02D1186:126b-20: mig la sogs pa'i skye mched de //
T02D1186:126b-22: blo ldan sngags nyid mi bzla zhing //
T02D1186:126b-23: zhes pa phyi rol gyi sngags brjod pa ste /
T02D1186:126b-24: gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyis ni bzlas par mi bya'o //
T02D1186:126b-25: bsam gtan nyid ni dmigs mi bya //
T02D1186:126b-26: zhes pa la bsam gtan ni gang yid rtse gcig pas kun nas gnas par bya ba ste /
T02D1186:126b-27: bya ba med pa nyid kyis na de'i tshe /
T02D1186:126b-28: bsam gtan nyid kyang dmigs mi bya //
T02D1186:126b-30: gnyid ni spang bar mi bya zhing //
T02D1186:126b-31: zhes pa la gnyid ni gti mug ste /
T02D1186:126b-32: gti mug ni rnam par snang mdzad du 'dod la /
T02D1186:126b-33: rnam par snang mdzad gang yin pa de 'di ni
T02D1186:126b-34: byang chub kyi sems yin la de yongs su gtang
T02D1186:126b-35: bar bya ba ma yin no //
T02D1186:126b-36: dbang po rnams ni mi dgag go //
T02D1186:126b-37: dbang po ni mig la sogs pa rnams te /
T02D1186:126b-38: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir dgag par mi bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1186:126b-39: ba la thams cad bza' bar bya //
T02D1186:126b-40: zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga po lus pa med par sgrib pa med pa'o //
T02D1186:126b-41: rigs lnga la ni mnyam par sbyang //
T02D1186:126b-42: ces pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gzugs su dmigs pa'o //
T02D1186:126b-43: btsun mo thams cad dga' bar byed //
T02D1186:126b-44: ces pa'i btsun mo zhes pa 'di yis spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams so //
T02D1186:126b-45: de rnams dbyer med pa'i rnal 'byor gyis 'jug par gang gi tshe 'gyur ba de'i tshe //
T02D1186:126b-46: btsun mo thams cad dga' bar byed pa kho na'o zhes so //
T02D1186:126b-47: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02D1186:127a-0: zhes pa ji lta bar bcom ldan @127a * //
T02D1186:127a-1: 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje ni dbang po
T02D1186:127a-2: rnams dang lhan cig tha mi dad pa nyid kyis
T02D1186:127a-3: na bde ba chen po'i rnam pas bya ba med
T02D1186:127a-4: pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur te /
T02D1186:127a-6: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02D1186:127a-8: bshes la sdug par mi bya zhing /
T02D1186:127a-10: bshes ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin te /
T02D1186:127a-11: de la rang bzhin med pas na sdug par mi bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1186:127a-12: de bzhin sdang la sdang ba min //
T02D1186:127a-13: zhes pa sdang ba mig la sogs pa'i shes pa ste /
T02D1186:127a-14: de la sdang bar bya ba ma yin zhes pa dbyer med pa'i rnal 'byor las so //
T02D1186:127a-15: rdo shing 'jim pa'i rang bzhin gyi //
T02D1186:127a-16: lha 'di rnams la phyag mi bya //
T02D1186:127a-18: sems kyi rdo rje dbang po rnams thams cad kyi
T02D1186:127a-19: ye shes kyi rgyur byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
T02D1186:127a-20: lo'i rang bzhin gyis rnam par gnas par 'gyur ba
T02D1186:127a-21: de'i tshe shing dang rdo ba la sogs pa la

T02D1186:127a-23: 'gro ba thams cad bsgom par bya //
T02D1186:127a-24: zhes pa la sogs pa la gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:127a-25: bde ba chen pos 'gro ba khyab //
T02D1186:127a-26: bde ba spangs nas rtogs ma yin //
T02D1186:127a-27: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D1186:127a-28: mkha' 'gro ma dang btsun mo bzang //
T02D1186:127a-29: sangs rgyas lnga dang du ma rnams //
T02D1186:127a-30: de bzhin bde bas sangs rgyas gshegs //
T02D1186:127a-31: tha mal nga rgyal gzhom don du //
T02D1186:127a-32: sgom pa yang dag rab tu bsgrags //
T02D1186:127a-33: tha mal gnas skabs gzhom ched du //
T02D1186:127a-34: sgom pa bsgom pa nyid ma yin //
T02D1186:127a-36: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud la rdo rje'i tshig gi
T02D1186:127a-37: snying po bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel du dgongs pa'i skad
T02D1186:127a-41: // / da ni spyod pa'i le'ur gang mdor bstan pa'i glu
T02D1186:127a-42: dang gar la sogs pa rgyas par bstan pa'i ched
T02D1186:127a-43: du rgyud thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsdus pa'i don
T02D1186:127a-45: dang por re zhig glu bstan par bya ste /
T02D1186:127a-46: kolla ai ri tthi aa bo la zhes pa 'di yis te /
T02D1186:127a-47: bo la ni rdo rje byang chub kyi sems su bshad do //
T02D1186:127a-48: ko zhes bya ba bde ba'o //
T02D1186:127a-49: lla ai re bzung nas so //
T02D1186:127a-50: tthi ya zhes pa gnas so ste byang chub kyi
T02D1186:127a-51: sems rdo rje'o zhes pa 'di yis kolla ai re
T02D1186:127a-52: tthi aa zhes pa po la'i sgra yis brjod par
T02D1186:127a-53: bya'o // mu mmu ni re ka ko la /
T02D1186:127a-54: zhes pa la mu mmu ni re'i sgra yis lte ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1186:127b-0: des na padma'i @127b chags pas byang chub kyi sems
T02D1186:127b-1: rdo rje la 'khyud par byas pa'o zhes pa'i don
T02D1186:127b-2: to // gha nkra bi tta ho b'a dzdza ai
T02D1186:127b-3: ka ru ne ki aa ai na ro l'a zhes
T02D1186:127b-4: pa la gha na ni rgyun ma chad par ro
T02D1186:127b-5: to // // kri pi tta ni rdo rje bsgul ba'o //
T02D1186:127b-6: ka ru na ni zhu ba'i rnam pa 'jig rten gsum gyi ngo bo 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1186:127b-7: 'on kyang byang chub gyi sems thams cad kyi rdo rje'o //
T02D1186:127b-8: des na po la dbang po gnyis bsrubs pas rol ni tshogs par bshad par bya'o //
T02D1186:127b-9: tam [?] ham ba au kha dzdza ae gha de
T02D1186:127b-10: mma aa n'a pa dzdza ai zhes pa la ti
T02D1186:127b-11: [?] ham zhes pa po la dang ka kko la
T02D1186:127b-12: yang dag par sbyar ba la bza' bar bya'o //
T02D1186:127b-13: ba la ni sha ste de bzhin gshegs pa lnga
T02D1186:127b-14: rnams gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pas na
T02D1186:127b-15: phung po lnga'o // de rnams kyi sha za bar bya zhing rang bzhin med par bya ste /
T02D1186:127b-16: byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyi zhu bar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1186:127b-17: ma da na ni chang ste me long lta bu
T02D1186:127b-18: la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i byang
T02D1186:127b-20: gha dem ne po la dang ka kko la sbyar
T02D1186:127b-21: bas yang dag bar bsdams nas ches cher btung ste
T02D1186:127b-22: btung bar bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1186:127b-23: ha le k'a li nydza ra pa ni aa ai dundu ra ta him bi dzdza aa ai /
T02D1186:127b-24: zhes pa la ha le ni bod pa'o //
T02D1186:127b-25: k'a li nydza ra ni skal pa dang ldan pa'i
T02D1186:127b-26: byang chub kyi sems te padma'i ze 'brur rab tu
T02D1186:127b-28: dun du ru ni skal pa mod pa mig la sogs pa'i skye mched de /
T02D1186:127b-29: dor ba ni sel bar byed pa ste /
T02D1186:127b-30: rang bzhin med pa'i gnas la rnam par 'jog pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1186:127b-31: tsa au sa ma ka sthu ri si hla ka bpu ra l'a ai aa ai /
T02D1186:127b-32: zhes pa'i bzhi mnyam gyi sgra yis rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1186:127b-33: gla rtsi'i sgra yis mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1186:127b-34: si hla ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D1186:127b-35: ga pur ni 'od dpag tu med par 'dod do ;
T02D1186:127b-36: ;'di rnams dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das dbyer med pa'i yan lag gis bzhugs so //
T02D1186:127b-38: m'a la ai ndha na sh'a li dza ta him bha ru kh'a ai aa ai /
T02D1186:127b-39: zhes ba m'a la ai ndha na ni tshod ma ste phung po lnga'o //
T02D1186:127b-40: sh'a li dza ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
T02D1186:127b-41: ye shes te rgyun ma chad par ma lus par
T02D1186:127b-42: bdag gi dbang du bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1186:127b-43: phrem kha na khe ta ka ranta shuddha na mu ni aa ai /
T02D1186:127b-44: zhes pa la phrem kha na ni 'ong ba'o //
T02D1186:127b-45: 'gro ba ni kha [?] ta ste 'gro ba dang
T02D1186:127b-46: 'ong ba 'di dag 'gog pas dag pa dang ma

T02D1186:128a-0: pa dgongs pa'o // ni ram shu aam ghe tsa d'a bi aa ai ta him dza @128a * //

T02D1186:128a-3: ste 'dis ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi byang chub
T02D1186:128a-5: tsa d'a bi ni yid la mi byed pa la 'dog pa'o //
T02D1186:128a-6: sha r'a pa ni ni ro ste bdag med pa'i

T02D1186:128a-8: gnas pa'o zhes pa'i don to ;

T02D1186:128a-12: bde ba dang lhan cig mig la sogs pa'i de

T02D1186:128a-14: nas byang chub sems rdo rje shes rab dang lhan
T02D1186:128a-16: ku ntu ru ni dbang po gnyis yang dag par sbyor ba ste /
T02D1186:128a-17: gnyis po 'du bas rab tu 'jug pa'o //
T02D1186:128a-18: rab tu 'jug pa ni reg pa yin la /
T02D1186:128a-19: di ndi ma ni de la mi reg pa yin la /
T02D1186:128a-20: thams cad gcig tu gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes pa la sogs pa ngos pa'i don to //
T02D1186:128a-21: drang ba'i don gyis ni go sla'o //
T02D1186:128a-23: he ru ka yi gzugs kyis gar //
T02D1186:128a-24: chags pa'i sems kyis sgom pa ste //
T02D1186:128a-25: rgyun mi 'chad par goms sems kyis //
T02D1186:128a-26: zhes pa 'di'i nges pa'i don ni gsungs pa yang //
T02D1186:128a-27: dga' bas shes rab mthong ba las //
T02D1186:128a-28: lta ba'i ngo bos skye bar byed //
T02D1186:128a-29: dpal mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur du yang gsungs pa //
T02D1186:128a-30: chos 'byung grong khyer gang gi gnas //
T02D1186:128a-31: rdo rje dam tshig glu len las //
T02D1186:128a-32: rdo rje rkang pas gar stabs te //
T02D1186:128a-33: rdza rnga sgeg sogs khyad par du'o //
T02D1186:128a-35: rgyud gzhan du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:128a-36: padma'i gdan gyi dbus su ni //
T02D1186:128a-37: gang zhig sems ni yang dag gnas //
T02D1186:128a-38: zhi ba de nyid yang dag dag / lhan cig skyes dga' gar mkhan no //
T02D1186:128a-39: gar gyi chos ni de nyid shes //
T02D1186:128a-40: gar byed pa ste the tshom med //
T02D1186:128a-41: 'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i rgyur //
T02D1186:128a-42: 'jig rten chos kyi gar byed do //
T02D1186:128a-43: de nyid 'di ni sbas pa che //
T02D1186:128a-44: phyag rgya chen po ster ba po //
T02D1186:128a-45: rdo rje sems dpa'i gsung ji bzhin //
T02D1186:128a-46: 'bad pa yis ni bsrung bar bya //

T02D1186:128b-0: rdo rje chos kyis zhes pa la brjod @128b du

T02D1186:128b-10: sangs rgyas gar mkhan ting 'dzin gnas //

T02D1186:128b-12: gar dang glu la zhen rnams la //
T02D1186:128b-13: sgom la chags pa'i sems kyis so //

T02D1186:128b-22: sgom pa bsgom pa nyid ma yin //

T02D1186:128b-30: sangs rgyas gzhan du ba stan pa med //
T02D1186:128b-32: dpal sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom par gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:128b-33: bcom ldan 'das de la sems rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes pa ci ltar lags /
T02D1186:128b-34: bsam gyis mi khyab rgya che zab //
T02D1186:128b-35: dngos grub bde kun 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02D1186:128b-36: kun nas khyab cing dri ma bral //
T02D1186:128b-37: nga ni byang chub sems bstan pa'o //
T02D1186:128b-39: gdol pa smyig ma mkhan la sogs //
T02D1186:128b-40: mtshams med lnga ni byad pa rnams //
T02D1186:128b-41: zhes pa la sogs pa 'di'i don 'di yin te /
T02D1186:128b-42: sngags kyi spyod pa rjes spyad na //
T02D1186:128b-44: zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs yin no zhen bden te /
T02D1186:128b-45: skye ba 'di la gang sngar mtshams med pa lnga
T02D1186:128b-46: la sogs pa drag po'i las byas pa de sngags
T02D1186:128b-47: kyi tshul 'di la phyag rgya chen po mi 'gyur
T02D1186:128b-48: ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bcom nas dge ba gzhan
T02D1186:129a-1: ba rnams mi 'jug par bya ba'i ched du rdo
T02D1186:129a-2: rje chos 'byung gi khang bar bdud bzhi'i gegs la
T02D1186:129a-3: sogs pa'i sgra 'jug pa'i sgo rnams la byams pa
T02D1186:129a-4: dang / snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms la sogs pa dang /
T02D1186:129a-5: byang chub kyi sems kyi sgo glegs bcug ste der
T02D1186:129a-6: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya chen po dang lhan
T02D1186:129a-7: cig bsgrubs nas mtshams med pa lnga byed pa po
T02D1186:129a-8: rnams kyang skye ba 'di la sangs rgyas nyid kyi
T02D1186:129a-9: 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro zhes pa de bzhin
T02D1186:129a-11: sngags kyi theg par zhugs par gyur pa slar yang
T02D1186:129a-12: mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa drag po'i las
T02D1186:129a-13: byed pa rnams kyang skye ba 'di la sangs rgyas
T02D1186:129a-14: nyid kyi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1186:129a-15: zhes de bzhin gshegs pa bzhed pa ni ma yin no //
T02D1186:129a-16: 'dir theg pa gsum ka la yang /
T02D1186:129a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung ni dang por dge ba
T02D1186:129a-18: bar du dge ba tha mar dge ba zhes pas
T02D1186:129a-19: sngags kyi theg pa la zhugs par gyur pa rnams
T02D1186:129a-20: kyis sdig pa byed pa rnams sangs rgyas nyid kyi
T02D1186:129a-21: 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no
T02D1186:129a-24: skye ba 'di nyid la sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu
T02D1186:129a-25: ster ba zhes pa ni skye pa 'di la ste
T02D1186:129a-26: / me'i skye ba la sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu ster ba rgyud kyi rgyal po yin gyi /
T02D1186:129a-27: lha la sogs pa 'gro ba lnga'i skye ba la ni ma yin no ;
T02D1186:129a-29: las kyi sar skyes pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1186:129a-30: 'dir lha la sogs pa rnams la yang mi'i skye ba thob nas /
T02D1186:129a-31: sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur ro
T02D1186:129a-32: zhes ba bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o zhes so
T02D1186:129a-33: // byis pa mi shes pas bsgribs pa //
T02D1186:129a-35: 'gro drug srid pa'i rgyu ba ru //
T02D1186:129a-37: zhes pa dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:129a-38: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1186:129a-39: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems bdag tu byed
T02D1186:129a-40: pa dang bdag gir byed pas sems can rnams 'khor
T02D1186:129a-42: bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no //
T02D1186:129a-43: bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te /
T02D1186:129a-44: ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pas sems can rnams 'khor ba na 'khor bar byed lags so //
T02D1186:129a-45: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1186:129a-46: rab 'byor de bzhin sems can rnams kun nas nyon
T02D1186:129b-0: mongs @129b par rab tu shes par gyis shig ces
T02D1186:129b-1: so // dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:129b-2: mngal du mngal gnas sdug bsngal btsa' ba'i dus dang byis pa'i dngos po la yang sdug bsngal te //
T02D1186:129b-3: gzhon nu lang tsho dag la bud med nor dang 'byor nyams nyon mongs sdug bsngal chen po gang //
T02D1186:129b-4: rgan po nyid la 'che ba'i sdug bsngal sngar yang 'gro ba drug tu 'jig ster du 'bod sogs //
T02D1186:129b-5: sgyu mas rmongs par byas pa'i mtha' dag 'gro ba
T02D1186:129b-6: 'di ni sdug bsngal rnams las sdug bsngal 'dzin par
T02D1186:129b-8: ae wam yi ger bzhugs pa yi //
T02D1186:129b-9: rdo rje sems dpas gtor ma bstan //
T02D1186:129b-10: zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1186:129b-11: rgyud ni rgyud gzhan gyis rtogs par bya'o zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa ste /
T02D1186:129b-12: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur du gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:129b-13: rdo rje gur gyi ting 'dzin bzhugs //
T02D1186:129b-14: 'byung po chen po'i gtor ma gsungs //
T02D1186:129b-15: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
T02D1186:129b-17: zla ba nyi ma tshangs lha sogs //
T02D1186:129b-18: tshangs pa'i ris ni dam pa ste //
T02D1186:129b-19: tshangs pa mdun na 'don nyid dang //
T02D1186:129b-20: dga' ldan 'thab bral gnas pa dang //
T02D1186:129b-21: rgyal po che las yang dag 'byung //
T02D1186:129b-22: gzhan gyis sprul la dbang sgyur dang /
T02D1186:129b-23: gang zhig 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang //
T02D1186:129b-24: gtsang ma'i gnas na gang gnas dang //
T02D1186:129b-25: bde ba can na 'dug pa rnams //
T02D1186:129b-26: 'og min du ni gnas rnams dang //
T02D1186:129b-28: sum cu rtsa gsum gnas pa rnams //
T02D1186:129b-29: de rnams thams cad steng du bsam //
T02D1186:129b-31: dbang po shar gyi 'dab mar bsam //
T02D1186:129b-32: mthar byed lho ru dgong par bya //
T02D1186:129b-33: chu bdag nub kyi 'dab ma la //
T02D1186:129b-34: byang du nor sbyin dgod par bya //
T02D1186:129b-35: me mtshams su ni me lha che //
T02D1186:129b-36: de bzhin bden bral bden bral du'o //
T02D1186:129b-37: rlung gi phyogs su rlung bsam ste //
T02D1186:129b-39: stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang //
T02D1186:129b-40: mtha' yas de bzhin nor rgyas bu //
T02D1186:129b-41: 'jog po dang ni rigs ldan nyid //
T02D1186:129b-42: pad chen padma bzang po dang //
T02D1186:129b-43: lha min sems can dmyal ba rnams //
T02D1186:129b-45: aom yig las gang tshangs lha sogs //
T02D1186:129b-46: h'um yig las gang brgya byin sogs //
T02D1186:130a-2: lag gnyis gdong gcig can rnams te //
T02D1186:130a-3: steng gi tshangs sogs lha rnams dkar //
T02D1186:130a-4: dbang po la sogs nag po mtshungs //
T02D1186:130a-5: stobs rgyu la sogs dmar po che //
T02D1186:130a-7: rdo rje dril bus lag pa brel //
T02D1186:130a-8: g-yas brkyang ba yi 'dug stangs gnas //
T02D1186:130a-9: tshangs sogs brtags pas phyag rgyas gdab //
T02D1186:130a-10: rdo rje can gyis brgya byin sogs //
T02D1186:130a-11: stobs rgyu sogs rnams gar dbang gis //
T02D1186:130a-12: thams cad rigs gsum las byung ba'o //
T02D1186:130a-13: da ni thog mar yam yig yongs su gyur pa'i
T02D1186:130a-14: rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu lta bu rgyal mtshan gyis
T02D1186:130a-15: mtshan pa'o // de'i steng du ram yig yongs su
T02D1186:130a-16: gyur pa me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa rtse mo
T02D1186:130a-18: de'i dbus su a'a: yig yongs su gyur pa'i thod pa'o //
T02D1186:130a-19: thod pa'i dbus su lcags kyu lnga dang sa bon lnga rnams zhes pa ste /
T02D1186:130a-20: h'um yig gis glang po che'i //
T02D1186:130a-21: h'um yig gis ba glang gi / aam yig gis khyi'i //
T02D1186:130a-23: kham yig gis mi'i ste lcags kyu lnga rnams so //
T02D1186:130a-24: sgyu ma chen po'i rgyud du gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:130a-25: so gnyis myur 'gro nyid dang ni //
T02D1186:130a-26: de bzhin ba glang khyi nyid dang //
T02D1186:130a-27: chen po nyid dang mnyam par ldan //
T02D1186:130a-28: de bzhin ye shes bdud rtsi lnga //
T02D1186:130a-29: bi ra shu ma mu ste bdud rtsi lnga'i sa
T02D1186:130a-30: bon rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pas bdud rtsir bya'o
T02D1186:130a-31: // steng gi bar snang la h'um yig las byung
T02D1186:130a-32: ba'i rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa zla ba
T02D1186:130a-33: la gnas pa h'um yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa
T02D1186:130a-34: 'od zer dang bcas pa bsams nas /
T02D1186:130a-35: phyogs bcur son pa'i sman rnams 'od zer gyis bkug ste /
T02D1186:130a-36: de nyid du rab tu gzhug cing gcig tu 'dres par gyur par bsgom mo //
T02D1186:130a-37: aom yig gis kha bcad nas de kho na nyid gsum gyis byin gyis brlab po //
T02D1186:130a-38: de skad du yang dpal 'dus par gsungs pa //
T02D1186:130a-39: ye shes lnga yis byin brlabs pas //
T02D1186:130a-40: bdud rtsi lnga po zhes par bshad //
T02D1186:130a-41: sbar dang sro ba nyid dang ni //
T02D1186:130a-42: gsal bar byed dang gzugs bstan pa //
T02D1186:130a-43: sngags kyi lus su rab sbyor bas //
T02D1186:130a-44: bdud rtsi lnga po bza' bar bshad //
T02D1186:130a-45: rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor ba'i bdag
T02D1186:130a-46: nyid las yang dag par tshim par bya'o zhes pa'i
T02D1186:130a-47: don to // shel gyi rnam par bskyed nas ni //
T02D1186:130b-0: ye shes nyi ma gzhan @130b gzhan lta bu //
T02D1186:130b-1: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams su //
T02D1186:130b-2: don dam mtshon gyis bkug nas ni //
T02D1186:130b-3: bdud rtsi der ni bskyed byas nas //
T02D1186:130b-4: bra ba'i sbyor bas za ru gzhug / mchod yon zhabs bsil de bzhin dbul //
T02D1186:130b-5: sngags 'di yis ni tshim bar bya //
T02D1186:130b-6: aom ai ndu dza ma dza la dza kkha bh'u
T02D1186:130b-7: ta ba hni badza au ra kkha tsanda su dzdza
T02D1186:130b-8: m'a da p'a bpha ta la p'a t'a le aa
T02D1186:130b-10: ai dam ba lim bhu nydza dzim gha phu lla
T02D1186:130b-11: dhu pa mam sa bim gha aa mba k'a dzdza
T02D1186:130b-12: sa ppa sa dha kha nti khu ni phed g'a
T02D1186:130b-13: ta / aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a
T02D1186:130b-14: n'am a'a dya nu tpa nna tv'a ta aom a'a:
T02D1186:130b-16: aom badzra satva sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya /
T02D1186:130b-17: dri dho me bha wa su bo shyo me bha ba /
T02D1186:130b-18: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D1186:130b-19: sh'a shu to me bha wa aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D1186:130b-20: hram da yam me aa dhi tishtha sarba siddhi mme /
T02D1186:130b-23: me tsi ttam shre ya: ku ru h'um h'um /
T02D1186:130b-26: sarba ta th'a ga ta m'a me mu nytsa /
T02D1186:130b-27: badzr'i bha ba sa ma ya satva a'a: mu: zhes so //
T02D1186:130b-28: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud la rdo rje'i tshig gi
T02D1186:130b-29: snying po bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel du rgyud thams cad
T02D1186:130b-30: kyi phyag rgya bsdus pa'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u
T02D1186:130b-32: / da ni brtag pa gnyis pa la he ru
T02D1186:130b-33: ka mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u lnga
T02D1186:130b-34: pa gsungs pa / phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa //
T02D1186:130b-36: dpa' po thod pa'i phreng ba can //
T02D1186:130b-37: bdag med ma yis mgrin par 'khrud //
T02D1186:130b-38: phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin lha la //
T02D1186:130b-39: bdag med rang nyid kyis zhus pa //
T02D1186:130b-40: bco lngas yongs su bskor ba yis //
T02D1186:130b-41: bdag gi 'khor lo khyod kyis gsungs //
T02D1186:130b-42: khyod kyi 'khor lo ji ltar lags //
T02D1186:130b-43: gtso bo bdag gis sngar ma 'tshal //
T02D1186:130b-44: bdag med tsum pa na mdzad nas //
T02D1186:130b-45: rdo rje thod par stsal nas ni //
T02D1186:130b-46: sta na dag ni mnyes byas nas //
T02D1186:130b-47: dkyil 'khor yang dag rab gsal mdzad //
T02D1186:130b-48: 'khor lo ji ltar sngar gsungs bzhin //
T02D1186:130b-49: zhes pa la 'khor lo ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ste /
T02D1186:130b-50: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1186:130b-51: rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1186:130b-52: dra ba dra ba phyed par ldan //
T02D1186:130b-53: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes //
T02D1186:130b-54: me tog phreng dar lda ldi ldan //
T02D1186:130b-55: zhes pa la sogs pa drang ba'i don to //
T02D1186:130b-56: da ni nges pa'i don gsal bar bya ste /
T02D1186:130b-57: ji skad du rgyud ni rgyud gzhan gyis rtogs par
T02D1186:130b-58: bya'o zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa ste
T02D1186:130b-59: // dpal rdo rje bdud rtsir yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:131a-2: rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che //
T02D1186:131a-3: dga' chen yang dag sbyor ba yis //
T02D1186:131a-4: de la m'a ma k'i yis zhus //
T02D1186:131a-5: gsang ba'i padma gru gsum du //
T02D1186:131a-6: dkyil 'khor bri bya m'a ma k'i //
T02D1186:131a-8: ze 'bru gsang ba'i spyod yul te //
T02D1186:131a-9: de yi dbus su rig ma'o //
T02D1186:131a-10: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin las //
T02D1186:131a-12: dpal sambu tar gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:131a-13: dkyil 'khor lus zhes gsungs pa ste //
T02D1186:131a-14: sgo bzhi ji ltar gsungs pa nyid //
T02D1186:131a-15: lte ba'i dbus su padma che //
T02D1186:131a-16: kun mkhyen ye shes grags pa'o //
T02D1186:131a-17: gnas der gnas pa'i dpa' bo ni //
T02D1186:131a-18: cha med cha ni rnam par spangs //
T02D1186:131a-19: lus can rnams kyi lus la rol //
T02D1186:131a-20: lus las 'das pa gsal byed min //
T02D1186:131a-22: dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:131a-23: thams cad zla ba zhu mtshungs rang gi rdo rje'i kha nas yum gyi padmar spro bar bya //
T02D1186:131a-24: de ni nyi mar rab tu zhugs pa ro mnyam 'gyur te aa sogs ka sogs rab ldan pa //
T02D1186:131a-25: de yi dbus su zhi sogs las kyi ye shes sa bon du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis so //
T02D1186:131a-26: de yis rdzogs pa'i lha mo'am ni lha yang rnal 'byor pa la 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur //
T02D1186:131a-28: byang chub spyod dang de bzhin sa'i //
T02D1186:131a-29: ye shes dag pa zag pa med //
T02D1186:131a-30: de ni dkyil 'khor dbus su gnas //
T02D1186:131a-31: rang gi mtshan mar de ltar bya //
T02D1186:131a-33: de nas rnam pa lngas mngon par byang chub pa las rdzogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das /
T02D1186:131a-34: zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa //
T02D1186:131a-35: phyag ni bcu drug rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D1186:131a-36: bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa ste //
T02D1186:131a-38: mgo bo'i phreng ba'i do shal brgyan //
T02D1186:131a-39: nyi mar bzhugs shing gar stabs ldan //
T02D1186:131a-40: sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin //
T02D1186:131a-41: kha dog nag po 'jigs pa po //
T02D1186:131a-42: nyid kyi zhal nas h'um yig spro //
T02D1186:131a-43: thal bas lus la byugs pa nyid //
T02D1186:131a-44: dga' bas gnyis gnyis snyoms 'jug pa //
T02D1186:131a-45: bdag med ma dang lhan cig sbyor //
T02D1186:131a-46: rba rlabs med pa'i bde ba thob //
T02D1186:131a-47: rba rlabs med pa'i rang bzhin can //
T02D1186:131a-48: rtsa ba'i zhal ni nag po che //
T02D1186:131a-49: g-yas pa kunda lta bu ste //
T02D1186:131a-50: g-yon pa dmar po cher 'jigs pa //
T02D1186:131a-51: steng gi zhal ni gtsigs pa po //
T02D1186:131a-52: spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhis byug /
T02D1186:131b-0: @131b lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba bzhin //
T02D1186:131b-1: glang po rta bong glang rnga mo //
T02D1186:131b-2: mi dang sha ra bha byi la //
T02D1186:131b-3: g-yas pa'i thod pa brgyad rnams la //
T02D1186:131b-4: gnyis 'thung la sogs rim shes bya //
T02D1186:131b-5: sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni //
T02D1186:131b-6: me dang zla ba nyi ma nyid //
T02D1186:131b-7: mthar byed dang ni nor sbyin nyid //
T02D1186:131b-8: g-yon pa'i thod pa brgyad la'o //
T02D1186:131b-9: sgeg pa dpa' ba mi sdug pa //
T02D1186:131b-10: drag shul dgod pa 'jigs su rung //
T02D1186:131b-11: snying rje rngam pa zhi ba yis //
T02D1186:131b-12: gar dgu'i nyams dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1186:131b-13: lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma //
T02D1186:131b-14: nag mo dbu skyes dmar ser can //
T02D1186:131b-15: gri gug thod pa kha tv'am 'dzin //
T02D1186:131b-16: stag gi pags pa rked par dkris //
T02D1186:131b-17: dang po'i skyes bu bsgom byas nas //
T02D1186:131b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thig le de //
T02D1186:131b-20: sa bon brgyad po rnams su 'gyur //
T02D1186:131b-21: gam tsam bam gham pam sham lam dam //
T02D1186:131b-22: sa bon rnams kyis spro bar bya //
T02D1186:131b-23: dbang dkar gshin rjer chom rkun ma //
T02D1186:131b-24: chu ru ro langs ma gnas shing //
T02D1186:131b-26: dbang ldan du ni pukka s'i //
T02D1186:131b-27: byin za'i mtshams su ri khrod ma //
T02D1186:131b-28: bden bral mtshams su gtum mo gnas //
T02D1186:131b-29: rlung gi mtshams su g-yung mo nyid //
T02D1186:131b-30: lha mo'i 'khor lo yang dag ldan //
T02D1186:131b-31: de nas padma dang rdo rje byin gyis brlab par bya ste //
T02D1186:131b-32: aom padma su kh'a dh'a ra ma h'a r'a ga su khanda da //
T02D1186:131b-33: tsa tu ra a'a nan da bha ga bi shva h'um h'um k'a ryam ku ru sh'a me /
T02D1186:131b-34: aom badzra ma h'a dve sha tsa tu r'a nan
T02D1186:131b-35: da d'a ya ka kha ga mu khe ka r'a
T02D1186:131b-36: so n'a tha h'um h'um k'a ryam ku ru sh'a
T02D1186:131b-37: me / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu
T02D1186:131b-38: r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham
T02D1186:131b-39: me / / ho: yig gnyis kyi dbus su gnas
T02D1186:131b-40: pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi yi ge 'di
T02D1186:131b-41: ni dri za'i sems can du bshad de /
T02D1186:131b-42: lha mo'i mtsho skyes su bsam par bya'o //
T02D1186:131b-43: dri za yang dag zhugs pa na //
T02D1186:131b-44: zhu bar gyur pa dran par bya //
T02D1186:131b-45: de las mtshams kyi lha mo yis //
T02D1186:131b-46: bskul ba'i glu yis skul bar byed //
T02D1186:131b-47: ces pa drang ba'i don to //
T02D1186:131b-48: da ni nges pa'i don gsal bar bya ste //
T02D1186:131b-49: dpal dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od du gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:131b-50: de ltar sku dang gsung dang thugs las yang dag
T02D1186:131b-51: par byung ba 'og dang steng du shes rab kyi
T02D1186:131b-52: 'od zer rnams kyis zhu ba ste /
T02D1186:131b-53: shes rab chags pas zhu ba zhes pa la shes rab ni gtum mo ste des zhu ba'o //
T02D1186:131b-54: 'dir bskul ba rnam pa gnyis te gcig ni srog
T02D1186:131b-55: rdzogs pa'i ched du yin la gnyis pa ni lo
T02D1186:132a-0: bcu drug mtshams su bde ba 'grub @132a * //
T02D1186:132a-2: des na rdo rje can yang ri bong 'dzin pa
T02D1186:132a-3: zhu ba bzhin bltas nas yam yig las de ltar
T02D1186:132a-4: zhi ba'i bde ba'i 'bras bu ster ba lte ba
T02D1186:132a-5: dang gsang ba la sogs pa'i padmar rnam par shes
T02D1186:132a-6: pa brgyal ba rab tu sad par byed do zhes
T02D1186:132a-8: dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod par gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:132a-9: sgrib pa kun las nges par grol //
T02D1186:132a-10: mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas //
T02D1186:132a-11: nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das //
T02D1186:132a-12: dus gsum dus med rtogs pa po //
T02D1186:132a-14: dpal mtsho skyes rdo rje'i zhabs kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:132a-15: gang zhig zla nyi sbyar sar gnas sa bon //
T02D1186:132a-16: gnyis las skyes pa'i gtso bo rig mar bcas //
T02D1186:132a-17: nyid kyi sbyor bas 'jig rten gsum po ni //
T02D1186:132a-18: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams pa 'di sprul nas //
T02D1186:132a-19: 'di kun ma lus pa dang rig ma yang //
T02D1186:132a-20: bdag la bsdus nas bde ba dam pa stsol //
T02D1186:132a-21: shes rab chags ro bdud rtsi gnyug ma yi; ;
T02D1186:132a-22: gnas su thim pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1186:132a-23: stong pa dngos pos rnam par dman pa 'gro 'di mtha' dag dngos po'i ngo bo'i ring bzhin te /
T02D1186:132a-24: stong phyir sangs rgyas byang chub med la gzhan phan thugs rjes mtshan med dam bca' 'ang med //
T02D1186:132a-25: de ltar mtha' dag shes nas sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje de yang nges par dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02D1186:132a-26: dbang po dpag med yon tan can du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dkyil 'khor du bsam bya //
T02D1186:132a-27: gnas de las steng du gshegs pa'i don du rgyu
T02D1186:132a-28: mthun pa'i bde ba la pukka s'i la sogs pa
T02D1186:132a-29: rnams kyis rdo rje'i glu rnams kyis bskul bar mdzad
T02D1186:132a-30: do // de las lte bar rgyu mthun pa nyid
T02D1186:132a-31: kyi don du pukka s'i sa rab tu sad par
T02D1186:132a-32: do // mdzad do // snying gar ri khrod ma rnam par smin pa'i don du'o //
T02D1186:132a-33: mgrin par gtum mos skyes bu byed pa'i don du'o //
T02D1186:132a-34: mgo bor g-yung mos dri ma med pa nyid kyi don du'o //
T02D1186:132a-35: 'di lta bu la sogs pa rnams kyis bzhengs su 'jug par byed do zhes pa'o //
T02D1186:132a-36: dpal thams cad mkhyen pa 'jigs byed kyi rgyud du gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:132a-37: nam mkha' lta bur dmigs byas nas //
T02D1186:132a-38: glu 'di yis ni bskul gyur pa //
T02D1186:132a-39: skyes pa med pa'i rang bzhin yang //
T02D1186:132a-40: dang po'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' mtshungs //
T02D1186:132b-0: de ltar rtog pa med @132b pa'i dkyil 'khor du
T02D1186:132b-1: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis glus bzhengs su 'jug par
T02D1186:132b-2: mdzad do // zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
T02D1186:132b-4: lha mo rnams kyis glu mdzad bcom ldan khyod ni sems can kun la phan par mdzad pa po //
T02D1186:132b-5: bdag cag srungs shig lha mi'i bla ma rdo rje can 'dod don gnyer rnams la 'dod pa mdzod //
T02D1186:132b-7: rje btsun snying rje'i yid bzhengs shing //
T02D1186:132b-8: pu kka s'i ni bdag la skyobs //
T02D1186:132b-9: stong pa'i ting 'dzin nyid spongs la //
T02D1186:132b-10: bdag la bde chen sbyor bzhed mdzod //
T02D1186:132b-11: khyod med na ni bdag 'gum pas //
T02D1186:132b-12: kye yi rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig / stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la //
T02D1186:132b-13: ri khrod ma 'bras grub par mdzod //
T02D1186:132b-14: dga' gtso 'jig rten mgron gnyer nas //
T02D1186:132b-15: stong pa nyid la bzhugs sam ci //
T02D1186:132b-16: khyod med phyogs ni mi 'tshal bas //
T02D1186:132b-17: gdol ba mo bdag gzhu ba bgyid //
T02D1186:132b-18: bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis //
T02D1186:132b-19: mig 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhengs shig / g-yung mo bdag yid chad par 'gyur //
T02D1186:132b-20: snying rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig / da ni lha bzhengs pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D1186:132b-21: 'dir bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid la rab tu bzhugs pa la /
T02D1186:132b-22: glu rnams kyis rab tu sad par gyur pa ni phung po dang /
T02D1186:132b-23: khams dang skye mched la sogs pa thams cad dang
T02D1186:132b-24: 'gro ba mtha' dag sgyu ma lta bur gzigs nas
T02D1186:132b-25: sems can gyi don gyi ched du slar yang skye
T02D1186:132b-26: bar mdzad do // dpal shes rab kyi pha rol
T02D1186:132b-27: tu phyin par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T02D1186:132b-30: bcom ldan 'das de ma lags te /
T02D1186:132b-31: bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma de gzhan la gzugs de gzhan pa ma lags te /
T02D1186:132b-32: bcom ldan 'das gzugs kho na sgyu ma'o //
T02D1186:132b-33: sgyu ma kho na gzugs lags so //
T02D1186:132b-34: bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma de gzhan la tshor ba de yang gzhan /
T02D1186:132b-36: 'du byed de rnams kyang gzhan ma lags kyi //
T02D1186:132b-37: bcom ldan 'das de ltar sgyu ma kho na tshor
T02D1186:132b-38: ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams so zhes
T02D1186:132b-40: dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su yang gsungs pa //
T02D1186:132b-41: rdo rje can des glu rnams gsan nas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag mig 'phrul lta bur ni //
T02D1186:132b-42: gzigs nas bskyed pa mdzad de dri med 'od zer 'phro ba rang gi mtshan ma spro byas nas //
T02D1186:133a-0: rdo rje'i rgyan ldan rgyal ba'i @133a * //
T02D1186:133a-1: bdag po'i cod pan can ni shes rab ma yis 'khyud pa yang //
T02D1186:133a-2: shes rab thabs kyis rgyal po slar yang dkyil 'khor ma lus pa ni rab tu spro ba yang /
T02D1186:133a-3: slar yang de nyid du gsungs pa /
T02D1186:133a-4: rtag dang mi rtag mthong ste de lta na yang blun po'i blo can sems ni dag don ched //
T02D1186:133a-5: sgrub thabs brjod par bya ste snying por gyur pa 'ga' yang 'dir ni bsgrub par bya ba med //
T02D1186:133a-6: gang zhig bsgrub bya sgrub pa po de 'khrul zhes rdo rje can gyi sgrub thabs mtha' dag gang //
T02D1186:133a-7: de phyir rgyal po rang sems dri ma rnam par bral ba dkyil 'khor dbang por rab tu bya //
T02D1186:133a-9: aom h'um dag las rdo rje che //
T02D1186:133a-10: zhu ba'i gzugs las bzhengs pa ni //
T02D1186:133a-11: kha dog nag po drag chen po //
T02D1186:133a-12: spyan gsum pa dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba'i spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa /
T02D1186:133a-13: dpral ba'i steng du mgo bo lnga'i phreng bas rnam
T02D1186:133a-14: par brgyan pa smin ma 'khyog po dang bcas pa'i
T02D1186:133a-15: khro gnyer can la zhal gtsigs pa /
T02D1186:133a-16: zhal dang po nag po g-yas pa dkar ba /
T02D1186:133a-17: g-yon pa dmar ba slar yang g-yon gyi zhal gnyis nag pa /
T02D1186:133a-18: de bzhin du g-yas kyi zhal gnyis nag po steng zhal du ba'i mdog can rnam par 'gyur ba /
T02D1186:133a-19: zhal rnams thams cad mche ba gtsigs zhing spyan gsum pa can /
T02D1186:133a-20: phyag g-yas pa brgyad rnams su padma'i snod brgyad du
T02D1186:133a-21: rim pa ji lta bar glang po che dang rta
T02D1186:133a-22: dang bong bu dang ba lang dang rnga mo dang
T02D1186:133a-24: de bzhin du g-yon gyi thod pa brgyad rnams su /
T02D1186:133a-25: sa'i lha dang chu dang rlung dang me'i lha dang /
T02D1186:133a-26: zla ba dang nyi ma dang /
T02D1186:133a-28: nor sbyin can phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng bas sku la brgyan pa /
T02D1186:133a-29: gcer bu g-yas brkyang ba'i stabs kyi zhabs kyis bzhugs pa phung po dang /
T02D1186:133a-32: lha'i bu'i bdud pa ni mnan pa /
