T02D1186:133a-33: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gar stabs kyi tshul gyis bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1186:133a-34: bdag med ma nag mo phyag gnyis ma //
T02D1186:133a-35: gri gug dang thod pa dang bcas pa'i g-yas pa
T02D1186:133a-36: dang cig shos kyi phyag dag gis bcom ldan 'das
T02D1186:133a-37: la snyoms par zhugs pa gcer bu phyag rgya lnga
T02D1186:133a-38: dang ldan pa / spyan gsum pa dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa //
T02D1186:133a-39: mgo bo'i phreng bas mgo bor rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D1186:133b-0: mi mgo skam po'i phreng bas sku @133b la brgyan pa /
T02D1186:133b-1: g-yas brkyang ba'i zla ba'i zhabs stabs kyis mchog tu
T02D1186:133b-2: bde ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das la snyoms par
T02D1186:133b-3: zhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1186:133b-4: de la shar gyi sgor gam yig las byung ba'i
T02D1186:133b-5: goo r'i kha dog nag mo phyag g-yas bar gri
T02D1186:133b-6: gug dang / g-yon par nya ro hi ta can tshangs pa mnan pa /
T02D1186:133b-7: gzugs kyi phung po'i rang bzhin spro bar bya'o //
T02D1186:133b-8: lho'i sgor tsam yig las skyes pa'i chom rkun ma
T02D1186:133b-9: btsod kyi kha dog can phyag g-yas pa na cang
T02D1186:133b-10: te'u dang g-yon pa phag pa can dbang po la
T02D1186:133b-11: chibs pa tshor ba'i phung po'i rang bzhin spro bar
T02D1186:133b-12: bya'o // nub kyi sgor bam yig las skyes pa'i
T02D1186:133b-13: ro langs ma gser btso ma lta bu phyag g-yas
T02D1186:133b-15: g-yon pa na chu skyes kyi snod can nye dbang mnan pa /
T02D1186:133b-16: 'du shes kyi phung po'i rang bzhin bsam par bya'o //
T02D1186:133b-17: byang gi sgor gham yig las skyes pa'i za nus
T02D1186:133b-18: ma mar ka ta'i mdog can phyag g-yas pa na
T02D1186:133b-19: sbrul dang / g-yon pa na thod pa can drag
T02D1186:133b-20: po la chibs pa 'du byed kyi phung po'i rang
T02D1186:133b-22: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su pukka s'i bam yig las
T02D1186:133b-23: skyes pa sngon mo phyag g-yas pa na seng ge
T02D1186:133b-24: dang / g-yon pa na dgra sta can gshin rje
T02D1186:133b-25: mnan pa sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin rnam par bsam
T02D1186:133b-26: dang / par bya'o // me'i mtshams su sham yig
T02D1186:133b-27: las skyes pa'i ri khrod ma dkar mo g-yas pa
T02D1186:133b-29: g-yon pa na khar gsil can nor gyi 'dren pa la gnas pa /
T02D1186:133b-30: chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin dgod par bya'o //
T02D1186:133b-31: bden bral gyi mtshams su gtum mo nam mkha'i mdog can //
T02D1186:133b-32: tsam yig las skyes pa g-yas pa na 'khor lo 'dzin pa //
T02D1186:133b-33: phyag g-yon pa na thod gshol can srid po mnan
T02D1186:133b-34: pa me'i khams kyi rang bzhin can bsgom par bya'o
T02D1186:133b-35: // rlung gi phyogs su dam yig las skyes pa'i
T02D1186:133b-36: g-yung mo khra bo'i mdog can phyag g-yas pa na
T02D1186:133b-37: rdo rje dang g-yon pa sdigs mdzub can /
T02D1186:133b-38: thags bzangs ris la gnas pa rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin can bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1186:133b-39: 'di rnams thams cad spyan gsum pa zhal mche ba
T02D1186:133b-40: gtsigs pa can dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes
T02D1186:133b-41: pa / gcer bu phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa /
T02D1186:133b-42: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs pa //
T02D1186:133b-43: byang chub kyi spros pa las yang dag par byung ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1186:134a-1: sogs pa drang ba'i don to //
T02D1186:134a-2: da ni nges pa'i don gsal bar bya ste /
T02D1186:134a-4: 'di ltar lhan cig skyes pa gcig pu de kho na chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1186:134a-5: sprul pa ste rnam pa bzhi'o zhes so //
T02D1186:134a-6: dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:134a-7: shes rab ma yin thabs kyang min 'di lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ste chos kyi skur gyur pa //
T02D1186:134a-8: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin nges par mun pa dang bral ye shes rnam shes dbye ba las /
T02D1186:134a-9: 'di ni longs spyod rdzogs sku sgra brnyan lta bu sems can du ma'i don ni byed pa po //
T02D1186:134a-10: sems can rnams smin ched du slar yang 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur //
T02D1186:134a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' gcig 'di dus mtha'i sprin dang mtshungs pa he ru kar ni byung bar 'gyur //
T02D1186:134a-12: gdug pa rnams smin don te de yang dam tshig rgyal ba rmongs pa rnams ni bde ba'i don //
T02D1186:134a-13: rin chen dbang po sdug bsngal ldan pa'i de yang pad 'dzin chags can rnams kyi chags pa'i slad //
T02D1186:134a-14: bgegs rnams gzhom pa'i don du phyag gi padmar ral gri don yod grub pa 'byung bar 'gyur //
T02D1186:134a-15: sems can rnams ni smin pa'i slad du sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba rnams kyis dus kun du //
T02D1186:134a-16: des pa'i rdo rje can gyi bzhugs pa rnam gsum phyi dang nang dang gzhan du'ang rab tu 'gyur //
T02D1186:134a-17: phyi rol sna tshogs phyogs su 'gyur te mchog gi
T02D1186:134a-18: lus la srog gi rlung ni rab tu rgyu ba'o
T02D1186:134a-19: // khyab bdag gi gang sa sogs dkyil 'khor la
T02D1186:134a-20: rab gyur te rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga la
T02D1186:134a-21: // // gcig pu rdo rje can ni dbye ba
T02D1186:134a-22: gsum ste yul dang yul can khams rnams kyis kyang
T02D1186:134a-23: // // bskor // dus gsum gnas gsum du bzhugs
T02D1186:134a-24: srid pa gsum du gnas pa'ang sems can du ma'i
T02D1186:134a-25: // // bskor // don slad du'o // de ltar
T02D1186:134a-26: nges pa sku yi rdo rje mchog gi yon tan
T02D1186:134a-27: rnam mang dkyil 'khor rnam par gsungs //
T02D1186:134a-28: gsung gi rdo rje 'ang aa sogs ka sogs lha
T02D1186:134a-29: yi rnam pa nyid de mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs
T02D1186:134a-30: rnams kyi // stong pa drug gis thugs kyi rdo
T02D1186:134a-31: rje rnams gsum srid pa la gnas gtso bo'i rnam
T02D1186:134a-32: pa gcig / de bzhin ye shes rdo rje srid
T02D1186:134a-33: pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa sna tshogs yul gyi rang
T02D1186:134a-34: rnams kyi // bzhin no // zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1186:134a-35: h'um gi ye shes rjes su bsam par bya zhing /
T02D1186:134b-0: dam tshig gi 'khor lo @134b la ye shes kyi
T02D1186:134b-1: 'khor lo cher 'bar ba myur du gzhug par bya'o
T02D1186:134b-2: // zhes pa 'di'i don ni dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od du gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:134b-3: 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa la /
T02D1186:134b-4: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas nas /
T02D1186:134b-5: de nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang 'ching ba dang mnyes pa dang /
T02D1186:134b-6: ro mnyam par byed pa zhes pa la lang tsho
T02D1186:134b-7: can ma dang rab tu 'grogs pa la ye shes
T02D1186:134b-8: sems dpa' ni khu ba ste dgongs pa'i skad gzhan
T02D1186:134b-9: gyis so // de dgug pa ni srog la sogs pa'i rlung gi tshogs kyis byed de //
T02D1186:134b-10: steng du spyi bor byang chub kyi sems yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1186:134b-11: de zhu bar byas nas khu ba thig le'i gzugs mgrin pa dang snying ga dang lte ba dang /
T02D1186:134b-12: gsang ba'i padma la rab tu 'jug par byed do //
T02D1186:134b-13: sa'i khams ni thig le'i gzugs de'i bcing ba byed do //
T02D1186:134b-14: zhes pa mchog gi bde ba'i dbang gis shin tu mgyogs pas 'ongs pa 'gror mi ster ba'o //
T02D1186:134b-15: chu'i khams kyi thig le zhu ba dang gsang ba'i
T02D1186:134b-16: padma dang rdo rje nor bur gnas pa ni g-yo
T02D1186:134b-18: mi 'pho ba'i bde ba'i dbang gis brnyes pa ste lus la bsil ba nyid du byed do //
T02D1186:134b-19: dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:134b-20: shes rab chos 'byung la gnas mtha' dag slar yang spro ba byas te nges par thig le yis //
T02D1186:134b-21: sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan zhing me long la gnas lta bu'i ye shes 'khor lo rang byung ba //
T02D1186:134b-22: 'dod pa dang ni gzugs dang gzugs med srid pa rnam pa gsum po'ang rim pas sbyang byas te //
T02D1186:134b-23: phyi nas ye shes me lces srid pa gsum po mtha' dag dus gcig tu ni dgug par bya //
T02D1186:134b-24: zhes pa des pa'i don to //
T02D1186:134b-25: drang ba'i don gyis ni go sla'o //
T02D1186:134b-26: sku gsung de bzhin thugs la ni //
T02D1186:134b-27: aom a'a: h'um zhes gsang sngags las /
T02D1186:134b-28: mkha' la spyod dang sa spyod nyid //
T02D1186:134b-29: sa 'og gnas par bsam par bya //
T02D1186:134b-30: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi //
T02D1186:134b-31: rnal 'byor ma rnams rigs gsum byung //
T02D1186:134b-32: 'di'i nges pa'i don ni de bzhin du yang rgyud gzhan du gsungs te /
T02D1186:134b-33: mkha' la ste padma mkha' 'gro'i dbus su mkha' spyod
T02D1186:134b-34: ma 'khor lo sa dga' ba'i ngang tshul 'di ste
T02D1186:134b-35: der gnas pa'i legs par spyod pa ni mkha' spyod
T02D1186:134b-36: ma'i 'khor lor yang dag par bshad de /
T02D1186:135a-0: sa zhes pa sa'i dbus gnas pa @135a * //
T02D1186:135a-1: skye ba dang 'chi ba lte ba'i padma rnams la ste /
T02D1186:135a-2: der gnas pa'i legs par rnam par spyod pa ni
T02D1186:135a-3: sa spyod ma'i 'khor lo yang dag par bshad do
T02D1186:135a-4: // sa 'og ces pa gang gsungs pa padmar byang
T02D1186:135a-5: chub kyi sems ltung bar byed cing t'am lam ste
T02D1186:135a-6: yid kyis phyi rol du nus pa ni sa 'og
T02D1186:135a-7: tu gnas pa zhes mtshan ma'o //
T02D1186:135a-8: mig tu gti mug rdo rje la sogs pa'i rigs drug rnams dgod par bya'o //
T02D1186:135a-9: gsungs pa yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D1186:135a-11: rnam par nyed pa dang mtshan nyid dang bral ba rnams kyis dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1186:135a-12: de bzhin du mchod pa dang /
T02D1186:135a-14: bdud rtsi myang ba rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas bya'o zhes so //
T02D1186:135a-15: rang gi lag pa g-yas g-yon gyi //
T02D1186:135a-16: mthe bo ming med dag gis ni //
T02D1186:135a-17: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rlabs gnyis su //
T02D1186:135a-18: rnal 'byor ba yis btsir bar bya //
T02D1186:135a-19: phyi nas ye shes skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1186:135a-20: gzhon nu ma yid dga' ba bzhin //
T02D1186:135a-21: de la ci yang skye 'gyur te //
T02D1186:135a-22: lkugs pa'i rmi lam ji lta ba'o //
T02D1186:135a-23: zhes pa la 'dis rgyas par bshad pa gsungs te /
T02D1186:135a-24: rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:135a-25: g-yas dang g-yon zhes pa ni g-yas pa dang cig
T02D1186:135a-26: shos te 'di dag tha snyad ni gcig tu 'dres
T02D1186:135a-27: par gyur pa'i sems rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis na
T02D1186:135a-28: aa ba dh'u t'i ni lag pa'o //
T02D1186:135a-29: de'i rgan po dang ming med dag ste brkyang ma
T02D1186:135a-30: dang ro ma de dag gis shes rab dang thabs
T02D1186:135a-31: 'jug bzhin pa'i rnal 'byor ma dag gis kun rdzob
T02D1186:135a-32: dang don dam pa'i rlabs gnyis la btsir bar bya'o
T02D1186:135a-33: zhes pa la btsir ba ni kha sbyor ba dang
T02D1186:135a-34: 'khyud pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor pa'i longs spyod
T02D1186:135a-35: pa ro mnyam par byed pa ste /
T02D1186:135a-36: longs spyod par gyur pa na rlabs gnyis longs spyod pa'o //
T02D1186:135a-37: gzhon nu ma'i dga' ba zhes pa dus gnyis spangs
T02D1186:135a-38: pa chags pa dang bral ba zhes pa'i don to
T02D1186:135a-39: // lkugs pa'i rmi lam zhes pa bdag nyid kyis rang nyid kyi shes par bya'o //
T02D1186:135a-40: zhes pa ni brjod par mi nus pa ste /
T02D1186:135a-41: ngag gi lam las 'das pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1186:135a-43: lha de'i skad cig ci ltar lags //
T02D1186:135a-44: gtso bo chen po bshad du gsol //
T02D1186:135a-45: de la thog ma dbus mtha' med //
T02D1186:135a-46: srid med mya ngan 'das pa med //
T02D1186:135a-47: 'di ni mchog tu bde chen nyid //
T02D1186:135a-48: bdag med gzhan yang med pa'o //
T02D1186:135b-0: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud la rdo rje'i tshig @135b
T02D1186:135b-1: gi snying po bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel du brtag pa
T02D1186:135b-2: gnyis par he ru ka mngon par 'byung ba zhes
T02D1186:135b-3: bya ba ste le'u lnga pa'o /
T02D1186:135b-5: // / da ni phyag rgya lnga'i rnam par dag pa
T02D1186:135b-6: rab tu rgyas pa 'chad cing bris sku bsgrub pa'i
T02D1186:135b-7: le'u gsungs pa / lha mo la ni dam 'khyud cing //
T02D1186:135b-8: po la thod par bcug nas ni //
T02D1186:135b-9: zhes pa la bo la ni rdo rje'o //
T02D1186:135b-10: kam bde ba skyod par byed do zhes pas thod pa zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D1186:135b-11: dpal sam pu ta ru yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:135b-12: chos kyis dbyings kyi lus can rnams //
T02D1186:135b-13: thod pa la ni su zhig smod //
T02D1186:135b-14: yang dag sbyor ba'i bde bsgrubs nas //
T02D1186:135b-15: phyag rgya lnga ni rab gsal mdzad //
T02D1186:135b-16: dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod par gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:135b-17: bsam pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du //
T02D1186:135b-18: sems can rnams la rab gsal mdzod //
T02D1186:135b-19: nyon mongs ma lus bsal ba dang //
T02D1186:135b-20: mi shes ma lus gzhom slad du'o //
T02D1186:135b-22: bla ma slob dpon 'dod lha la //
T02D1186:135b-24: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la //
T02D1186:135b-25: smod tshig mi nyan pa yi ched //
T02D1186:135b-26: rna ba dag la rna cha 'dzin //
T02D1186:135b-27: sngags kyi bzlas pa mgul rgyan nyid //
T02D1186:135b-28: gdu bu srog chags gsod pa spang //
T02D1186:135b-29: phyag rgya bsten pa ska rags so //
T02D1186:135b-30: zhes pa drang pa'i don to //
T02D1186:135b-31: da ni nges pa'i don gsal par bya ste /
T02D1186:135b-32: bla ma slob dpon 'dod lha zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le'o //
T02D1186:135b-33: de'i 'dud pa ni 'pho ba ste de'i don du
T02D1186:135b-34: 'khor lo can 'dzin pa ste 'khor lo can ni
T02D1186:135b-36: smod tshig ces pa la smod tshig ni nyams pa'o //
T02D1186:135b-37: de mi nyan pa'i ched du rna ba dag la rna cha gzung bar bya ste /
T02D1186:135b-38: rna cha zhes pa ni rna cha 'ching ba'o //
T02D1186:135b-39: yid skyob par byed do zhes pas na sngags te bzlas pa zhes pa 'gog pa'i ched du /
T02D1186:135b-40: mgul rgyan zhes pa mgul rgyan 'ching ba'o //
T02D1186:135b-41: gdu bu srog chags gsod pa spang //
T02D1186:135b-42: zhes pa srog ni gang gi phyir sems su 'dod de /
T02D1186:135b-43: de gsod par mi bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1186:135b-44: phyag rgya ni las kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D1186:135b-45: bsten pa zhes pa bsten par bya ba'i ched du ska rags zhes pa ska rags 'ching ba'o //
T02D1186:135b-46: de ltar phyag rgya lnga'i man ngag bla ma brgyud
T02D1186:135b-47: pa'i rim pas nges pa'i don gyis shes par bya'o
T02D1186:135b-48: // de bzhin du yang dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su gsungs pa /
T02D1186:135b-49: me ni dngul chu'i dgra ni me dang rnam par bral na nam yang dngul chu'i 'ching ba med /
T02D1186:136a-0: ma bcings gser byed med de gser dang bral @136a * //
T02D1186:136a-1: na smra po nyid la longs spyod med pa nyid //
T02D1186:136a-2: de bzhin bud med sbyor ba bral na rtag tu rnal 'byor pa rnams sems ni 'ching mi 'gyur //
T02D1186:136a-3: bcings pa med na lus 'bigs med 'dir ma phug lus 'dir lhan skyes bde ba ster ba min //
T02D1186:136a-6: dang po'i 'khor lo can 'ching bcings pa gdu bu nges pa'i ska rags kyis ni dbugs 'byung 'gogs //
T02D1186:136a-7: mgrin rgyan rna rgyan phab pa rdo rje padma las
T02D1186:136a-8: skyes nor ni mthar phyin shin tu dag /'di ltar
T02D1186:136a-9: thun phyed thun du'ang nyin par dngul chu bzhin du
T02D1186:136a-10: sems kyi rdo rje bcing byas nas //
T02D1186:136a-11: kunda 'gugs pa'i sbyor bas steng du drangs te rang
T02D1186:136a-12: gi grong du khams la brgyus te bzhag / g-yo
T02D1186:136a-13: ba yongs su spangs byas nas //
T02D1186:136a-14: yang dag rlung rnams dgad par bya //
T02D1186:136a-15: bum pa can gyis rim par sbyin //
T02D1186:136a-16: gang gis rlung ni 'bab byed pa //
T02D1186:136a-17: nang gi rnal 'byor cho ga yis //
T02D1186:136a-18: rlung ni steng du spar bar bya //
T02D1186:136a-19: de yis sa bon rang nyid 'gro //
T02D1186:136a-20: rang gnas rnal 'byor rtogs las so //
T02D1186:136a-21: sa chu me dang rlung gi gzhan dbang ma yin gzhan min la min gzhan du min te mkhar /
T02D1186:136a-22: phung po khams dang skye mched kyis byas go 'phang ma yin thog ma dbus mthar 'gro ba'ang min //
T02D1186:136a-23: chags la min nyid chags bral la min 'byung ba'i dus su 'di ltar btsal bzhin pa ma yin //
T02D1186:136a-24: skyed la he ru ka min 'di ni ro mnyam dus su rab nub ga la bdud rtsi'i dpal //
T02D1186:136a-26: dpal dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od du gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:136a-27: 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang po gnyis kyi snyoms
T02D1186:136a-28: par 'jug pas bde ba chen po bsgrub par gsungs
T02D1186:136a-29: pa gang yin pa ni bden te bcom ldan 'das
T02D1186:136a-30: kyis gsungs pa / chags pa gang gis sems can
T02D1186:136a-31: rnams ni nyams par gyur pa de yis skyob pa
T02D1186:136a-32: kyis gsungs pa / rnams grol te // sems can
T02D1186:136a-33: rnams kyis nyin zhag so so'i dus su srung byed
T02D1186:136a-34: gang de skyob rnams gtong bar byed //
T02D1186:136a-35: sems can rnams kyis rang snying la gnas bde ba gang gtong de ni rgyal rnams srung bar mdzad //
T02D1186:136a-36: de nas rgyal ba mchog gi spyod 'di lha klu lha min rnams kyi bya ba dka' bar 'gyur //
T02D1186:136a-39: gzhan gang chung zad spros pa yod pa'ang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor la ni 'byung po las skyes mthar //
T02D1186:136b-0: thams cad sems can don gyur mchog gi yon @136b
T02D1186:136b-1: tan rnam mang rang gi lus la rig par bya
T02D1186:136b-2: // de bzhin rgyud sngags rnam mang rigs la gnas
T02D1186:136b-3: rnams rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor dbye ba las
T02D1186:136b-4: // // 'dir ni dbang bskur rnam pa gnyis kyang
T02D1186:136b-5: bu yi yon tan dbang gis 'jig rten 'jig rten
T02D1186:136b-7: lhan skyes gzugs can kye rdo rje //
T02D1186:136b-8: de la lha mo nges zhus pa //
T02D1186:136b-9: cho ga ji lta bu zhig gis //
T02D1186:136b-10: bris sku bri bar bya zhes so //
T02D1186:136b-11: 'di nyid bdag gis mi shes pas //
T02D1186:136b-12: bde ba chen po bshad du gsol //
T02D1186:136b-14: zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1186:136b-16: dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen //
T02D1186:136b-17: dbang po bsam pa mkhyen mchog gis //
T02D1186:136b-19: chos 'byung bris sku bzang po la //
T02D1186:136b-20: byang chub sems kyi lha nyid ni //
T02D1186:136b-21: de ni bde chen ngo bo yis //
T02D1186:136b-22: rnal 'byor rigs pas rtag tu mchod //
T02D1186:136b-23: dpal he ru ka mngon par 'byung bar yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:136b-25: skrag pa thams cad spangs pa ste //
T02D1186:136b-26: bris sku'i gzugs ni sna tshogs kyi //
T02D1186:136b-27: sngags pas cho ga bzhin du bri //
T02D1186:136b-28: rnal 'byor ma yi yan lag gnas //
T02D1186:136b-29: sgrub pa po yis mtshon pa'o //
T02D1186:136b-31: mi yi thod gnas kha dog lngas //
T02D1186:136b-32: sihla ga pur bsgos pa yis //
T02D1186:136b-33: zhes pa la sogs pa rnams ni mi'i thod par
T02D1186:136b-34: gnas pa'i kha dog lnga pa lnga can gyis sihla
T02D1186:136b-35: dang ga bur la sogs pa rnams te /
T02D1186:136b-36: glu'i rim pa'i man ngag gi nges pa'i don gyis go sla'o //
T02D1186:136b-37: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud la rdo rje'i tshig gi
T02D1186:136b-38: snying po bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel du bris sku'i cho
T02D1186:136b-42: // / da ni glegs bam gyi cho ga sngon ma can
T02D1186:136b-43: bza' ba brjod pa'i ched du dam tshig gi le'u
T02D1186:136b-44: gsungs pa yang // gro gar bri zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1186:136b-46: gro ga zhes pa ni sa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1186:136b-47: bo ti ni mchog gi yi ge ste a'a li
T02D1186:136b-48: dang k'a li'i rab tu sbyor bas bklag par bya'o
T02D1186:136b-49: // bzlas pa'o zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
T02D1186:136b-50: rdo rje can gyi bza' ba bstan //
T02D1186:136b-51: rgyud gzhan du yang gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:136b-52: rdo rje can zhes pa bde ba chen po'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1186:136b-53: bza' ba zhes pa 'chad bar 'gyur ba la brjod par bya'o //
T02D1186:137a-0: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa goo r'i la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma @137a * //
T02D1186:137a-1: brgyad kyi 'khor dang gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la
T02D1186:137a-2: sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams te
T02D1186:137a-3: / de rnams 'dus pa'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du
T02D1186:137a-4: kye'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid can tshogs kyi gtso bor
T02D1186:137a-5: / gyur nas / gnas dang bdag nyid dang rnal
T02D1186:137a-6: 'byor srung ba'i don du bgegs thams cad bzlog par
T02D1186:137a-7: / gyur nas / bya'o // dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod par gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:137a-8: rgyal ba dgra rgyal rnam par rgyal //
T02D1186:137a-9: 'khor los sgyur ba stobs po che //
T02D1186:137a-10: tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi gtso //
T02D1186:137a-11: tshogs rje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan //
T02D1186:137a-13: da ni bza' ba 'grub pa'i gnas gsungs pa /
T02D1186:137a-14: dur khrod ces pa la sogs pa ste der nang
T02D1186:137a-15: gi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sngon
T02D1186:137a-16: du byas te bza' ba dang longs spyod bya ba
T02D1186:137a-17: dang / btung ba la sogs pa sbar ba dang /
T02D1186:137a-18: bsro ba la sogs pa'i rim pas thams cad rnam par sbyangs nas /
T02D1186:137a-19: lam gsum pa'i me'i thab tu bdud rtsi lta bur sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1186:137a-20: ci'i rang bzhin can zhes dogs pa la gsungs pa rgyud gzhan du yang gsungs te /
T02D1186:137a-21: chu gter shin tu bkra ba dang //
T02D1186:137a-22: 'gram ni ri yi dbang po ldan //
T02D1186:137a-23: thibs po mdzes pa'i snying po can //
T02D1186:137a-24: gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod du //
T02D1186:137a-25: sna tshogs rgyal mtshan ba dan dang //
T02D1186:137a-26: dril bu do shal gyis mdzes pa //
T02D1186:137a-27: srid gsum bskyed pa 'khor lo ste //
T02D1186:137a-28: dkyil 'khor de ni lus yin no //
T02D1186:137a-30: de nas 'di la tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sngar
T02D1186:137a-31: bshad pa'i rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa'i dmangs rigs
T02D1186:137a-32: la sogs pa rigs sum cu rtsa drug gi pho
T02D1186:137a-33: nya mo rnams kyi bza' ba dang btung ba la
T02D1186:137a-34: sogs pa'i cho ga brjod par bya ste //
T02D1186:137a-35: skye bo dang bral ba'i khyim du gsang ba'i gnas
T02D1186:137a-36: su rigs kyi pho nya mo thams cad gos dang
T02D1186:137a-38: sgrub pa po yang phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan pa
T02D1186:137a-39: rang rang gi gnas su rnal 'byor ma rnams skra
T02D1186:137a-40: grol ba sgrub pa po yang gtsug phud bcings pa'o
T02D1186:137a-41: // stan du rtag bya ba zhes pa la sogs
T02D1186:137a-42: pa la ro'i pags pa'i steng du gnas pa rnams
T02D1186:137a-43: // so // tshogs kyi bdag po ni stag gi pags pa'i steng du 'khor lo'i dbus su'o //
T02D1186:137a-44: ro'i pags pa khru gang ba tsam gyis sder byas nas /
T02D1186:137a-45: tshogs kyi gtso bo la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1186:137a-46: shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi rnal 'byor
T02D1186:137b-0: ma rnams la rta dang khyi dang mi dang @137b
T02D1186:137b-1: glang po che dang ba lang rnams kyi pags pa'i
T02D1186:137b-3: dbang ldan gyi rnal 'byor ma dang bden bral phyogs
T02D1186:137b-4: kyi rnal 'byor ma dang rlung gi mtshams kyi rnal
T02D1186:137b-5: 'byor ma dang / me mtshams kyi rnal 'byor ma
T02D1186:137b-6: rnams la ba lang dang bong bu dang ce sbyang
T02D1186:137b-7: dang rnga mo'i pags pa'i sder sbyin par bya ste
T02D1186:137b-8: 'byor ma dang / / rang rang gi rigs shi ba rnams kyi'o //
T02D1186:137b-10: cha gcig pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1186:137b-11: padma dum bu gcig pa dang /
T02D1186:137b-14: ji ltar rnyed pa rnal 'byor ma rnams la btung ba'i don du sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1186:137b-15: de nas bza' ba sder du byin nas sgrub pa pos bskor ba lan gsum byas te /
T02D1186:137b-16: dri dang me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pa
T02D1186:137b-17: rnams kyis mchod la yongs su bsngo ba bya ste
T02D1186:137b-18: / bsod nams 'di yis sems can rnams thams cad
T02D1186:137b-19: phyag rgya chen po thob par gyur cig ces pa'o
T02D1186:137b-20: / // tshogs kyi 'khor lo 'di rgyal pos bya ste /
T02D1186:137b-21: thun mong du ni sngags kyi stobs kyis sam lha'i nges pas so //
T02D1186:137b-22: gzhan du ni sgrub pa po rnams la bar chad du 'gyur ro //
T02D1186:137b-23: thun mong ba'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni yul dang
T02D1186:137b-24: rigs kyi tha snyad kyis bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi
T02D1186:137b-26: rang gi rang rigs kyis smin pa'i rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis so //
T02D1186:137b-27: gzhan du ni tshogs kyi 'khor lor mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1186:137b-28: shes rab dang thabs kyi bde ba byang chub kyi
T02D1186:137b-29: sems myang ba med par bza' ba dang btung ba
T02D1186:137b-30: 'ba' zhig pas ni dpa' bo'i ston mor brjod par
T02D1186:137b-31: bya'o // de yang slob dpon la sogs pa la dge bsnyen rnams kyis bya'o //
T02D1186:137b-32: sngags kyi tshul 'dir slob dpon rnam pa gsum ste
T02D1186:137b-33: khyim na gnas pa dang dge tshul dang dge slong
T02D1186:137b-34: chung du dang 'bring dang mchog go //
T02D1186:137b-35: dge slong gnyis dag gi nang nas thog mar dbang bskur ba thu po dang /
T02D1186:137b-36: dge tshul gnyis kyi nang nas sngon la dbang bskur ba rgan pa dang /
T02D1186:137b-37: khyim pa gnyis kyi nang nas sngar dbang bskur ba gtso bo'o //
T02D1186:137b-38: de ltar rdo rje slob dpon thams cad mkhyen pa'i
T02D1186:137b-39: rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo la
T02D1186:137b-40: shar du mngon par phyogs pa sbyin pa'i bdag pos
T02D1186:137b-42: dge slong gzhan rnams kyang rgan pa dang /
T02D1186:138a-0: gzhon pa'i rim pas de nas nye bar 'khod par @138a * //
T02D1186:138a-2: de bzhin du byang du kha phyogs pas dge tshul gyi slob dpon gyi gral te /
T02D1186:138a-3: bden bral mtshams nas me'i mthar thug par ro //
T02D1186:138a-4: dbang ldan nas rlung gi mthar thug par lhor kha
T02D1186:138a-5: phyogs pas rgan pa dang gzhon pa'i dbye bas khyim
T02D1186:138a-6: na gnas pa'i slob dpon gyi gral 'o //
T02D1186:138a-7: shar du dge slong ma dbang bskur ba rnams nub
T02D1186:138a-8: tu kha phyogs par rgan pa dang gzhon pa'i dbye
T02D1186:138a-11: bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa shar du bya'o //
T02D1186:138a-12: dbus su rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor med na ba byung gi chu yis gru bzhi pa byas te /
T02D1186:138a-13: der dri dang me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas /
T02D1186:138a-14: tshogs kyi bdag po'i g-yon du las kyi phyag rgya gcig gzhag par bya ste /
T02D1186:138a-15: tshogs kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya byas nas so //
T02D1186:138a-16: gzhan du na rnal 'byor ma med par tshogs kyi bdag pos btung bar mi bya ste /
T02D1186:138a-17: tshogs kyi 'khor lo la dbang bskur ba'i sbyin pa'i
T02D1186:138a-18: bdag pos tshogs kyi bdag po la bsod nams 'phel
T02D1186:138a-19: ba'i don du phyag rgya mo nges par dbul bar
T02D1186:138a-20: bya'o // gzhan du na sbyin pa'i bdag po la rtsa ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1186:138a-21: dang po'i sangs rgyas su gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:138a-22: chad ni shes rab rang bzhin sbrang rtsi dang bcas bu ram skyes sam 'bras skyes shing skyes te //
T02D1186:138a-23: phyag rgya dang bral 'thung byed gang de yul can du 'gyur bdud kyi tshogs kyis bskor de'i phyir //
T02D1186:138a-24: shes rab lhag ldan sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog cing sngags pa rnams la dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur //
T02D1186:138a-25: phyag rgya gang su rung ba 'dir ni dam tshig rnams bral btung ba'i slad du rab tu bya //
T02D1186:138a-27: gang du dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa dag gi
T02D1186:138a-28: nang nas rgan pa rmongs pa dang gzhon pa ston
T02D1186:138a-29: pa po yin na der gzhon pa tshogs kyi bdag
T02D1186:138a-30: po rgan po rmongs pa ni khang pa gzhan du
T02D1186:138a-31: tshim par bya'o // de ltar rim pas thams cad shes par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1186:138a-32: dge bsnyen ma dbang bskur ba ni nub tu mngon
T02D1186:138a-33: par phyogs pa ste dge slong ma'i gral bzhin no
T02D1186:138a-34: // tshogs kyi gtso mo'i g-yon du thabs sbyin pa'i bdag pos gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1186:138a-35: rnam pa gzhan du na thabs med par tshogs kyi
T02D1186:138a-36: gtso mos myos byed dang sha bza' bar mi bya'o
T02D1186:138a-37: // de nas tshogs kyi bdag po la sogs pa
T02D1186:138a-38: la g-yon skor du bza' ba dang ston mo dbul
T02D1186:138b-0: @138b bar bya zhing btung ba ni kham phor ram
T02D1186:138b-1: n'a ri ka la sogs pa'i snod du dbul bar
T02D1186:138b-2: // bya'o // de nas myos byed la sogs pa
T02D1186:138b-3: sbyangs shing rgyas par byas la sbar nas bdud rtsir
T02D1186:138b-4: // bya'o // byas te / gtor ma la sogs pa phul nas /
T02D1186:138b-5: 'chad par 'gyur pa'i bdud rtsi ril bus bsang gtor
T02D1186:138b-6: byas te lag pa g-yon pas aom yig gis sbyang
T02D1186:138b-7: bar bya'o // lag pa g-yas pas a'a: yig gis rgyas par bya'o //
T02D1186:138b-8: thal mo bkab nas h'um yig gis 'bar bar bya'o //
T02D1186:138b-9: bya khyung gi phyag rgyas ho: yig gis bdud rtsir
T02D1186:138b-10: byas nas myos byed kyi thigs pas g-yon pa'i ming
T02D1186:138b-11: med kyi rtse mos sa gzhi la chos 'byung gru
T02D1186:138b-12: gsum pa dang / dbus su thig le zlum po
T02D1186:138b-13: byas nas de'i dbus su ye shes kyi 'khor lo
T02D1186:138b-14: shin tu dang ba lha'i bdag nyid gzugs brnyan dang
T02D1186:138b-15: mtshungs pa de tshim par bya ste /
T02D1186:138b-17: zhing skyong la sogs pa rnams kyi grong khyer dang
T02D1186:138b-18: grong gi ming gi yi ge mnyam pa rnams dang
T02D1186:138b-19: po dang mtha'i yi ge dag gis ming gi yi
T02D1186:138b-20: ge gnyis dang ming gi yi ge mi mnyam pa
T02D1186:138b-21: rnams kyi dang po dang bar dang mtha' rnams kyis
T02D1186:138b-22: yi ge gsum ming du 'gyur ro //
T02D1186:138b-23: dang por aom yig dang bar du ming dang mthar a'a: h'um ste dper na /
T02D1186:138b-24: aom che ge mo a'a: h'um /
T02D1186:138b-25: ba lim gri hna gri hna sarba sa tv'a n'am ra ksham ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1186:138b-26: de bzhin du aom h'a r'i ti pi na da ke pra t'i tstsha kishim sv'a h'a /
T02D1186:138b-27: 'phrog ma la chang bu gnyis so //
T02D1186:138b-28: aom du t'i ke aa gra gr'a sam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1186:138b-29: aom a'a: h'um gi sngags kyis bsngags par byas nas
T02D1186:138b-30: bza' bar 'gyur ba ji srid pa sa [?] la
T02D1186:138b-31: gzhag par bya'o // aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a
T02D1186:138b-32: hi au tstshi shta ba lim au tstshi stha bha
T02D1186:138b-34: lhag ma'i gtor ma'i sngags so //
T02D1186:138b-35: 'di yang sngar gsungs pa'i 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1186:138b-36: ji ltar rjes su mthun pa'i dus su thams cad so sor bya'o //
T02D1186:138b-37: de nas slob dpon slob ma dang bcas pa thams cad kyis bza' ba dang btung ba bya'o //
T02D1186:138b-38: gang gi tshe 'ga' zhig 'thab pa dang rtsod pa byed pa de gdon par bya'o //
T02D1186:138b-39: gang gi tshe dge slong dam dge tshul lam /
T02D1186:138b-40: khyim na gnas pa nga rgyal byed na de'i tshe nus pa dri bar bya'o //
T02D1186:138b-41: gal te mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i nus
T02D1186:138b-42: pa ston par byed na de'i tshe de ni thams
T02D1186:138b-43: cad du thams cad kyi tshogs kyi gtso bo ste
T02D1186:139a-1: thos pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang /
T02D1186:139a-2: dbang bskur gyis rgan pa'i nga rgyal gyis dge tshul
T02D1186:139a-3: lam khyim na gnas pa tshogs kyi 'dren par mi
T02D1186:139a-4: 'gyur gyi gang sngar dge slong yin pa de thams
T02D1186:139a-6: ci ste tshogs kyi 'khor lo la bton pa chad
T02D1186:139a-7: pa slong na de'i tshe bza' ba dang btung ba
T02D1186:139a-8: la sogs pa de las chad pa sbyin par bya
T02D1186:139a-9: ste tshogs kyi bdag pos so //
T02D1186:139a-10: de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor lo la bza' ba dang
T02D1186:139a-11: btung ba la sogs pa la cho ga 'di thams
T02D1186:139a-12: cad du sbyin pa'i bdag pos bya'o zhes pa drang
T02D1186:139a-13: ba'i don to // da ni nang gi tshogs kyi
T02D1186:139a-14: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gsal bar bya ste gsungs
T02D1186:139a-15: ba'i don to // pa yang / der bcom ldan
T02D1186:139a-16: 'das bde ba chen po'i 'khor los sgyur ba yang
T02D1186:139a-17: dag pa'i tshul gyi bdag nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
T02D1186:139a-18: dran pa sngon du 'gro bas rang gi sku'i dkyil
T02D1186:139a-19: 'khor la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1186:139a-20: tshim par bya'o zhes khyad par du 'phags pa'i nga
T02D1186:139a-21: rgyal bskyed la dang por gzugs la sogs pa yul
T02D1186:139a-22: rnam pa gsum myangs nas de'i rjes su sbyang pa
T02D1186:139a-23: la sogs pa'i cho gas bza' ba thams cad mngon
T02D1186:139a-24: par 'dus byas te rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i nang
T02D1186:139a-25: gi thab khung rjes su dran par byas la /
T02D1186:139a-26: dam tshig sems dpa'i zhal du rtse gsum pa'i me'i dbus su sreg blugs sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1186:139a-27: zhes nga rgyal bskyed nas bza' bar bya'o //
T02D1186:139a-28: de las bde bar 'jug par byed cing bcud len du 'gyur ro //
T02D1186:139a-29: de ltar sgrub pa pos bza' ba dang ston mo
T02D1186:139a-30: dang btung ba la sogs pa rnams kyis sku'i rdo
T02D1186:139a-31: rje rim par byas nas mthar lnga pa reg bya'i
T02D1186:139a-33: rim pa 'di yis lhan cig spyod pa la sogs
T02D1186:139a-34: pa lha mo'i 'khor lo rjes su chags par byed
T02D1186:139a-35: pa la mkhas pa bltas nas ji ltar mngon par
T02D1186:139a-36: 'dod pa'i phyag rgya mo blangs te /
T02D1186:139a-37: brtags la bzhag nas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub
T02D1186:139a-38: 'grub par bya'o zhes bstan par mos pa bskyed nas
T02D1186:139a-39: 'khyud pa dang 'o byed pa dang 'jib pa dang
T02D1186:139a-40: / sen mo 'debs pa dang sid yig dang /
T02D1186:139a-42: bung ba'i sgra yis rtsa rnams rgyas pa la sogs
T02D1186:139a-43: pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyil mo krung
T02D1186:139a-44: dang rdo rje'i skyil mo krung dang /
T02D1186:139a-45: rin po che'i skyil mo krung dang /
T02D1186:139a-46: las kyi skyil mo krung la sogs pa bcing ba bcings nas las la gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1186:139a-47: de nas shes rab dang thabs snyoms par zhugs pas
T02D1186:139b-0: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung bsrubs pa @139b las lhan
T02D1186:139b-1: cig skyes pa'i me rab tu sbar nas phung po
T02D1186:139b-2: la sogs pa'i rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1186:139b-3: cad kyi spyi bo nas brtsams nas rtsa stong phrag
T02D1186:139b-4: bdun cu rtsa gnyis su 'bab pa'i rgyun gyi rnam
T02D1186:139b-5: pas a'a li dang k'a lir zhu bar gyur nas
T02D1186:139b-6: / 'dod chags dang chags bral dang chags pa bar
T02D1186:139b-7: ma'i rim pas gang de las shes rab kyi pha
T02D1186:139b-8: rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid so sor rang
T02D1186:139b-9: gi bdag nyid kyis rig par bya ba mdzad do
T02D1186:139b-10: / // chos 'phags kyi le'ur yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:139b-11: chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid kyis na /
T02D1186:139b-12: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do //
T02D1186:139b-13: chos thams cad mtha' las 'das pa nyid kyis na /
T02D1186:139b-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' las 'das pa nyid do //
T02D1186:139b-15: chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid kyis na /
T02D1186:139b-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do //
T02D1186:139b-18: der bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po chos kyi
T02D1186:139b-19: 'byung gnas aa ra li chen po la rol ba'i
T02D1186:139b-20: rang bzhin bstan pa'i don du yid gzhan du mi
T02D1186:139b-21: 'phro bar phan tshun rab tu dga' ba'i don du
T02D1186:139b-22: sangs rgyas kyi gar byed do //
T02D1186:139b-23: rim pa 'di yis te phyag rgya dang /
T02D1186:139b-24: phyag rgya'i lan bcing ba dang /
T02D1186:139b-27: gar dang gar kyi lan dang /
T02D1186:139b-30: ngag gi brda yis tha snyad du bya'o //
T02D1186:139b-31: de ltar 'jig rten bsam gtan spangs bzhin pa yid
T02D1186:139b-32: kyi chags pa bcom nas rtag tu dga' ba yid
T02D1186:139b-34: rnal 'byor ma rnams dang lhan cig dga' bzhin pa
T02D1186:139b-35: ji ltar rgyal po ai ndra bh'a ti bzhin du
T02D1186:139b-37: rdo rje'i lus su gyur nas btsun mo dang lhan
T02D1186:139b-38: cig mi snang bar gyur cing dbang phyug gi yon
T02D1186:139b-39: tan brgyad dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
T02D1186:139b-40: sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o zhes pa nges pa'i
T02D1186:139b-41: don to // da ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa dang /
T02D1186:139b-42: kha la sogs pa dag pa'i don du dam tshig gi ril bu brjod par bya ste /
T02D1186:139b-43: nyi ma so sor dam tshig bzhi sngags pas bya'o //
T02D1186:139b-44: zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o zhe na /
T02D1186:139b-46: rgyu gang gi phyir mtshan ma dang kha na ma
T02D1186:139b-47: tho ba dang bcas pas srog gcod par 'gyur ba
T02D1186:139b-48: rgyu de'i phyir rnal 'byor pas mtshan ma med pa
T02D1186:139b-49: kha na ma tho ba med pa go ku la
T02D1186:139b-50: sogs pa bza' bar bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas gsungs
T02D1186:140a-0: so // 'dir nam mkha' la sogs pa @140a * //
T02D1186:140a-1: yon tan re re 'phel ba'i dbye bas blangs nas
T02D1186:140a-2: bdud rtsi lnga dang gcig tu byas te rdzas bcu
T02D1186:140a-15: gtor ma che zhing rgya che ba byin nas sngags kyi cho ga 'di yin te /
T02D1186:140a-16: aom badzra kro dhi shva ri /
T02D1186:140a-18: bi sho dha ya h'um phat ces pa rdzas sbyang ba'i sngags so //
T02D1186:140a-19: sran ma mu dga'i tshad kyi ril bu bya zhing sbar ba dang /
T02D1186:140a-20: bsro ba bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i rim pas
T02D1186:140a-21: yi ge gsum gyi byin gyis brlab pa byas nas
T02D1186:140a-23: ril bus bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa
T02D1186:140a-24: thab kyi zlum po las byung ba dang lhan cig
T02D1186:140a-25: bsang gtor bya ste rnam par dag par 'gyur ro
T02D1186:140a-26: // khar bcug pas kha rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
T02D1186:140a-27: tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang bsgom pa'i dus su yang thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1186:140a-28: de ltar ril bu'i cho ga'i nges pa'o //
T02D1186:140a-29: de skad du yang dpal mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur du gsungs pa /
T02D1186:140a-30: sha lnga dang ni yang dag ldan //
T02D1186:140a-31: lcags gsum gyis ni dkris byas pa //
T02D1186:140a-32: rdo rje nyi ma'i rab sbyor gyis //
T02D1186:140a-35: rnal 'byor pa la dngos grub ster //
T02D1186:140a-36: zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
T02D1186:140a-37: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud la rdo rje'i tshig gi
T02D1186:140a-38: snying po bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel du bza' ba'i le'u
T02D1186:140a-40: / da ni brgyad pa 'dul ba'i le'u gsungs pa /
T02D1186:140a-41: de la rnal 'byor mas zhus pa //
T02D1186:140a-42: phyag rgya chen mo ci lta bu //
T02D1186:140a-43: kun rdzob rnam pa'i ngo bo yis //
T02D1186:140a-44: bde ba sbyin pa bshad du gsol //
T02D1186:140a-45: zhes pa la sogs pa la gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:140a-47: phyag rgya yang ngo zhes pas phyag rgya chen mo ste /
T02D1186:140a-48: thugs kyi rigs las byung ba pra phab pa brgyad lta bu'o //
T02D1186:140a-50: 'dir phyag rgya bzang mo ni lus phra ba rdzi ma dang bcas pa'i skra can /
T02D1186:140a-51: lag pa dang rkang pa 'jam pa /
T02D1186:140a-52: sems can la mnyes gshin pa /
T02D1186:140a-53: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma cung zad ring ba /
T02D1186:140a-54: mig mi g-yo ba ni padma can zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D1186:140a-56: ha cang ring min thung ba min //
T02D1186:140a-57: ha cang dkar min nag pa min //
T02D1186:140a-58: ha cang sbom min skems pa min //
T02D1186:140a-59: skyes bu'i skyon ni rab sbed pa'o //
T02D1186:140a-60: dus shes kun rdzob rgyun can te //
T02D1186:140b-0: rol mo shes shing @140b gar shes pa //
T02D1186:140b-1: glu len shes shing rol ba mo //
T02D1186:140b-2: rtag tu mdzes shing spu dang bral //
T02D1186:140b-3: de yi nyer gnas tshad dang ldan //
T02D1186:140b-6: rus sbal gyi rgyab lta bu sdug pa glang po che'i dbang po'i phrag pa lta bur snang ba /
T02D1186:140b-7: yangs ba shin tu dga' bskyed pa'o //
T02D1186:140b-8: de skad du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:140b-9: lha mo chen mo 'di gcig pu //
T02D1186:140b-10: mtha' yas yon tan ster ba mo //
T02D1186:140b-11: rtag tu skal ba bzang mor shes //
T02D1186:140b-12: sgrub pa po la mchog ster ma'o //
T02D1186:140b-14: de rnyed nas zhes pa phyag rgya chen mo brjod pa'i mtshan nyid can yang dag par bskyed nas /
T02D1186:140b-15: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ngo bo ste /
T02D1186:140b-16: de 'di la yod pas na lhan skyes dga' ba'i gzugs can ma'o //
T02D1186:140b-17: dngos grub tu 'gyur ba ni de'i don du 'di 'dra ba'i phyag rgya btsal ba'i dgos pa'o //
T02D1186:140b-18: dpal dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:140b-19: phyag rgya chen po ni chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid can /
T02D1186:140b-20: rnams pa thams cad mchog dang ldan pa shes rab
T02D1186:140b-21: kyi pha rol tu phyin ma sangs rgyas skyed par
T02D1186:140b-22: mdzad ma'o // chos 'byung gi sgra yis brjod par bya ste /
T02D1186:140b-23: chos 'byung de las chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin med par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1186:140b-24: rang bzhin med pa'i chos rnams ni /
T02D1186:140b-25: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams so //
T02D1186:140b-27: rten du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir de phyag rgya chen po zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D1186:140b-29: chos 'byung las skyes ye shes ni /
T02D1186:140b-30: mkha' mnyam thabs dang bcas par ldan //
T02D1186:140b-31: 'jig rten gsum po de las skyes //
T02D1186:140b-32: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin las //
T02D1186:140b-34: dpal tog rtse ba'i zhabs kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:140b-35: rdo rje 'dzin can dge ba'i sa //
T02D1186:140b-36: bcu gsum pa zhes rnam grags pa //
T02D1186:140b-37: gru gsum rnam par yang dag 'byung //
T02D1186:140b-38: chos 'byung zhes par de bshad do //
T02D1186:140b-40: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud la rdo rje'i tshig gi
T02D1186:140b-41: snying po bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel du 'dul ba'i le'u
T02D1186:140b-43: / da ni brtag pa dang por gsungs pa'i sngags rnams las kha cig btu ba'i le'u gsungs pa /
T02D1186:141a-0: gang gi tshe gdul dka' ba sngar bshad pa'i tshul @141a * //
T02D1186:141a-1: gyis gdul bar mi nus pa de'i tshe nus pa bstan nas gdul bar bya'o //
T02D1186:141a-2: zhes pa rgyud de'i phyir kha sbyor 'byed pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o zhes 'brel lo //
T02D1186:141a-3: kha sbyor 'byed pa'i cho ga yang bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1186:141a-4: de skad du yang dpal sambu ta ru gsungs pa /
T02D1186:141a-5: de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa byang
T02D1186:141a-6: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rab tu
T02D1186:141a-7: dga' zhing spyan gdangs nas 'dir the tshom rnams zhus
T02D1186:141a-8: pa / kha sbyor ci zhig brjod par bya //
T02D1186:141a-9: kha sbyor shes rab thabs bdag nyid //
T02D1186:141a-10: kha sbyor ni snyoms par 'jug pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1186:141a-11: de las byung ba dang rgyud thams cad kyi gleng
T02D1186:141a-12: gzhi'i kha sbyor gyi sgra yis rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1186:141a-14: dpal mngon par brjod pa phyi mar gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:141a-15: lte ba'i dbus su padma che //
T02D1186:141a-16: skud pa bcu drug yang dag ldan //
T02D1186:141a-17: yi ge la ni mnyam par sbyor //
T02D1186:141a-18: kha sbyor byed pa bla na med //
T02D1186:141a-19: de dbus rtag tu stong pa ni //
T02D1186:141a-20: spro dang sdud pa byed pa can //
T02D1186:141a-22: rang 'byung thams cad khyab pa po //
T02D1186:141a-24: de ltar gyur pa brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i rang
T02D1186:141a-25: bzhin gyis bdag nyid gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa
T02D1186:141a-26: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba rgyud kyi rgyal
T02D1186:141a-27: po gang gis 'byed par byed pa de kho na
T02D1186:141a-28: mtshon par bya zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
T02D1186:141a-29: 'dir srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig rnams
T02D1186:141a-30: ni rnam pa gnyis te drang ba'i don dang nges
T02D1186:141a-31: pa'i don gyis sam phyi rol dang nang gi bdag
T02D1186:141a-33: de la phyi rol du srog gcod par bcom ldan
T02D1186:141a-34: 'das kyis gsungs pa ni mtshams med pa lnga byed
T02D1186:141a-36: mtshams med pa lnga po de nyid sngon dang phyi mar shes nas so //
T02D1186:141a-37: 'dir 'ga' zhig sngar mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'i
T02D1186:141a-38: ngang tshul can phyis bsod nams byed pa por 'gyur
T02D1186:141a-39: te / gtum po mya ngan med pa dang chos rgyal mya ngan med pa bzhin no //
T02D1186:141a-40: de'i phyir de la gnod pa byas pa las sngags pa dmyal bar 'gyur te /
T02D1186:141a-41: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1186:141a-42: des na ji srid mngon par shes pa lnga can
T02D1186:141a-43: du ma gyur pa de srid du sngags pas zhi
T02D1186:141a-45: dbang du bya ba dang dgug pa ma gtogs pa drag po'i las mi bya'o //
T02D1186:141b-0: de bzhin du brdzun du @141b smra ba gzhan la
T02D1186:141b-1: gnod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang gzhan
T02D1186:141b-2: gyi bud med len pa dang /
T02D1186:141b-4: rigs dang rigs ma yin pa la bgrod pa dang /
T02D1186:141b-5: rang gi mgo bo'i mthar thug pa sbyin pa yang rang gi don du ni ma yin no //
T02D1186:141b-6: da ni gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i mthar thug par
T02D1186:141b-7: mtshams med pa lnga byed na de'i tshe sngar bsgrubs
T02D1186:141b-8: pa'i sngags khro bo'i rigs la mi bskyod pa'i ting
T02D1186:141b-9: nge 'dzin 'di yis gsad par bya ste /
T02D1186:141b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis so zhes pa ni drang ba'i don to zhes so //
T02D1186:141b-11: da ni sngags btub gsungs te /
T02D1186:141b-12: dpal rdo rje rtse mor gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:141b-13: sngags ni ci yi don du brjod //
T02D1186:141b-14: sngags rnams 'bod par byed ba dang //
T02D1186:141b-15: gdug pa thams cad rab sgrub byed //
T02D1186:141b-16: nyon mongs zhags pa gcod pa dang //
T02D1186:141b-17: sangs rgyas chos ni spyan 'dren pa'o //
T02D1186:141b-19: dpal yang dag par sbyor bar yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:141b-20: lha lags ya mtshan che ba thos //
T02D1186:141b-21: sngags btu'i cho ga ji ltar lags //
T02D1186:141b-22: de yi dbye pa bdag mi shes //
T02D1186:141b-23: bde ba chen po bshad du gsol //
T02D1186:141b-24: lha mo mkhas pa chen mo nyon //
T02D1186:141b-25: sngags kyi don nyid khyod la bshad //
T02D1186:141b-26: gru gsum dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bar //
T02D1186:141b-27: gsang ba'i padmar m'a ma k'i //
T02D1186:141b-29: ze'u 'bru gsang ba'i spyod yul du //
T02D1186:141b-30: 'dod pa thams cad sgrub pa yi //
T02D1186:141b-31: der gnas dpa' bo btu bar bya //
T02D1186:141b-32: aa yig la sogs dbye ba yis //
T02D1186:141b-33: sngags kyi sde yi dbang phyug mchog / ces so //
T02D1186:141b-34: sngags btu ba ni gzhung mang ba nyid kyis na
T02D1186:141b-35: drang ba'i don gyis go sla ba nyid kyi phyir
T02D1186:141b-37: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud la rdo rje'i tshig gi
T02D1186:141b-38: snying po bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel du sngags btu ba'i
T02D1186:141b-41: // / da ni bzlas pa'i le'u gsungs pa /
T02D1186:141b-42: de nas chos kun sdom gcig pa'i //
T02D1186:141b-43: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byas gsungs //
T02D1186:141b-44: bdag med tsum pa na mdzad nas //
T02D1186:141b-45: bzlas pa'i yul ni rab gsal mdzad //
T02D1186:141b-47: de bzhin du rgyud ni rgyud gzhan gyis rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1186:141b-48: zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa ste /
T02D1186:141b-49: dpal rdo rje rtse mor gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:141b-50: rig sngags ji ltar bzlas par bya //
T02D1186:141b-51: gsang ba dbang phyug chen pos gsungs //
T02D1186:142a-2: rdo rje can kun mnyes par byed //
T02D1186:142a-3: ji lta'i skyil mo krung bcings la //
T02D1186:142a-4: mi rtog yid kyi dran pa yis //
T02D1186:142a-5: rig par bzlas pa sbyin par bya //
T02D1186:142a-6: gzhan yang rnam pa nyid kyang ngo //
T02D1186:142a-7: mchu yis ma yin lces ma yin //
T02D1186:142a-8: rkan nyid kyis kyang ma yin no //
T02D1186:142a-9: gre bas ma yin mgrin pas min //
T02D1186:142a-10: thams cad dus su snying gar min //
T02D1186:142a-11: de ni phra bar yid la bya //
T02D1186:142a-12: chos kyi bdag nyid rtog yid kyis //
T02D1186:142a-14: dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dzin pa'i yon tan gyi le'ur gsungs pa /
T02D1186:142a-15: koo shi ka 'dir rig sngags 'di la slob pa'i
T02D1186:142a-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na
T02D1186:142a-17: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
T02D1186:142a-18: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya'o //
T02D1186:142a-19: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1186:142a-20: des na de bla na med pa yang dag par
T02D1186:142a-21: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
T02D1186:142a-22: rgyas nas sems can thams cad kyi sems la rnam
T02D1186:142a-25: koo shi ka rig sngags 'di la bslab pa'i byang
T02D1186:142a-26: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gang ma
T02D1186:142a-27: mthong ba'am ma shes pa'am mngon sum du ma byas
T02D1186:142a-28: pa cung zad kyang med do //
T02D1186:142a-29: de'i phyir na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brjod do zhes so //
T02D1186:142a-30: shel gyis rengs pa zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1186:142a-31: shel zla ba'i 'od kyi rnam pa can te rengs pa la sogs pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1186:142a-32: tshig 'di'i rgyas par ston pa'i tshig ni /
T02D1186:142a-33: mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur du yang gsungs la /
T02D1186:142a-35: thabs gzhan gyis sngags sgrub par byed pa ma yin par gsungs shing /
T02D1186:142a-36: rengs pa la sogs pa'i las sgrub pa'i don du
T02D1186:142a-37: nyung du'i rgyud 'dir dgongs pa'i skad gzhan gyis don
T02D1186:142a-39: de nyid brjod par nges pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1186:142a-40: sa la sogs pa rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1186:142a-41: de bzhin du yang dpal dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:142a-42: dang por rnam par snang mdzad byin //
T02D1186:142a-43: slar yang bzlas pa brtsam par bya //
T02D1186:142a-44: de nas bye ba bzlas byas la //
T02D1186:142a-45: sbyin sreg bcu yi cha byas te //
T02D1186:142a-46: rgyud nas gsungs pa'i cho gas kun //
T02D1186:142b-0: sngags pa gang zhig don gnyer @142b ba'i //
T02D1186:142b-1: mchog ni de grub pa yis te //
T02D1186:142b-2: rigs gzhan dang ni bya ba dus //
T02D1186:142b-3: sngags dang rigs dang rigs can gzhan //
T02D1186:142b-4: gnas dang phyogs dang rten gzhan gyi //
T02D1186:142b-5: las rnams kun la 'bras bu med //
T02D1186:142b-6: glegs bam las ni sngags bklags nas //
T02D1186:142b-7: yang dag blang ba rnam spangs pa'i //
T02D1186:142b-8: gang zhig sgrub pa byed pa'i mi //
T02D1186:142b-9: de rnams sa la nyon mongs 'gyur //
T02D1186:142b-10: yang dag par blang pa ci zhes bya zhe na /
T02D1186:142b-11: bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pas nges pa'i don gyis gang bstan pa'o //
T02D1186:142b-13: zhi dang rgyas pa'ang sras bcas rgyal ba'i rigs dang rgyal po lha mo rnams kyis 'grub par 'gyur //
T02D1186:142b-14: dbye dang bskrad pa'ang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khro bo las skyes rnams kyis 'grub par 'gyur /
T02D1186:142b-15: dbang sogs 'byung skyes rnams kyis rab gsal lha min rigs la'ang phur bus gdab pa lha min mos //
T02D1186:142b-16: yum dag gis ni las rnams gnyi ga'i rdo rje'i rigs la gsad dang gso ba yang //
T02D1186:142b-17: dpal dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1186:142b-19: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma shes rab kyi
T02D1186:142b-20: pha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang ba'i padmar las rnams
T02D1186:142b-22: rdo rje'i gdan gyi thig le'i dbus su dga' ba dang bcas pa'i lha mos gso bar byed do //
T02D1186:142b-23: rnal 'byor gyi stobs kyis srog bkug ste /
T02D1186:142b-24: ma 'phos pa'i thig les ni chags pa dang bral ba spong bar byed do //
T02D1186:142b-25: zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
T02D1186:142b-27: aa sogs ka sogs yang dag ldan //
T02D1186:142b-28: bgrang phreng skud par rab brjod bya //
T02D1186:142b-29: brgyad lhag brgya yi yi ge yis //
T02D1186:142b-30: sngags kyi bzlas pas lhag pa yang //
T02D1186:142b-31: gsal byed sum cu rtsa drug dang //
T02D1186:142b-32: dbyangs thung bco brgyad dang ldan pa //
T02D1186:142b-34: de yi phyed kyis bgrang phreng ni //
T02D1186:142b-35: gnyis ka yang ni rab bshad bya //
T02D1186:142b-36: rgyu skar gyi ni dbye ba yis //
T02D1186:142b-37: gsum par yongs su grags pa'o //
T02D1186:142b-38: de ltar rnam pa gsum du gsungs //
T02D1186:142b-39: dag pa'i las la dag pa nges //
T02D1186:142b-40: zhes pa drang ba'i don to //
T02D1186:142b-41: de bzhin du dpal gdan bzhi pa'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
T02D1186:142b-42: ril bu thams cad dgra bcom pa //
T02D1186:142b-43: mchod rten steng du yongs su brtags //
T02D1186:142b-44: padmar rdo rje nges rgyas pa //
T02D1186:143a-2: thams cad de nyid kyis bsgom bya //
T02D1186:143a-3: bgrang phreng lhag par gnas par bya //
T02D1186:143a-4: sngags kyi de nyid gsal ba ni //
T02D1186:143a-5: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can //
T02D1186:143a-6: rtog ge pa yis mi shes shing //
T02D1186:143a-7: rnal 'byor byis pa'i rtogs bya min //
T02D1186:143a-9: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud la rdo rje'i tshig gi
T02D1186:143a-10: snying po bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel du bzlas pa'i le'u
T02D1186:143a-12: / da ni rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma
T02D1186:143a-13: dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rigs kyi mtshan
T02D1186:143a-14: ma gsungs pa / lus can rnams kyi rigs kyi gzugs //
T02D1186:143a-15: de la bdag med mas zhus so //
T02D1186:143a-16: bha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas //
T02D1186:143a-18: lus can rang gi rigs bshad kyis //
T02D1186:143a-19: shes rab pha rol phyin ma nyon //
T02D1186:143a-20: bud med dam ni skyes pa yi //
T02D1186:143a-21: gang gi ming med rtsa ba la //
T02D1186:143a-22: rdo rje rtse dgu par gyur pa //
T02D1186:143a-23: mi bskyod pa yi rigs mchog nyid //
T02D1186:143a-26: rin chen 'byung gi rin chen che //
T02D1186:143a-27: las kyi rigs kyi ral gri'o //
T02D1186:143a-28: de bzhin du ser po dang dkar po la sogs
T02D1186:143a-29: pa rnams kyang rim pa 'di yis rtogs par bya'o
T02D1186:143a-30: // da ni ji skad bshad pa'i rnam par snang
T02D1186:143a-31: mdzad la sogs pa'i rigs rnams kyi nges pa'i don
T02D1186:143a-32: rim pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1186:143a-33: bshad pa dpal thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud du gsungs
T02D1186:143a-34: // pa yang / sems ni spro ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1186:143a-35: phra mo'i ye shes sogs sbyor bas //
T02D1186:143a-36: de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni //
T02D1186:143a-37: rnam par snang mdzad ces par bshad //
T02D1186:143a-38: byams pa spro ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1186:143a-39: spyad pa spyod byed dam pa ni //
T02D1186:143a-40: snang ba med pa bstan gyur pa'i //
T02D1186:143a-41: sems ni mi bskyod brjod par bya //
T02D1186:143a-42: snying rje spro ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1186:143a-43: sems can rjes 'dzin byed pa po //
T02D1186:143a-44: sems can don dang ldan pa'i sems //
T02D1186:143a-45: rin chen 'byung ldan brjod par bya //
T02D1186:143a-46: dga' ba spro ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1186:143a-47: ye shes chen po dri med mchog / rang bzhin 'od gsal dag pa'i sems //
T02D1186:143a-48: de ni snang ba mtha' yas brjod //
T02D1186:143a-49: btang snyoms spro bar byed pa'i sems //
T02D1186:143a-50: sems can don kun rtogs mdzad pa //
T02D1186:143a-51: don yod bla na med pa'i sku //
T02D1186:143b-0: don yod @143b grub pa de brjod bya //
T02D1186:143b-1: rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma dag gi nges
T02D1186:143b-2: pa'i don gyi rigs lnga rnam par dag pa zhes
T02D1186:143b-4: da ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pa bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
T02D1186:143b-5: tshal dang skye bo med gnas dang //
T02D1186:143b-6: bdag gi khyim dang gzhan du yang //
T02D1186:143b-7: gcer bur phyag rgya che byas nas //
T02D1186:143b-8: rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod //
T02D1186:143b-10: ci ste gal te rnal 'byor ba grong pa'i chos
T02D1186:143b-11: la sogs pas 'dod pa byed na de'i tshe rjes
T02D1186:143b-13: 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyang nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D1186:143b-14: sngar ji skad du gsungs pa sngags pas gzhan pa mi 'dod do zhes so //
T02D1186:143b-16: shes rab ma la 'khyud pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1186:143b-17: de bzhin du dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:143b-18: mchod pa'i don du 'dod pa'i bstan bcos yon tan mang po'i gnas ni rnal 'byor pas rig bya //
T02D1186:143b-19: shin tu dga' ba byas kyang rnal 'byor pa la rnal 'byor ma yis ma tshim dngos grub ni //
T02D1186:143b-20: sbyin par mi 'gyur mdzes ma lha mo sha za mo dang mi mo srin mo klu mor 'gyur //
T02D1186:143b-21: mdzes ma dpal ldan chos dbyings su 'gyur yon tan dbang gis lha mo dgra yi rdo rje ma //
T02D1186:143b-23: khyogs dang gru mo zhes bya dang //
T02D1186:143b-24: de bzhin shin tu brkyang ba yis //
T02D1186:143b-26: kar na 'di rnams kyis 'dod pa bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1186:143b-27: de la khyogs zhes pa khyogs pa lta bu ni khyogs te /
T02D1186:143b-28: 'di ni nye bar 'dug pa'i ka ra na yin la /
T02D1186:143b-29: 'dir bud med byed pa po ste skyes bu'i ched
T02D1186:143b-30: du de sbyor bas skyes bu rnams kyis sgrub par
T02D1186:143b-31: byed pa gzhan gyi yul du gnas pa mi mos
T02D1186:143b-32: rang gi rked pa mdun dang rgyab nas 'degs par
T02D1186:143b-34: 'di'i mtshan nyid kyi tshigs su bcang ba gsungs pa /
T02D1186:143b-35: pho mtshan steng na gnas pa la //
T02D1186:143b-36: mdun dang rgyab nas mi mo yis //
T02D1186:143b-37: rim pas sked pa 'degs par bya //
T02D1186:143b-38: mi mo'i khyogs su rab tu grags //
T02D1186:143b-39: gang gi tshe 'dis skyo bar gyur na de'i tshe steng gi kar na bshad pa /
T02D1186:143b-40: gru mo zhes pa gru mo sbyor ba las bstan
T02D1186:143b-41: pa'i ka ra na 'di'i zhes pa gru mo'i ming
T02D1186:143b-42: can no // de la skyes pa byed po ste /
T02D1186:143b-43: gdong steng du gnas pa'i gnyi ga dag gis kyang ste /
T02D1186:143b-44: mgrin pa la 'jus pa'i bar du myos mas rkang
T02D1186:143b-45: pa g-yas pa steng du bslang ba'i pus mo'i mthil
T02D1186:144a-0: la @144a * // g-yon pa'i gru mo bzhag nas
T02D1186:144a-1: lag pa g-yas pa de'i rgyab nas gzung bar bya
T02D1186:144a-3: 'dir tshigs su bcad par gyur pa //
T02D1186:144a-4: mi mo'i pus mo'i mthil bslangs nas //
T02D1186:144a-5: g-yas dang g-yon gyi dpung ba yis //
T02D1186:144a-6: sbyar te steng gi ka ra na //
T02D1186:144a-7: gnyis ka steng du phyogs par gnas //
T02D1186:144a-8: shin tu brkyang pa zhes pa la /
T02D1186:144a-9: 'dir yang skyes bu byed pa po ste rab tu
T02D1186:144a-10: brkyang pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par du byas pa
T02D1186:144a-11: nyid kyi phyir shin tu brkyang ba'o //
T02D1186:144a-12: de yang gan rkyal du g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i
T02D1186:144a-13: rkang pa'i mthil la rang gi lag pa'i mthil gyis
T02D1186:144a-14: sbyar nas ngang pa'i gshog pa lta bur dpung pa
T02D1186:144a-16: 'di'i mtshan nyid kyi tshigs su bcad pa ni //
T02D1186:144a-17: ngang pa'i gshog pa mtshungs rnam pa //
T02D1186:144a-18: gan rkyal ba ru rab tu grags //
T02D1186:144a-19: rkang pa rab tu brkyang gyur pa //
T02D1186:144a-20: gnyis kyis rab tu brkyang pa'o //
T02D1186:144a-22: 'di ni gan rkyal gyi ka ra na'o zhes pa drang ba'i don to //
T02D1186:144a-23: da ni rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa'i nges pa'i don gsal bar bya ba ste /
T02D1186:144a-24: dpal gsang ba nor bu'i thig ler gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:144a-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
T02D1186:144a-26: par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na
T02D1186:144a-27: rdo rje la shin tu gsang ba gsungs par gyur
T02D1186:144a-28: to // rang gi sku las phyung nas rigs kyi
T02D1186:144a-29: lha mo chen mo mdun du gzhag par gyur to
T02D1186:144a-30: to // // phyag na rdo rje khyod kyis kyang
T02D1186:144a-31: rang gi snying la yid du 'ong ba'i lha mo
T02D1186:144a-32: phyung cig / de nas rdo rje'i bdag nyid kyis
T02D1186:144a-33: rdo rje gar gyi sbyor bas rigs kyi lha mo
T02D1186:144a-34: chen mo phyung bar gyur to //
T02D1186:144a-35: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
T02D1186:144a-36: rjes su chags bzhin pas zhal cung zad bzhad pa
T02D1186:144a-37: / gzugs mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba /
T02D1186:144a-38: skal ba bzang mo spros nas mdun du bzhag par gyur to //
T02D1186:144a-39: pus mo gnyis kyi phyogs su gnas nas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
T02D1186:144a-40: ae ma bdag gi gsang ba gang yin pa /
T02D1186:144a-42: de nas rdo rje sgeg mo rigs kyi lha mo
T02D1186:144a-43: chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dga'
T02D1186:144a-44: ma des / bdag nyid kyi gsang ba ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
T02D1186:144a-45: bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa //
T02D1186:144a-46: bdag gi gsang ba 'di gang zhig / cho ga yis ni bsten byed pa //
T02D1186:144a-47: de yi mdun du ngag nas so //
T02D1186:144b-0: de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces @144b gsol to //
T02D1186:144b-1: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba 'di bstan du gsol /
T02D1186:144b-3: de nas rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas
T02D1186:144b-4: phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
T02D1186:144b-5: to // rkang pas rkang pa mnan byas nas //
T02D1186:144b-6: mchu ni kha la gzhag par bya //
T02D1186:144b-7: lag pa dag gis sbyar byas te /
T02D1186:144b-8: mgo bo la ni bskul bar bya //
T02D1186:144b-9: sen rtses de yi padma ni //
T02D1186:144b-10: lag pa g-yon pas mnyes byas nas //
T02D1186:144b-11: rdul ni kun nas 'bab par bya //
T02D1186:144b-12: de nas so yis so gzung bya //
T02D1186:144b-13: mchu yis mchu dang lce yis lce //
T02D1186:144b-14: ji srid 'o thigs mi rgyu'i bar //
T02D1186:144b-15: de srid rdo rje gnas par bya //
T02D1186:144b-16: dpal gsang ba'i thig ler gsungs pa yang ;
T02D1186:144b-17: phyag na rdo rje'o ma'i thigs //
T02D1186:144b-18: gsang ba'i thig ler shes par bya //
T02D1186:144b-19: dpal 'jig rten gsum gsang ba'i rgyud du gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:144b-20: de las langs nas nye bar 'jug par byed do //
T02D1186:144b-22: de nas 'ching ba de nyid kyis 'dzin par byed do //
T02D1186:144b-23: de nas padma dbang po'i gzhu'i rnam pa can du 'gyur ro //
T02D1186:144b-24: padma'i dbus su nor bu gru gsum bsam par bya ste /
T02D1186:144b-25: nor bu'i tshad ni rnam pa nor bu'i kha dog mu tig gi 'bras bu 'dra ba'o //
T02D1186:144b-26: de nas sngags pas bskul bar bya ste /
T02D1186:144b-27: mgo bo dang spyi gtsug dang rgyab dang rked pa'i phyogs dang /
T02D1186:144b-28: phyag rgya'i padma'i rtse mo la'o //
T02D1186:144b-29: de nas steng dang 'og tu phyogs par gnas nas
T02D1186:144b-30: gsang ba'i don du de rdo rje'i lce yis myang
T02D1186:144b-31: bar byas te / ji srid 'o ma ltung ba de srid du'o //
T02D1186:144b-32: de las langs te zlog pa'i dga' bas sngags pas 'dod par bya'o //
T02D1186:144b-33: de nas lha mo chen mo bde ba'o zhes smra bar bya'o //
T02D1186:144b-34: de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02D1186:144b-35: rdo rje'i rnal 'byor med thar pa'i rgyur 'dod par bgyi'o //
T02D1186:144b-36: mdor bstan pa'i tshig 'di'i rgyas par bstan pa'i tshig
T02D1186:144b-37: ni dpal sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba
T02D1186:144b-38: mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom par gsungs pa yang
T02D1186:144b-39: / bcom ldan thar pa zhes bya ba //
T02D1186:144b-40: de ni ci ltar ci zhig lags //
T02D1186:144b-41: bcom ldan 'das ni chags pa che //
T02D1186:144b-42: dngos grub thams cad chags byed phyir //
T02D1186:144b-43: dngos grub thams cad 'gyur med bde //
T02D1186:144b-44: bde ba chen po zhes par bshad //
T02D1186:144b-45: ka ra na 'di rnams kyis dga' ba bzhi'i bdag
T02D1186:144b-46: nyid can bde ba chen po rnal 'byor ba rnams
T02D1186:144b-47: kyi de nyid la nye bar mtshon par bya'o //
T02D1186:145a-0: @145a * // dga' bas bde ba cung cad de //
T02D1186:145a-1: mchog tu dga' ba de bas lhag / khyad dga'i dga' bas chags bral 'gyur //
T02D1186:145a-2: lhag ma lhan cig skyes dga' 'o //
T02D1186:145a-4: gsang ba grub par dga' ba bzhi'i bshad par gsungs pa de nyid ston par byed de /
T02D1186:145a-5: yang dag rig pa skyed byed mchog / thog ma bar mtha' dri ma med //
T02D1186:145a-6: dang po'i las can sems can rnams //
T02D1186:145a-7: mtshon bya yid ches byed pa can //
T02D1186:145a-8: mkha' dbyings rdo rje sbyor las dang //
T02D1186:145a-9: reg pa las kyang rmad byung che'i //
T02D1186:145a-10: bde ba skyed par byed pa gang //
T02D1186:145a-11: de ni mchog dga' byed pa'o //
T02D1186:145a-12: de zad pa las khyad dga'i dga' //
T02D1186:145a-13: khyad dga'i mthar yang gzhan gang zhig / bstan du med pa'i rang bzhin can //
T02D1186:145a-14: rang nyid ci yang skye ba ni //
T02D1186:145a-15: dbang po kun gyis rnam bar grol //
T02D1186:145a-16: gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba ste //
T02D1186:145a-17: khyad par byed pa rang bzhin med //
T02D1186:145a-19: dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod par gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:145a-20: nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag / las kyi khams rnams zad byed pa //
T02D1186:145a-21: chu bo'i rgya mtsho kun las rgal //
T02D1186:145a-22: sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba //
T02D1186:145a-24: kun du bzang po mchog ces bya //
T02D1186:145a-25: khyad dga'i mtha' ru rnam par gnas //
T02D1186:145a-26: sgrub pa po yi bde mchog go //
T02D1186:145a-27: grol ba'i gnas su rab tu grags //
T02D1186:145a-28: drug gis legs par yang dag phye //
T02D1186:145a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis te /
T02D1186:145a-31: rang bzhin med pa mchog tu ngag / byang chub sems ni bla na med //
T02D1186:145a-32: rang bzhin dag pa de yi ni //
T02D1186:145a-33: rgyas par bstan pa bdag gis bshad //
T02D1186:145a-34: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
T02D1186:145a-35: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom bar bya //
T02D1186:145a-36: zhes pa la sogs pa gang bshad pa /
T02D1186:145a-37: de ni nam mkha'i dbyings kyi steng du rin po che las gyur pa rnam par gnas te /
T02D1186:145a-38: rdo rje'i bde ba'i bzhin sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras
T02D1186:145a-39: bu ster bar byed pa bla ma'i brgyud rim pas
T02D1186:145a-40: rnal 'byor pas shes par bya'o zhes pa nges pa'i
T02D1186:145a-41: don to // dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D1186:145a-42: phyin par rjes su yi rang ba'i le'ur gsungs pa
T02D1186:145a-43: don to // yang / chos rnams thams cad ni
T02D1186:145a-44: rtogs pas rnam par bsgrubs pa ma skyes pa nges
T02D1186:145b-0: 'ong ba @145b med pa 'gro ba med pa'o //
T02D1186:145b-1: 'di la chos 'ga' zhig kyang skyes pa med do //
T02D1186:145b-2: chos 'ga' yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1186:145b-4: chos ci yang 'gags pa yang ma yin no //
T02D1186:145b-5: chos ci yang 'gag par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1186:145b-8: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud la rdo rje'i tshig gi
T02D1186:145b-9: snying po bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel du lhan cig skyes
T02D1186:145b-10: pa'i don gyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o /
T02D1186:145b-12: // / de nas rdo rje can gyis dbang bzhi'i tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa /
T02D1186:145b-13: dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod par bka' stsal pa yang /
T02D1186:145b-14: rdo rje kun 'chang rdo rje can //
T02D1186:145b-15: rdo rje gcig pu g-yul sel ba //
T02D1186:145b-17: rdo rje che dang dril bu che //
T02D1186:145b-18: rdo rje rab tu gnas par gzung //
T02D1186:145b-19: zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1186:145b-20: 'di'i nges pa'i don ni dpal don dam pa'i bsnyen par gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:145b-21: shes rab lag tu rdo rje 'di ci'i don //
T02D1186:145b-22: thabs kyi lag tu rdo rje dril bu yang //
T02D1186:145b-23: bdud rnams zad don bde ba ston pa'i don //
T02D1186:145b-24: rgyu mtshan can gyi tshul khrims 'dzin pa'am min //
T02D1186:145b-26: dpal gdan bzhi par gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:145b-27: slob dpon gyi ni lam gyis ni //
T02D1186:145b-28: mkhas pa rnams kyis bstan par bya //
T02D1186:145b-29: rdo rje bdag nyid ces bskyed nas //
T02D1186:145b-30: dril bu shes rab ces sprul te /
T02D1186:145b-31: mnyam par lta ba gnas byas te //
T02D1186:145b-32: lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin las //
T02D1186:145b-33: rdo rje'i rtse mor shes sa bon //
T02D1186:145b-34: bdag nyid lha rnams tshim pa nyid //
T02D1186:145b-35: rdo rje dril bu rang lus kyi //
T02D1186:145b-36: phyag rgya kha sbyor sbyar bar bya //
T02D1186:145b-37: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya bzhi'ang //
T02D1186:145b-38: de kho na nyid las gzung bya //
T02D1186:145b-39: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gsor //
T02D1186:145b-40: dril bu'ang rang gi 'dod pas dkrol //
T02D1186:145b-41: gnyis kyi lus ni dga' byas nas //
T02D1186:145b-42: lha rnams thams cad tshim par byas //
T02D1186:145b-43: rnal 'byor pa la de nyid med //
T02D1186:145b-44: glang chen dril bu dkrol dang mtshungs //
T02D1186:145b-45: rnal 'byor de nyid kyis dman la //
T02D1186:145b-46: dngos grub ring bar mtshon par bya //
T02D1186:145b-47: zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
T02D1186:145b-48: drang ba'i don gyis ni 'di thams cad go sla'o //
T02D1186:145b-49: ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis //
T02D1186:145b-50: byang chub sras rnams dbang bskur ba //
T02D1186:145b-51: gsang ba'i dbang bskur chen po yis //
T02D1186:145b-52: sems kyi rgyun gyis dbang bskur ro //
T02D1186:145b-54: lha mo dga' sbyin gnas sbyin ma //
T02D1186:145b-55: sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'ong ma //
T02D1186:146a-1: cig khyer cig sems dpa' che //
T02D1186:146a-2: khyer ba byas nas mchod pa gyis //
T02D1186:146a-3: zhes pa la 'dir brjod par bya ste /
T02D1186:146a-4: dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:146a-5: dbus su srog ni rab tu zhugs pa sna tshogs
T02D1186:146a-6: yu ma la yul dang rnam bral 'khyud pa ste
T02D1186:146a-7: // padmar zhugs pa rang gi rdo rje spro ba'ang de bzhin zla nyi'i dbus sur bzhugs pa //
T02D1186:146a-8: bde ba sa bon ma lhung ba la rab dga'i dgar gnas rnal 'byor pa yi rnal 'byor 'di //
T02D1186:146a-9: phyag rgya'i dngos grub don rgyur khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldan gsang ba las kyang gsang ba'o //
T02D1186:146a-11: ye shes 'di ni ches phra zhing //
T02D1186:146a-12: rdo rje snying po nam mkha' mtshungs //
T02D1186:146a-13: rdul bral mthar sbyin zhi ba ste //
T02D1186:146a-14: khyod kyi pha yang khyod rang yin //
T02D1186:146a-15: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1186:146a-16: dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyi le'ur gsungs pa yang /
T02D1186:146a-17: rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D1186:146a-18: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D1186:146a-19: la slob bzhin pa'i rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag
T02D1186:146a-20: pa'i chos rnams thams cad la gang mi 'god zhing
T02D1186:146a-22: rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02D1186:146a-24: chu dang cod pan dang rdo rje dang /
T02D1186:146a-25: bdag po dang ming gi dbang bskur rnams la tshigs su bcad pa rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa dang /
T02D1186:146a-26: dbang bskur la gsol ba 'debs pa'i don ni blta bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1186:146a-27: dpal patti ka ra ka ra gnas pa'i dpal gser
T02D1186:146a-28: gyi mchod rten gyi gtsug lag khang chen por gnas
T02D1186:146a-29: pa / tshul khrims kyi sdom pas bsdams pa /
T02D1186:146a-30: dge slong dam pa dul ba'i dpal bshes gnyen la
T02D1186:146a-31: sogs pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa can dpal
T02D1186:146a-32: kha che chen po sh'akya'i dge slong snyan grags bzang
T02D1186:146a-33: po bla ma dam pa brgyud pa'i man ngag thob
T02D1186:146a-34: cing rnyed pas ji skad bshad pa'i gsang ba'i lung
T02D1186:146a-35: sna tshogs kye'i rdo rje'i tshig rnams bsdus nas /
T02D1186:146a-36: skye bo dam pa'i yid kyi mtshor ngang pa'i mchog
T02D1186:146a-37: lta bur dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud la gsang ba'i
T02D1186:146a-38: rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po bsdus pa gsal por
T02D1186:146a-39: rab tu gsal bar byed pa'i dka' 'grel 'di byas
T02D1186:146a-40: so // 'dir tshigs su bcad bdag tu yang 'gyur te /
T02D1186:146a-41: rdo rje slob dpon bka' drin dang //
T02D1186:146a-42: rnal 'byor ma rnams mnyes byed pas //
T02D1186:146b-0: @146b man ngag thob pa kho nas 'dir //
T02D1186:146b-1: kye yi rdo rje'i dka' 'grel byas //
T02D1186:146b-2: dka' 'grel de nyid byas nas ni //
T02D1186:146b-3: bdag gis bsod nams gang bsags des //
T02D1186:146b-4: bde ba can du sems can rnams //
T02D1186:146b-5: ji ltar 'dod bzhin gnas gyur cig / dpal ldan
T02D1186:146b-6: bham ga'i sa'i bdag po dpal ldan 'phrog byed tshangs
T02D1186:146b-7: pa'i lha'i rgyal srid rab tu 'phel zhing rnam par
T02D1186:146b-8: rgyal ba la / lo bco brgyad pa la dbo
T02D1186:146b-9: can gyi zla ba'i tshes bdun la dka' 'grel 'di
T02D1186:146b-10: rgyal ba la / grub pa'o // le'u bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid can 'di ste //
T02D1186:146b-11: brtag pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can gyi rgyud dpal kye'i rdo rje zhes bya'o //
T02D1186:146b-12: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud la kha che chen pos
T02D1186:146b-13: rtogs pa gnas brtan dul ba'i dpal bshes gnyen gyis
T02D1186:146b-14: gsol ba btab pa rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po
T02D1186:146b-15: bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel du brtag pa gnyis pa le'u
T02D1186:146b-18: // / kha che'i pandi ta chen po sh'akya shr'i bzang po'i zhal snga nas /
T02D1186:146b-19: bod kyi lo ts'a ba dpyal chos kyi bzang pos
T02D1186:146b-20: dpal bkra shis gser sdings kyi gtsug lag khang du
T02D1186:146b-21: legs par zhus shing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o
T02D1186:146b-23: / // / slar yang dpal ldan shong ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi legs bshad la sogs pa'i mthu las /
T02D1186:146b-24: brda sprod pa'i tshul rig pa'i dbang lo ts'a ba
T02D1186:146b-25: dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas byang chub sems dpa'i
T02D1186:146b-26: 'grel pa skor gsum gyi tshul la shin tu dad
T02D1186:146b-27: cing blo'i snang ba rgyas pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
T02D1186:146b-28: ra lung pa chos grags dpal bzang pos /
T02D1186:146b-29: slob dpon zhi ba'i tsho'i zhabs dpon slob kyis mdzad
T02D1186:146b-30: pa'i dbu ma'i gzhung lugs chen po de kho na
T02D1186:146b-31: nyid bsdus pa rtsa 'grel gyi glegs bam bris te
